desc: Our stay at the PARKROYAL on Beach Road was uneventful but this midscale hotel and the rooms and facilities are showing their age. The rooms were not well sound-proofed and we could hear the noise from the hallways. Nonetheless, the nightly room rates can be considered quite low for Singapore (about 200 euros per night) but that did not include breakfast. This hotel is located right in front of Arab Street and there is a bus station at the front of the hotel which is very convenient to visit Central Singapore and the Marina Bay (about 10 minutes away). Bugis MRT is also located about 10 minutes away by foot. Since I was a repeat visitor, this hotel was chosen for its location but I could recommend this hotel for visitors on a budget as Singapore is among the world's most

title: Very relaxing staycation
desc: First time experience at the said hotel. Was allocated to a room on level 4 and it was very convenient as I am able to access the pool and the gym w/o any hassle. The room was clean and comfy. The hotel is located within the walking distance of Bussorah St/Arab St cafes and Bugis Junction/Bugis Plus. Strongly recommended 😊👍🏻

title: Dishonest hotel. Please avoid at all costs
desc: A deposit was insisted upon for a prepaid visit. We were promised that it would be refunded on leaving. Despite repeated requests this has never happened. Do not stay at this hotel. They are liars and dishonest. I will be contacting my credit card company on my return home and lodging a complaint. Avoid this place at all costs.

title: Wedding Reception
desc: Wife and I held a wedding reception at the Sky Ballroom for 270 guest, wedding reception went through flawlessly with the expertise of the wedding coordinator Eric Chan and the Planner Felicia Koh! The wedding reception was held during the 4Q of 2022 and it was considered the peak period for wedding receptions. Felicia, even though she was occupied with multiple weddings and was not able to reply to messages swiftly, managed to provide and meet our needs to get the wedding going perfectly! Highly recommended for couples who plan to have their wedding in Parkroyal @ Beach Rd! Beautiful decor and excellent banquet staff!

title: Hotel carpet is stink, smell very bad in the room
desc: Stayed here for 1 night and upgrade to Executive Club Floor from deluxe room Breakfast not much variety. The worst thing i think is the room. The carpet is stink, smell very bad in the room. I couldn't sleep that night with the unpleasant room conditions.

title: Great hotel, in a good central location with caring, friendly and efficient staff
desc: I enjoyed a great five night stay at this hotel. Great breakfast buffet, comfy room, couldn't fault a thing. When I unfortunately left without my ipad, Senior Duty Manager, Ms. Dillah Nazeri, went to extraordinary lengths to find it and have it safely returned to my home in Australia. Just so good, will definitely stay here again.

title: Our Worst Stay In Singapore
desc: Lets start with the bad part- 1.No welcome to brown people, whites were assisted with the bags from cabs to lobby area We were with kids still they didnt assist us with our bags. 2. Breakfast Vs Beggars - We stayed on a weekend apparently had to wait in 30min long que next to each other- apparently they were following covid norms. 3. From covid norms i remember the hotel has tap fitted for drinking water next to basin and commode.. huh covid norms 🤣. Apart from that no drinking water is provided. Now the good part- The reception was very slow but very friendly. The rooms were spacious and clean. The location was very good.

title: Such a friendly staff !
desc: The friendliness of the staff was just awesome. I probably never experienced that in the hundreds of hotels I visited. Thank you. Hotel was very clean, the room and the bed were large, shower enjoyable

title: Location, location, location
desc: Hotel was good, soundproof between rooms a bit weak; could here next-door kid crying at 2am. Perhaps remind guests that this a non-smoking hotel, could smell cigarettes coming from next-door. I informed hotel it was my wife's birthday week, wasn't expecting elaborate decoration of the room; we stayed 5 nights did not even receive a card or any form of acknowledgement. Walk to Bugis Mrt via Duo Tower.

title: Good hospitality provided by ParkRoyal on Beach Rd, Singapore
desc: I had a wonderful stay at ParkRoyal on Beach Rd, Singapore from 6 Oct 2022 to 8 Oct. Our hotel room was spacious and clean. We put up ‘No Disturb’ sign before we left our hotel room on 07 Oct morning. When we came back in the afternoon, we found a note saying that the housekeeper wanting to clean up our hotel room but because of no disturb sign, they were unable to do so.. Within 5 minutes after we came back, we heard doorbell and a housekeeper was outside and requesting politely if she could clean up the hotel room. I was impressed with her good attitude and her politeness. The housekeeper is namely Hnin. She cleaned up the room neatly and quietly. Good work by her. Thank you for the hospitality.

title: Exceptional service
desc: Booked a club deluxe room to celebrate another milestone for my partner and I. Upon arrival at the first floor lobby, the counter staff (Ray) noted that we booked the club room and so there is a dedicated check-in counter at level 6. He escorted us up and sat us down at the club lounge while waiting for the staff to attend to us. Shortly after Dytiana attended to us and we were able to have a seamless check-in at the club lounge while having some refreshments served to us. She explained patiently to us what our room package includes and ever ready to answer our queries. Though we just arrived shortly, we could already tell that our experience there would be phenomenal. The room was decently sized, clean and a box of complimentary pineapple tarts was on the table for us to enjoy.

title: Great hotel
desc: This is a Great hotel in a brilliant location, we have stayed many times before & I’m sure we will again. The bed was amazing, I need to buy the same mattress for home, it was so comfortable. The pool area is nice and clean with plenty of sun beds and parasols

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Had a one night stay with my family. Frontdesk Rosnah had kindly upgraded our room upon knowing i have 3 young children with me as she felt that the room I had book might be a little small. Our checkin was done swiftly by Rosnah. Room were clean and the bed+pillow were comfortable. Didnt have a good view frm the window as our room was located at level 2. Nonetheless, we are still thankful for the big room which consisted of a king bed+single bed. The pool however seems a little backdated and need some uplifting. Kids being kids they still enjoyed it though. Location of the hotel is very convenient to alot of restaurants nearby. Will definitely return. Once again, thank you Rosnah.

title: Great hotel
desc: Fantastic hotel could not fault the service. Great variety for the buffet breakfast, lovely pool area. Close to a MRT station and across the road from Kampong Glam. will definitely stay again on my next visit to Singapore

title: Very poor standard of service.
desc: Very poor standard of service. I have never been told “no” so often by hotel staff at a 5 star hotel. We asked for assistance from reception and the hotel concierge to arrange a doctors appointment or to have one come to the hotel. Absolutely no effort was made to help. We were directed to the local hospital to sit and wait. Even when I asked again for assistance to book an appointment at a clinic ( I found a few clinics open on Sundays) I was told it wasn’t possible. I also asked again to have a doctor come to the hotel and again my request was dismissed. In reality the hotel staff had no interest in helping. This is the standard I would expect at a backpacker hostel. There’s a big issue with consistency at this hotel. We stayed for 9 nights in a Club Level room. The

title: Very comfortable hotel
desc: Singapore is a modern even futuristic city and this hotel was no different. We arrived at about 6:30pm and made our way into the impressive hotel lobby. The check in process was quick and efficient and we found the staff to be extremely friendly and helpful. We were allocated room number 532, which was located on the 5th floor. The room was modern very clean and free from any dust. The room consisted of a Kingsize bed which was extremely comfortable and helped to provide a good nights sleep. The storage facilities in the room were pretty good for our stay. The bathroom was a good size and consisted of a shower, sink and WC. The toiletries were also included. The hotel has a bar and restaurant. We had breakfast each day which was a mixture of Asian food and pastries.

title: Incredible stay, exceeded expectations, Club Lounge staff were exceptional, honoured all GHA Titanium benefits and more
desc: Hotel was nice and clean, the rooms were kept well, but the best part about the stay was certainly the incredible staff. Honoured 2 tier upgrade to Club Room and 11am check in + 4pm check out as a GHA titanium member. The staff at the Club Lounge were nothing short of exceptional, extremely attentive to detail and addressed me by name from the start, special mention goes to Maja and Christina from the lounge and the Discovery Champion at the reception, really went out of their way to make my stay as special and comfortable as possible. Only hiccup was the very lacklustre breakfast at Ginger, all the food were cold and extremely unpalatable. Although the lunch spread was better, the restaurant seemed to be extremely understaffed and service was rather underwhelming. Overall

title: Excellent location
desc: Stayed for three nights en route to New Zealand. Staff were very friendly and efficient. Superior room was spacious and comfortable although our room was at the back of the Hotel albeit that meant no traffic noise 😊 Location is close to the Sultan Mosque and plenty of Turkish/Lebanese restaurants nearby. 15 minute walk to Raffles Hotel. Very happy to stay here again. Excellent roof top pool.

title: We had a terrible stay!
desc: It all kicked off to a bad start, when we were hardly welcomed at the reception desk; a descent way to greet a paying customer would be at least to wish us a pleasant stay, whereas we got grunted hellos & miserable faces. The rooms were meagre; we payed for a higher room as well & so cannot imagine what other ones were like! Breakfast was awful- we h booked for bed and breakfast & yet were forced to go out since it was to such a low standard. The breakfast goes on until 10:30, however, we asked about fresh bread (not the ordinary sliced one) & were told that it had run out at 9:30, with an hour remaining of breakfast. Pool was not great, & we asked for tap water to which the waiter replied: ‘I’ll give you one, but any more, you have to pay for’. We were shocked that pulling a

title: Blown by the food at lunch...ginger
desc: Im mama sue. I was at the ginger restaurant for lunch today 23rd nov 2022. It was my first time recommended by a fren. Its a wow wow wee if i may say that. The spread was generous and the taste was awesome. I love it and giving it a 10star❤. Im declaring it on a personal opinion basis as d best buffet lunch id ever had in singapore. As a local, i have tried quite a number of hotels and restaurant (halal) and this is d best so far. Was approached by the manager ( i suppose) miss aishah or asiah. A very warm and pleasant lady. Thank you ginger and thank parkroyal for having ginger restaurant there👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍👍

title: Our Sanctuary in Singapore!
desc: We are returning back here after a break of almost 2 years. Feels so nostalgic and emotional to be back in this wonderful abode which served as a sanctuary to us during the challenging times of Covid in 2020. We spent a whole year restricted to this double room. Working from ‘home’, Whipping up food with minimal apparatus, Celebrating birthdays and anniversaries, and even Hosting after parties! Went through the toughest lockdown restrictions and ambiguities in this small space! So, it was a must that we came back when things are back to normal and spend more time at this place - with the staff who are like family to us now. And the welcome we received today was so beyond touching and moving. We were treated like celebrities! Even new employees came and introduced themselves to

title: Low standard hotel
desc: Shockingly poor hotel! Never have stayed in a poor 4star hotel . such as this. My daughter & I stayed here. The service was appalling, staff were rude, impolite & unfriendly (except for one room maid!) The room (despite being superior) was meagre & hardly made up except for the bed & towel change. Breakfast was awful & if things ran out (as bread did an hour & a half before the end!) we were told there was no more! We would ask for ice which never came, we were told we’d be charged for tap water! Pool was awful & sun loungers uncomfortable! All in all more of a basic 3star motel standard..

title: TWO enjoyable 3 night stays
desc: We stayed here both in October and November/December going to and from Australia and had a great experience both times. All staff friendly and welcoming and very polite special mention to Dytianna in the club lounge who was so attentive. Decent sized rooms bathroom better in deluxe room on 7th floor 6th floor bathroom a bit cramped but adequate, breakfast selection good and staff efficient. Very pleasant and efficient check in and out. Position good for a number of local attractions and taxis cheap for those further afield. 20 minutes to airport.

title: Good location to Kampong Glam and its attraction, friendly staff
desc: We are back here again after 2 years. This hotel is one of my favourite based on its location near to Kampong Glam and all the eateries which is just across the road. We stayed in room 546. We were there to celebrate a birthday, and were given complimentary slice of cake for the occasion. Reception was very friendly and helpful. Check-in was fast. Buffet breakfast in Ginger is halal and it comes with a wide variety of choices. Really enjoyed the food. The swimming pool is quite large and it also has a kids’ pool. Would definitely be back again, especially to dine in Ginger!

title: 2 day stopover
desc: Spent two nights on way back from Thailand. Easy transfer from airport ie 15 mins As family of four we booked 2 rooms and were kindly allocated adjoining rooms on floor 3 roadside. Very nice clean and quiet hotel idea for exploring Singapore. Two stations nearby ie ten minute walk and nice streets across the road with cafes and bars Breakfast excellent but extremely busy in a small area for hotel size Pool and gym excellent and lovely after long travel or days exploring the city. Bar nice and staff excellent and friendly Check out super quick and transfer waiting. Only minor issue the lifts ! You can only access with a card and get to floors you stay on. My wife got stranded and ended up in the fire escape I would return on business or pleasure as nice location,

title: Great central hotel with transport and pool close to lots in Singapore
desc: Was searching for a good value and 4 star plus hotel central to Singapore sights and transport with a pool and the Park Royal on Beach Road did not disappoint. Arrived 7.30am and unfortunately we could t check in to our room so sat poolside in the shade with wifi for a few hours. Would have been good to have the coffee shop open there. Room once we got in was totally good, good decor and functional design. Didn’t have breakfast included so ate out. Easy place to come and go from with Hahi Lane and the MRT Lines super close. Gym was huge and equipment top notch - maybe more yoga mats would be good. Would return again.

title: Our preferred hotel in Singapore
desc: This is an exceptionally great hotel with extremely professional staff throughout. Late check in was smooth & we were in our room within a few minutes. Our stay here has always been perfect from start to end. One of the many reasons why we chose to always stay here when in Singapore. Location was great, hotel offered great amenities, service was top notch, I have to mention how Dillah & her team always try to accommodate & make us feel comfortable. Hotel also has an extremely good in house spa facility. Since our flight out was late night, we were given a late check out too. Overall, the experience exceeded our expectations time & time again.

title: well placed
desc: Well placed hotel in Singapore, easy to walk to places and the Turkish/Lebanese restaurants were literally across the road. Breakfast was good, the room fine and the bed was huge. Plenty of hot water. Staff were friendly. It's a city centre hotel so quite corporate but was ideal for a 2 night stay and worked well for us.

title: 17-Dec-22 Wedding Banquet
desc: A big thank you to ParkRoyal Beach Road Hotel for the fantastic service on my wedding day on 17-Dec-22. Whole process from checking in to banquet was perfect. Me and my wife would like to say a big thank you. Checking in was really a 5-Star service. Firstly the attendant was fast to attend to us and help us unload all the wedding stuff from the bridal car. The lady seated at 6th floor (Tiara), sorry that i could not remember correctly her name, attended to us quickly. We are very grateful for her service. She came prepared with most of the rooms checked in for us to use. The wedding suite is really wonderful, just that everything was very rush and sadly we did not have enough time to enjoy the room and the bathtub which we were very excited to use. If we can experience it

title: Holiday
desc: Very good! It was the fifth time we were visiting hotel Park Royal on Beach Road in Singapore. We feel at home in your hotel; everything was allright! The assistance, the breakfast, the bar, the pool and all the personal were very nice and correct!

title: Average on facilities , no veg room service , very good location
desc: Paying over 450/500 sing dollar per night and yet besides a pool no real facilities , no room service for vegetarians and while rooms were not avbl for early checkin they bachane avbl as soon as we offered 100 dollar extra charge. Surely they can do better on customer experience

title: Good Stay. However no bidet in our room toilet.
desc: It would have been excellent if there is a bidet in our room toilet. The hotel breakfast was one of the highlight of our stay. Location of the hotel is very close by to eateries. Overall still a good stay with Parkroyal.

title: Singapore tourist
desc: The hotel does not offer value for money as the service and condition is not up to a standard I would expect. I upgraded to a club room and found that the facilities were poor. It opens late and during the day apart from a few biscuits, hot and cold drinks they do not offer anything else! In the evening they have hot food and drinks which are not just average. Breakfast at the hotel is chaotic especially during the weekend. The quality of the food poor to average. If I had not paid for it I would not bother. There are long queues to get into breakfast and to get any service. The room was large but the smallest bathroom which you could not move in. Just a shower without a bath. My room faced the back of another building and it was very dark.

title: Family staycation
desc: very friendly staff towards elderly and special needs child. love the pool and scenic. staff at club room are very patient and caring towards us. They present good customer service which we see their genuineness.

title: Stay at Parkroyal Beach Road - where warm people warm your hearts!
desc: Ms Sophia Osman. You have my deepest sincerest gratitude for all your kind assistance during our recent visit. You made the check-in process so seamless. Your warmth has spread to all your staff on the ground. I also thank Felicia for being such an angel and updating me stuff timely. She is soft spoken however she was clear in her deliberation during the check-ins. I never get sick and tired of staying at Parkroyal @Beach Road. The ambience smelt happiness and spells out love and Warmth. I have recommended all my acquaintance to check out this hotel whenever they come to SG. This is home away from home- definitely! Love all of you!

title: Service could have been better
desc: Staff has to be more cooperative Hot water in wash basin of bathroom in cold water mixture too. Room service is very poor. My Discovery points not updated. Discovery no is 8099825126 Please get it updated for 3 rooms during my stay. Buffet breakfast had same menu for 5 days of my stay.

title: horrible stay and experience
desc: only book this hotel if you dont mind waiting 2 hours to check in after their stated check in time. (told us check in time was 3pm but we only checked in at 5pm. excuse given was “your room is not ready yet”. to put things into context, we booked our reservation 5 months ago) having paid full price for a 4 star hotel, we expected to have been at least greeted with a smile. kindly be informed we did not request for any service nor cause any inconvenience and yet still remained kind and friendly towards ALL the staff. as we arrived early, we placed our bags at the concierge. when collecting, the staff in charge was neither helpful or friendly. he gave us a discontented look on his face when we politely asked for our bags as we could not see it and would require help to retrieve

title: wonderful and great stay in Singapore!
desc: We spent four days and three nights in Singapore as a family. Dillah and her team gave us a very warm and friendly welcome. From the moment we arrived, we felt we were in very good hands and well looked after. The rooms are very comfortable, the beds are huge. The breakfast is outstanding, with local and international delicacies. Dillah and her team helped us with a big request, she was exceptionally generous and very helpful. We were in Singapore for the first time and learned to appreciate and love the wonderful city very much. Best wishes for 2023!

title: Good location
desc: The hotel was reasonable, pictures online are what you get really, we didn’t get a view but the location was perfect to explore Singapore with the time we had available. The staff were all sensational and as was the restaurant and buffet breakfast.

title: An average Staycation experience...
desc: First time at the property. Thought that the carpark was only at the front of the hotel. Upon checking with the staff, we were informed that there were more parking lot at the back. Signage at the back carpark were not clear, not clearing indicating if the ramp is entrance or exit. carpark is also share with Pan Pacific Serviced suite, made us wonder if that is the correct carpark. My upgraded room was not clearly stated. Booked a Deluxe King Room and upgraded to Pacific Club Deluxe King Room. When We were told that the Pacific Club is not entitled for Titanium member. It made me wonder again what the upgraded were. Upon checking, the staff double upgraded me to the premier room. Overall experience was alright as the room were newly renovated. but sound insulation was not great

title: Still lovely
desc: I’ve not been to the hotel since before the pandemic so was unsure what to expect. I was pleasantly surprised to see that the hotel has had a few upgrades. The reception area is now much lighter than it was before due to the refurbishment. The restaurant is also much lighter and fresh looking. It looks good! The staff are always super friendly as they always have been. On my way to the airport it was a peak time on the road but the concierge was so patient in finding me a taxi - took about 15 mins but she persisted until she could help me. The rooms appear the same as before. They are spacious, modern and so welcoming. I appreciated the additional tap in the bathroom so that I could fill my water bottle! The pool area is one of the most amazing parts of this hotel. So

title: Great stay for our two visits!
desc: We stayed at the Royal Plaza on Scotts Beach Road for two times, the first time during October 2022 and the second during January 2023, both for one night. The location of the hotel was close to Nicoll Highway MRT on the Circle Line, and if heading to the airport, it’s only a 15-20 minute journey on the highway. Checking in was swift and we even got an early check-in during our second visit! During our first visit, the room was very spacious as we were upgraded to a deluxe triple room rather than our deluxe double room, at 35 square meters. On our second visit, we were also upgraded once again, this time to the club room (although without the club lounge access). The hotel itself is slightly older, but facilities were still amazing. There’s a swimming pool and a gym which we’ve

title: PARKROYAL on Beach Road
desc: Business Trip Hotel. Great start from Check In, as could check in early and settle in before my meetings. Super fast and very professional service! Rooms not the biggest but a good size. Bathroom was a good size, especially the Shower Area. Breakfast was a good spread! And could even 'take away' my coffee to my room, as had to do some work emails catch up in my room. Great team from the Front Desk, Concierge to Resturant! Check Out super fast & smooth! Will definitely be back!

title: Disappointing
desc: This hotel was the very first stop on our honeymoon, the staff were friendly and at first glance it looked clean and modern. Then we got to our room… it was so dirty! Smears all over the mirrors, hairs everywhere in the bathroom and stains on the bed. Our first night was LOUD, chairs bring moved around at 2am and loud music. Night 2, NYE, this is when we discovered we were above the hotel “club”. On arriving back to our hotel after watching the fireworks, our whole room was shaking from the music. It was unbearable!!! My husband asked reception to turn it down, it did get quieter by 3am. We asked to move rooms, this one was quiet and clean. If only it had been like that from the start!

title: Fantastic in every way!:)
desc: I had the most fantastic experience at the Parkroyal Hotel Beach Road during my recent stay in Singapore. The hotel is magnificent, especially the twinkling lights on the forecourt as you enter at night. Dillah and her team are the most efficient, warmest and kindest I have ever met. They bent over backwards to ensure that I had the most amazing experience imaginable. Very late one night, while burning the midnight oil in their beautiful lounge, they even suprised me with a heavenly smoked whisky cocktail - the best I have ever had in my life! If I could give them 100 stars I would happily do so - you will see why when you stay there yourself;):) Peter

title: Hotel stop over
desc: Nothing was too much trouble for the staff- really helpful. Great location, walking distance to the bay but quite hot walk, underground nearby to rest of the city. Lovely pool ares to relax in, comfy rooms. Wide selection of breakfasts, all freshly prepared.

title: Absolutely recommended
desc: Very clean hotel in a good location, the service was very professional and all the staff were always very friendly. The rooms were always clean and very comfortable. The international breakfast was very rich and delicious. At the club inside the hotel they make very good cocktails and the staff was very friendly.

title: Mi Casa Experience at PARKROYAL Beach Road
desc: Service was E.X.C.E.L.L.E.N.T. Despite my many stays in other hotel chains, this is the only hotel which I felt at home. Checking in and out was a ultimate breeze and everyone in the hotel makes me feel right at home and comfortable.

title: Happy with my decision
desc: Booked Club Premier Room. Quite pleasant experience. Pros: - nice buffet breakfast, yunmy and full - club lounge refreshment, very tasty - free laundry for 2 items - attentive staff - comfortable bed, unlimited filter water - spacious room with bath - convenient location with bus stop right ahead hotel, MRT 5 mins walk - near Marina Bay Sands area. Suitable for those who do not love shopping like us but more of exploring city. Marina Bays Sands is so beautiful as well. - 7/11 next to the building, easily to buy ezlink cards and others Cons: - blocked view from balcony, anyway its raining all day too lol - private area for club guests in breakfast quite cold and dark, preferred more in ginger Hope that the hotel keep up the good work. Thanks for the memorable experience!

title: Staycation
desc: Nice place to stay.All the staff was friendly especially Ms Rosnah(front office)during our check in and give us good impression about this hotel.we enjoyed our stay here and would definitely come back again.

title: Nice Hotel, unfortunate events
desc: The hotel was nice, we had stayed here 12 years ago and the hotel was still in good condition, unfortunately my daughter's wallet was taken from the room with her Christmas money in it, I did inform reception but there was not much they could do as she hadn't put it in the safe. We stayed 4 nights and one of the nights she went sleepwalking in the corridor and I asked for cctv footage or for someone to view it to see how long she was in the corridor as we got a huge fright when she was knocking on our door at 3:30am in a state because she couldn't remember our room number. The staff said that they would need to raise an incident and didn't seem interested in helping me.

title: A convenient location!
desc: The staff were friendly. Checking in and out were easy and fast. Breakfast and dining atmosphere were nice. The location is close to arab street which is a wonderful place to explore. It is also close to an MRT station which is within 10 mins' walk. Except that the room was a bit cold and dry.

title: Be careful with holding deposit.
desc: This is a nice hotel its clean, lovely staff, good amenities and location. However the check-in process took over 40mins. They took a holding deposit of more than my booking by $800 to cover incidentals (had 2 rooms) I had already paid 2 nights deposit. Promised it would be refunded on the day of checkout (yes it was but not released on my card for 3-5 business day). Why they need to take this much money I really don’t understand when they have your credit card number. Very frustrating and disappointing. The front of the hotel has 5 steps to carry luggage up, so for the elderly or people with heavy luggage, not ideal.

title: Grand = Ganesan
desc: The hotel itself was excellent. Location and ease of access really really good. Check in at 12.30am seamless. The view from the pool especially at dusk…amazing with an uninterrupted view of Marina Sands and Singapore Flyer! Immediately provided a greater than 4 star feel which was then accompanied by the service which was most welcoming, most of the time. Where this elevated to ‘Grand’ was the help, care and guidance provided by Ganesan. His care was almost like I had known Ganesan for some time prior and yet I had only known him for a minute. Provided a peace of mind that was unparalleled! So, what would have been a 4 Star rating elevates to 5 Star due to Ganesan. For any travellers that get to experience Ganesan’s help, you will be better for it. Ganesan, thank you also for

title: Good as gold
desc: This hotel covers all the basic requirements very well. Clean, well appointed rooms, great breakfast and friendly accomodating staff. Great pool and gym facilities too. We asked for adjoining rooms for the children with 3 single beds and our requests were granted at no extra cost. I would stay here again. The hotel is well located and represented fair value for money in downtown Singapore.

title: Staff can't do enough for you
desc: The staff absolutely make this place. Everybody is friendly, warm and welcoming. One of us had a suitcase left behind in London and they were so good at helping us to get this back. Dan and Dilla were amazing. The hotel is spotless. Had a great stay

title: Excellent Service
desc: I cannot fault this hotel, it was amazing. All staff were friendly, helpful and informative. I lost my suitcase at the airport and Dilla and Dan (concierge staff) were very helpful with contacting the airline and trying to track my luggage for me. Hotel is located very close to various site seeing locations all walking distance or close to transport links. The concierge staff were very helpful in organising a taxi for us. All facilities were fantastic, lovely room and pool and delicious buffet breakfast and dinner at the Ginger restaurant. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Great to be back
desc: It was great to be able to go back to Singapore after 3 years!! The hotel has had a few renovations, including the bar Club 5, which is much nicer than it was. We were pleased to see some familiar faces still working in the club lounge, Christina and Esther and the 2 new ladies Miew and Dyatiana made our stay as enjoyable as it has been in the past. One difference being that the breakfast is now in the main restaurant and not served in the club lounge which we did enjoy in the past.

title: Trainingi
desc: Park Royal feels like a home away from home. The breakfast is sumptuous, the room is superb and the location is fantastic, near to business and commercial centers. Above all else, what standout is the very professional, awesome and helpful assistance in Concierge particularly Dillah and her team. They assisted me in getting a cab since I am new in Singapore. Their service is above of what is expected from them. They really care for the guest and will extend their professional help to make their stay memorable and convenient. I definitely recommend this hotel. Kudos to Dillah and her team. Two thumbs up to Royal Park Hotel Beach Road.

title: Helpful concierge in moment of panic
desc: This is where I am for the last 2 days & worked out really awesome for me as my office was the next building.. This is definitely one place you will want to stay in ur next Singapore visit. While there rooms n food is gd enough what impressed me the most was the people around like the desk executives n more importantly the concierge I had the shock of my life when I forgot my mobile on my way to the hotel & trust me that sent me in a panic mode.. The front desk executive guided me to the concierge Mr.Ganesan who took a lot of efforts to actually connect to the cab company & help me get back my mobile.. Hats off to this gentleman for his helpful attitude & I believe people like him make the staying experience a notch better👌👍👏 I give a 5/5 to this hotel.. Do experience

title: Really Homy, all the staff is amazing and helpful, deff recommended you to stay here while at Singapore
desc: Really Homy, all the staff is amazing and helpful, deff recommended you to stay here while at Singapore. with your family is even better! The food and the view from the pool is really good, its really near to all the tourism attractions

title: Service with a smile
desc: We arrived from UK at 0900,far too early to checkin,sorbet let us shower in the spa. Dollar and the continent's team looked after the bags but also helped us find a restaurant serving malayan food, which was excellent ( see review of Malayan council)

title: CNY Staycay
desc: The breakfast not bad but was overcrowded. Food was not replenished as there is lack of manpower. Room was not soundproof as you can hear loud noises from your side and opposite room. The floor level is short, a maximum of 7, i think. So, i was in the level 4 for a Deluxe Room. Not too bad scenery. Opposite was the Arab Street view.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Excellent hotel - well positioned within walking distance of two metro stations. Lively Arab area opposite with numerous restaurants. Comfortable, really good breakfast. Bar with music and good cocktails. Gym and pool. Thank you to Dills and Team for friendly hospitality.

title: Fantastic Location
desc: This hotel was in the most fantastic location. Most attractions 20-30 mins walk with Haji Lane and Arab St just across the road for fabulous food. We had our first dinner just up the road at the Golden Mile food court which looks unappealing but be brave and eat there as the food was super cheap, local dishes and delicious. The room was enormous with the biggest bed I've ever slept in...maybe a super king?? All staff were very friendly always making eye contact and saying hello. The entire complex was always very clean. Although located on a busy road we never heard traffic noise. A great stay and would highly recommend.

title: Very comfortable stay
desc: Lovely relaxing stay in a comfortable room. Specially after or before a long flight, location Beach Road is close to famous Raffles Hotel, plenty of other restaurants within walking distance. Pubic transport within walking distance.

title: Best Swimming Pool
desc: Our second time staying here. Rooms are a good size with a comfy bed and soft pillows. Modern bathroom with walk in shower. I think the hotel has had a refurb since our last visit 3 years ago. Friendly staff. Excellent gym and amazing large swimming pool and sun deck area with sun beds. Only a 20-30min walk to most attractions but near MRT. Bars and restaurants over the road too with a 7-11 on site. Definitely come back again.

title: None
desc: I am very pleased and really appreciate to Housekeeping Associates who cleaning my room during my stay for 2 weeks. I felt just like coming back to my home whenever I came back from outside because of the cleaning room and arranging my books, files and clothes neat and tidy.

title: Very nice hotel in an intetesting area.
desc: Very nice hotel in an interesting area. Good transport links. Rooms are well equipped and beds very comfortable. Cleanliness of hotel was excellent. Nice pool. Breakfast was decent with a good selection on offer. Staff friendly and helpful at all times

title: Comfortable Stay
desc: Clean spacious rooms, ideal location with a few min walk to several shopping malls and a lot of restaurants. Bathroom was clean with a drinking water filter. I just wish they had a bidet in all rooms as they advertise having one in their page but mine didn’t. The Room has coffee and tea facilities and a mini fridge. Beds are big and comfortable. There is a 7 Eleven in the hotel B floor for quick drinks or snacks Breakfast had a lot of varieties between regular western breakfast (eggs, cheese, etc) and a lot of asian varieties.

title: Wedding Celebration event.
desc: Both Ivy, Director of Catering and Elgin, Banquet Operations were awesome. They were there to assist with our numerous requests to ensure we had a well executed wedding event for our couple and family. Our couple and their guests were very impressed with the ballroom space. Highly recommend this hotel to host your wedding celebration or corporate events. Will definitely come back again to book our next wedding event!

title: None
desc: service from the time the cab pulled up till the end was amazing they couldn't do enough for you location is in the middle of everywhere we went cleanness, was amazing food was amazing and food staff are out of this world amazing

title: Recommend NOT to choose this hotel
desc: First of all, the room we got was at fifth floor. When we got into the room we could feel a “wet” smell and bedding stuff were wrt too. On the next day our 2.5 years’ old son got sick with allergic reaction on the face and a fever. I didn’t really associate these two things together until day 3, that my son was still not getting well. So I went down to reception asking if all of their rooms are “wet” or if we could maybe change a room to try. Surpassingly the lady at reception first was complaining that we should have reported this on day 1. Then she further said they could not do anything. When I insisted asking if anything can be done, all of sudden another person showed up and magically they could have another room available despite they said all fully booked. During our

title: Dillah is very helpful in ans our queries and solve our issue. She made our dining a pleasant one!! Thanks to her!!
desc: Dillah is very helpful in answering our queries and making our stay and dinning a pleasant one at ParkRoyal @ Beach Road hotel. Thank you very much! She solved our problems. Thanks a lot!! Give her 5 star reviews!! She deserved a lot!! she is very helpful!!

title: Great hotel, friendly staff
desc: Stayed 2 nights. Very pleased with the amenities-lovely pool in the 4th floor, great breakfasts in the Ginger lounge, catering for everyone. Enjoyed the Club 5 bar, where we had cocktails and bar snacks. Not a great view out of our 2nd floor window, but didn't bother us too much. Comfortable, huge bed. Could have done with another towel rail in the bathroom - one small one was insufficient. No milk or creamer with the tea/coffee in the room. Concierge /porters were very helpful, especially Dan, who was keen to help and friendly. A convenient location, where we could walk to Raffles in 15 mine and Gardens by the Bay in 30mins. Would recommend this hotel.

title: Excellent Choice
desc: We really enjoyed this hotel accommodation, meeting, events and restaurant facilities for our business meeting. Everyone was happy and staff of this hotel are always smiling and ready to help. We were very happy and will choose this hotel again for our next projects

title: Made to feel not welcome .
desc: Breakfast not the best we have experienced in Singapore. Asked to leave the bar as booked for a corporate event. When asked where we could get a drink in the hotel told we would have to go into the street. Clearly corporate is more important than guests .

title: Business Trip
desc: Excellent Room, decent breakfast, Clean and Tidy, Bus Stop just in front of the hotel, a bit far from MRT station. Not far from Suntec and Marina. Near to Bugis and just across the street there are a lot of restaurant for foodies.

title: None
desc: I chose this hotel because it is a short walk to the F1 paddock which was the venue for the MetaSprint Series Duathlon. The location was perfect for that. My only feedback is in relation to the dining room experience which was very busy, noisy and crowded and as a vegetarian I found the options quite limited. but the staff were nice and helpful and I am not a big breakfast person so it served its purpose, although a quieter space would have been nice.

title: Great stay in a fabulous hotel
desc: Great hotel, amazing facilities and friendly team. This is my second time staying at a ParkRoyal in Singapore (last year was Marina Bay) and whilst both hotels are amazing, this is perfectly located if you want to explore the Arab part of the city. The weather was a little rainy during our stay but we were able to make the most of the executive lounge whilst waiting for the rain to stop. Long review short, stay here! Highly recommended

title: Excellent
desc: We stayed for 3 nights on a stopover to NZ. We had a standard room with breakfast. The room had everything you would want with lots of shelf space, good bathroom with a great shower and an excellent bed. There is a drinking water tap in the bathroom which is super for filling up water bottles. We have found all of the staff to be very helpful and welcoming. The pool is great with a pleasant view toward Marina Bay Sands. Breakfast is served in Ginger Restaurant and the usual breakfast options. We found one of the hotels best features was its location. It’s a short walk to Bugis MRT ( we used our credit card to tap in and out at the MRT barriers and it literally cost pence to go to Gardens by the Bay etc!). There are a variety of restaurants opposite the hotel on Bussorah

title: None
desc: Very disappointing. This is my fifth trip to Singapore in 10 years. I usually stay in 5* hotels, but was assured by my tour operator that this was as good. Struggling to achieve 3 1/2 * in my opinion. 24 hr room service which stops at 2300hrs, no milk in rooms for tea in the morning only coffee mate, only one bar(which had loud music) in which to savour a glass of wine, unless you wanted to drink in your room. No other public seating areas where you could relax with an alcoholic drink. Single glassed window in bedroom resulting in road traffic noise and early wake up call at 0600hrs to call to prayer. Ludicrously small bathroom which you couldn't have both WC and shower door open at the same time. Just because you squeeze a 2 seater sofa and low table into an already small room

title: None
desc: Breakfast is really not satisfying, poor selection of local dishes, only one soup option, sushi just two options and almost all the time empty trays, very slow replenishment of ended dishes, slow service of stuff, long waiting time to be seated.

title: Perfect place to stay in Singapore.
desc: Stayed for two nights to revisit Singapore. Park Royal the perfect location to access main attractions and shopping. Hotel facilities and staff excellent. Superior room probably had the biggest bed I've ever slept in! Would highly recommend the property to anyone.

title: Well located and very comfortable hotel
desc: Close to Bugis MRT and Bugis Junction mall, I stayed in this hotel while working in Singapore. Great breakfast, comfortable room and beautiful swimming pool. Staff were very helpful. Across the road you have Kampong Glam, with lots of amazing places to eat.

title: Highly recommend the ParkRoyal on Beach Road, Singapore.
desc: Special thanks to Dan at the Concierge’s Desk for his very friendly help in organizing my travel arrangements for myself and my daughter’s family. Also the recent refurbishment is delightful. I have stayed at the ParkRoyal on many occasions over many years, and it is always my first choice in Singapore.

title: Compliment for sales - sharon
desc: Would really like to compliment a sales staff - sharon. Her service/attitude towards customer is exceptional. I’ve been to so many hotels to scout for my wedding venue, and parkroyal beach road was one of them. I really want to compliment her proactiveness and follow ups. I admire her attitude towards work. She’s definitely a staff the company wants to keep. She have been very nice and kind to follow up on my interest to hold my wedding there. Even though my final choice was not at PRBR, I still want to compliment Sharon. Good job! Excellence! All the best for your career!

title: Lovely Stay
desc: Would highly recommend this Hotel. Park Royal @ beach road is great ! Everything for us was top notch..from front desk to staff to service to room to breakfast..everything was just ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ I accidentally left my chain behind and on the very same day if check out the Hotel emailed me to let me know and they kept it for me. Truly appreciate it.

title: Singapore stay @ Park Royal Beach Road
desc: We stayed at Park Royal Beach Road for 4 nights. During my stay, i was initially offered a room with view of the entrance roof. This was quickly changed by Jessie (front desk staff) upon my request which was exceptional. Jessie was very polite, accommodating and also assisted us with any questions and requests. We also managed to get a late checkout (complimentary) till 3pm due to late flight. The superior room was spacious and comfortable and nice hot shower. We found the breakfast quite disappointing as the menu was the same every day and less vegetarian options. For the price and quality of hotel like Park Royal, I expect a variety of cuisine for breakfast. The gym and swimming pool was awesome.

title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: We spent 4 nights in March 2023 on a stop over from Sydney to London and needed a hotel to relax in after a hard days sightseeing. The hotel is large, but you get a feeling that you are welcome with all staff that we had contact with friendly and attentive. The check in was easy and we were in an Delux Room on the 5th floor - views were off the main road. The room was clean a spacious and had a very large king bed. There was enough room for a small settee and a desk, but still felt spacious. Initially the bed felt damp, but we put this down to the high humidity and the fact the air conditioning wasn’t on when we arrived. Shower was excellent and there was shampoo and body wash in the shower. The breakfast buffet was excellent with everything you would need, including a chef to

title: A good place to stay overall
desc: We stayed for 2 nights and upgraded to a Club Lounge room. Our room was very large and comfortable but we felt that the bathroom was way too small in comparison. The Club lounge was pleasant and the canapés and drinks (6-7pm) were varied and enjoyable. The staff there were charming. During the day (from 11am) there was access to soft drinks, tea and coffee and some biscuits. Breakfast was not being served in the lounge which was a pity. On our first morning the restaurant was incredibly busy and the staff seemed to be struggling to cope. Dishes were not topped up, plates were cold as was much of the buffet food. The second morning was better but the food was still not hot enough and we were unable to get any coffee. The swimming pool area is lovely but there were not enough

title: None
desc: Good experience in the hotel, breakfast with different taste/flavors, service includes laundry quite convenient. People helps me clean the room and folded my cloths. I felt very warm and lovely while staying here

title: None
desc: Hotel is very tired and in need of an update. I would not consider this property to be a 5 star standard. Breakfast was average. And the hotel in room dining terrible - no vegetarian options at all. However, the location is great, right in the heart of Kampong Glam. Very close to eateries and bars.

title: None
desc: I enjoyed staying at this hotel. Overall experience was very pleasant. Mr. Dan, the concierge was very friendly and helpful. I would return to this hotel in future. Rooms on higher floors are quieter. Well equipped gym and a large swimming pool.

title: Limited experience
desc: Very brief 1 night stay - checked in at 1 am & out at 12 noon the next day. The room was fine - the bed was a little on the firm side, but OK & the air-con was a little noisy, but again OK. Didn’t get a chance to try the restaurant or pool etc.

title: Wedding venue service
desc: I will like to compliment Sharon for assisting me in the my wedding banquet search. She has been very patient and responsive. She take charge of the request and get back to us very promptly. I will definitely introduce people to her as her service is top notch good

title: Experienced Singapore traveller
desc: Unless you enjoy loud music and loud people, poor restaurant and bar service and food, this hotel is not for you. It seems to be catering for corporate and event organisation. We had dirty cups in the room, one day no towels. Avoid club 5 at all costs.

title: A very pleasant stay and well located.
desc: Generally we were very happy with our stay at Park Royal Beach Rd. We had a few issues with our air conditioning which did not work for 2 of our 3 night stay. Also water filter in the bathroom was very slow without pressure.

title: Great location good sized room. Friendly staff
desc: Excellent location great staff. Ginger restaurant buffet breakfast was superb. We were part of a large party heading to the cruise port and we were all impressed with the Hotel. Would highly recommend this Hotel. The room was spacious which was great as previous visits to Singapore to other Hotels have been tiny. This Hotel exceeded our expectations.

title: Park Royal Beach Road
desc: I had a fantastic stay on the property. I was warmly welcomed by Esther at the Club Lounge during check-in. She immediately recognised me as both a GHA Titanium as well as a returning guest. Administration was completed in minutes. Esther, Tia and Miew kept the drinks flowing during the evening cocktail hours. Kudos to the chef(s) for great evening cocktail dining. Nice variety and choice between the 2 evenings. The 3 ladies did well to manage the evening crowd. I have to mention Asiah at Ginger. It is surely challenging to manage morning breakfast during weekends on the property, and especially so when it is the singapore rugby sevens weekend. Asiah is exceptional as always and Ginger was very well staffed. It was a great stay and I look forward to be back again soon.

title: Beautiful Singapore
desc: Great location and pleasant stay. Public transport is easily accessible from the hotel. Shopping malls are all over, such as Bugis Junction and Suntec City. Very friendly and helpful staff, particularly Dan.

title: Great stay
desc: Dan from the concierge/front door always greeted us with a smile and was helpful and friendly. Pool was large and refreshing after a day out. Hotel is a short walk away from Nichol Hwy MRT station that we used regularly. King size bed was extra large and comfortable. We had a problem with our bar fridge and it was immediately replaced with a new one. A short walk over to Arab St and other attractions.

title: Average, club floor not worth booking. Lovely staff
desc: Staff were charming and helpful. Hotel facilities poor. Club Floor definitely bad value as lounge is provides very little except between 6 and 8pm Bathroom very small. Housekeeping service poor - had to chase for many basic items such as tea bags, teaspoons laundry bags, laundry lists. Bath robe was tiny, unwearable but we were told they were "one size"

title: Definitely recommend
desc: Location great. Staff very friendly and helpful. Room great - spacious, Aircon and very comfy bed. Breakfast fabulous - the choice and quality was fab. Check-in and Check-out easy and straightforward. The only issue we had was the view from our room (there wasn't one) but we were hardly in the room so it didn't matter too much.

title: Not a 4 star hotel
desc: Had to switch rooms multiple times. First room was a split EK, which has a crevasse down the middle of the bed. For my size, if my arm or leg gets in that crevasse it will cause it to fall asleep or be tweaked when I wake up. Who even has a Split Eastern King, its also international industry not the same advertising as an eastern King. I know I make 15,000 luxury beds for a living. Then the next room the AC did not work, tried for 3 hours, and gave up The next room the AC did not work and Smelled like moldy carpet, I even had a hotel employee at the room with me, I asked if she smelled it, and she denied it from the hallway. never coming into room, with her mask on..... I go to the pool, hey maybe I just need fresh air, come back 2 hours later, and the room smells worse and

title: Lovely hotel
desc: Great hotel, staff were helpful and polite. Location perfect , close to MRT station. Hotel was clean, food in the ginger restaurant was nice, and the breakfast was lovely with a very good selection of food. Overall lovely stay

title: great time
desc: great position, close to MRT and right opposite Arab Street for fantastic food. great pool. clean rooms, good breakfast. easy check in and check out. i thought that was all i had to say, but apparently i need to write a minimum of 200 characters to submit a review, so therefore i have just rambled on now.

title: Lizard fell from roof
desc: Stayed here one night on our honeymoon and we booked the best room available, $450 per night. At first glance hotel was nice but as we stayed there we realised the shower seat is in the way of the shower head, the elevator was dripping water whenever we stepped in and out and to top it all off, my wife opened our room door and a lizard fell on her shoulder. We spoke to management about this and their excuse was that because we’re on the highest level and there’s trees around, they didn’t even offer to give us the night for free, they only offered us a free cab ride to another hotel if we chose to move hotels. I would not recommend this hotel at all.

title: Parkroyal on Beach Road - Club Lounge
desc: The rooms were a decent size, and made up each day by friendly staff. The pool are was wonderful and the club lounge great. The staff Miew and Tia in the club lounge were extremely friendly and welcoming, I will miss their friendly faces and service.

title: Nice hotel to stay in
desc: Nice hotel, location is perfect. Very clean. Good breakfast. Best expectations. Club lounge is perfect. Actually next trip i will do the same hotel, club room. Outdoor pool. Concierge service is perfect. All stuff king

title: Flawless
desc: We had our wedding held at the this hotel. Sharon from the catering team managed and helped coordinate our wedding. Despite the short time line given to her to get everything done, she did her job professionally without any complains and with a smile. Her indepth knowledge and experience managing weddings made our life so easy and I would strongly recommend anyone to have her as the wedding coordinator. The staffs at the hotel were very friendly and well trained. The stay at this hotel was near flawless. Would highly recommend!

title: Great hotel for business!
desc: Was there for business, hosting a group. Had a great experience at Parkroyal on Beach Raod! They had some of the most sincere staff I've encountered. Special thank you to Dan from the concierge team, Eljin and Selina from the Banquet team and Diem from the House keeping team! They were quick to attend to my request and are perfect representatives to the hotel! Rooms were clean and spacious. Catered food was delicious and you could see that the kitchen team put in a lot of effort to create the dishes! Will be happy to work with the team again!

title: Excellent as usual
desc: Good choice with professional service. Bed is very comfortable.I had an issue with WI-FI in my room on first day but staff can coordinate with IT vendor and fixed it within just an hour. Buffet at ginger is ok.

title: Family holiday
desc: What a wonderful stay from start to finish. We arrived at 7.30am from long flight and staff were so accommodating. We were offered a shower and could use all pool facilities as our room wasn’t ready. We had a superior room which was huge. Beds were great and foldaway bed for my son was nice and big. Great choice for breakfast of local and western food and it wasn’t too busy. The pool area was lovely and had a nice snack and drinks menu a great place to chill after a day walking. The hotel is directly opposite haji lane and Arab street which are vibrant with great places to eat. Recommend the blue jazz cafe. It’s also within east walking distance to places and bugis MTR. I wouldn’t hesitate to stay again

title: Price value relation for short business stay ok
desc: Hotel in Beach road good location with bus connections and nearby MRT but rooms need some renovations / upgrades …. interior a bit older and outdated key charging stations are missing… for pool lovers excellent pool area, Club level excellent staff and very friendly service

title: Overnight stop
desc: Reception desk very helpful and pleasant. Limited tea/coffee in room. No milk and when requested was advised a charge so not complimentary. Only stayed for transfer flight. Close to airport and used Grab for transport to and from.

title: Definitely recommend!
desc: The staff were amazing and very helpful, especially Sam at the concierge! Every morning we had a beautiful buffet breakfast. The beds we so comfortable and soft. At the pool there is a great view of the Singapore flyer and the marina by the sands buildings. Overall it was a really great hotel and definitely recommend!

title: Run fast and far horrible buggies hotel
desc: Our stay was a negative star. This hotel gets zero stars . It was horrible. It smelled of mildew so bad on the fourth floor. Their were bugs on the counter and in the restroom. I told the cleaning people. It appears the situation was resolved. It is so old and ancient from the furniture to the restaurants. We never ate their We stayed gone all day in order not to be discussed!!! The staff has nice

title: Pleasant Stay & Lovely Surrounds
desc: A well located hotel in lively Kampong Glam with extremely helpful friendly staff. We stayed in a club room on the 7th floor. The balcony was great and the room was clean and functional. Breakfast was very good with plenty of offerings - the omelettes and pancakes were top notch. Suggestions to enhance the hotels standing would be a dedicated movie channel in the room and the club lounge offering more snacks during the afternoon (eg some small cakes to accompany the biscuits). A very big thank you to Dytiana, Esther & Miew from the club lounge. Three lovely ladies who were very personable, attentive and fun to chat to each evening!! Regards R&H - Perth, Western Australia.

title: Good location, nice ambience and sumptuous food
desc: This is the second time I came here. This time to attend a cybersecurity summit at the Grand Ballroom. I could feel a welcoming ambience in the air as the friendly and courteous staff greeted me. The hotel is located in close proximity to Kampong Glam, a touristy Muslim enclave. As I was early for the summit, I decided to roam around the enclave exploring the heritage trails. I wandered along the colorful and hip Haji Lane and Bali Lane, appreciating the photogenic wall graffiti. At the Sultan Gate, I stood there admiring the impressive Indo-saracenic architectural style of the Masjid Sultan and the row of decorative Turkish restaurants at Bussorah Street. At Kampong Glam Park, I was puzzled by the `leaning tower' of the Hajjah Fatimah Mosque. Staying at this hotel is a

title: Ur Bellhops especially Mr Sini was excellent n dedicted staff. U nid more staffs like him as Ambassador.
desc: Excellent housekeeping. Everything is in place. Room well lit. All information r there for us. Room service receptionist . The hotel lobby make us feel we r at home. The bar service r marvelous. We will not gv a second thought of comng again.

title: Decent hotel at good price
desc: Good quality hotel. Decent breakfast. Very clean room and comfortable bed and duvet. Club 5 is good for late night drinks. Big outside pool and sunbathing area.handy location for catching the downtown buses right outside

title: Great central location for exploring Singapore
desc: This hotel was very convenient for exploring Singapore and had a lovely swimming pool to relax in at the end of the day. The room was large, comfortable and quiet. So much so that we caught up on sleep and recovered from jet lag very quickly. We enjoyed using this hotel as a base to explore Singapore over the three days we were there.

title: Average service
desc: The hotel is located literally between 2 busy roads, making its location quite unremarkable. The rooms are large enough, but would need to be better maintained (the door of the closet was broken and not fixed during my stay, although I mentioned the problem). The view from the rooms is rather poor, which can be explained by the shape of the building : 6 stories only and very long. Lunch at the restaurant was nice, but cocktails at the bar were extremely disappointing. Finally the next part of the hotel is the pool, which is large and not busy.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: Size of room is spacious with comfy bed and nice pillows. Our second time staying here. Checking in is wonderful, swift and warm. Club lounge staffs Miew and Tia are extremely welcoming, helpful and friendly. Their services are excellent throughout and they are very attentive. We are very happy and much appreciated being served by them. Thank you very much! Will be back.

title: Great stay at PARKROYAL on Beach Road Singapore
desc: We loved the hotel's location, being conveniently close to various tourist spots and easily accessible to bus stops and shopping centers. One night, we had a blast exploring the lively bar scene in Haji Lane. Our time at PARKROYAL on Beach Road was short but incredibly memorable. The spacious, beautifully furnished suites with stunning city views added a touch of magic to our stay. The Herman Miller chair in the suite was a delightful treat for my husband, who made great use of the functional desk. The thoughtful Father's Day greeting and assorted sweets prepared by your team made us feel truly welcome. We couldn't resist the tempting breakfast spread, especially the heavenly croissants. Unlimited coffee was caffeine lovers' dreams. Leaving the breakfast table feeling

title: Singapore Visit - Great Hotel Close to Bugis, Eateries and the MRT.
desc: This was our first trip to Singapore since COVID19 ...this year we began our stay with a lovely plate of fruit, cake and chocolate put together by the wonderful staff at Parkroyal on Beach Road which made us feel very welcome. Firstly we would like to thank Dillah who ensured our stay exceeded our expectations and helped us to have a great vacation in Singapore. We stayed on the 6th floor Club Rooms which are stylish, very comfortable and clean. If you prefer a dark and quiet room for a good nights sleep the Club Rooms are highly recommended. Being able to go into the Club Rooms during the day for hot and cold beverages and especially in the evening for cocktails and a light meal between 6pm and 8pm (all inclusive) was excellent. The only thing missing from our club room

title: Would return
desc: Clean, well managed and comfortable. Breakfast was varied. Well positioned in Singapore. Pool and Spa are nice and well kept. I would stay here again. Spacious and clean rooms with attentive room service. Air con can be a bit intense. Great hotel

title: Great place nearby Arab Street, Singapore
desc: Great location nearby the Sultan Mosque, Arabic Street. Hotel Guest room was great. Employees are attentive, helpful and efficient. Breakfast variety are great as they provide us with healthy and fresh food.

title: No vegetarian food
desc: I stayed here for 5 days as part of training program. Being Indian I have shared food preference as vegetarian for Breakfast and Lunch. Inspite of giving a month ahead preferences, the hotel did not have any good vegetarian food options. I was starving during my stay

title: Top location. Impressive roof top pool
desc: Had a lovely 2 night stay at the Park Royal. Rooms are very spacious and modern and clean. The roof top pool area is impressive and you get sweeping views across Singapore from it. The staff are very friendly and are always very accommodating. It is also very close to a lot of Singapores big attractions. Highly recommended

title: Unplanned additional 24 hours Singapore
desc: Excellent service as per my expectation of Park Royal brand!!! Friendly and helpful staff! After a stressful morning ( airport/ flight issues)really appreciated the porter collecting bags from our taxi and delivering to our rooms!! Well done! Restaurant service and meal too were 👍🏻👍🏻

title: bad hotel
desc: very bad smell the floor has. the check in takes very long time and the hotel is very old. the lobby is ok but the rooms are not. the AC is too cold and can not control it. the pool is very far. I do not recommend this hotel at all. it is also expensive

title: Value for money not bed but nothing special
desc: Bed was nice and big. Room is decent size amanities are ok but not spectacular. No coffe machine in the room. Breakfast is over at 10.30 which considering the time difference might be a little longer. Breakfast also a little weak for a such level hotel. Could be much better. Location is nice close to Arab quarter and walking distance from little India. Concierge is also very week mostly calling taxi but no suggestions for restaurant reservations.

title: Excellent Stay
desc: Had a great staycation here, was lucky to be upgraded to a Premier Room with balcony and view of Singapore Flyer. The Club Lounge is really nice, food and drinks during special hours. The staff Esther and Miew are very kind and friendly, they make sure I am well taken care, thank you for your servitude. I look forward to come back again for staycation.

title: Comfy and quiet rooms. A good business hotel
desc: Stayed here for conference held on site. Quiet rooms, large comfortable bed and pillows. Good gym and pool area and breakfast was also very good. Staff ok, not unfriendly, but not welcoming either. Opposite Arab quarter which is a cool area to explore. Only downside with stay was the constant smell of cigarette smoke through the AC. My colleagues didn’t seem to have this problem so perhaps just my room.

title: Great experience
desc: I really like the place very nice to chill and relax. The service, facilities, service and food are awesome. We will come back again for sure. I really recommend the place to my friend who will visit singapore.

title: A good stay
desc: A wonderful hotel to unwind after a trip. Good service provided by the friendly staff from the front desk and the club lounge, Jessie, Miew and Tia have made the stay even more memorable. Please convey my thanks to the ladies for the amazing work.

title: Good
desc: Excellent location, the room I got was facing the mosque. Nice rooms, good amenities. I would surely return to this hotel in my next visit. Elaborate buffet breakfast. There is one thing which I was not comfortable with, steps to lobby, I was carrying a big heavy suitcase and lifting it and reaching the lobby is not ideal way.

title: Park Royal , Beach Road
desc: Stay at Park Royal was excellent Staff was very helpful Close proximity of MRT , Arab Street etc They can improve on the club lounge beverages section by including choice in whisky and beer . Else the overall experience was very good

title: Highly recommended
desc: My husband and I stayed there for 14 days and it was a pleasant stay. Great location, very welcoming and friendly staff who were extremely helpful. Especially Viky he was a delightful and helpful porter. Since we have access at the Club Lounge, these ladies made sure that we are well taken care of. Thank you so much Miew, Tia, Esther, Mia and Tina for making our stay extra great! We will definitely coming back again.

title: Satisfied Guest Returned
desc: As the title reviewed, satisfied guest returned and still coming back. Precisely, besides the comprehensive facilities, the hotel staff were helpful, accommodating and served with passion and smiles. Certainly an asset to the Organisation. Specially mention and applaud the following staff for their good service. Front Office : Ganesan and Dillah Club Lounge : Christina, Esther and Dytiana Ginger Restaurant : Asiah and Choon Lian Club 5 : Rino and Richard. I will be back again.

title: my favourite hotel in singapore!
desc: I think the location of this hotel is brilliant. you are opposite the colourful ethnic haji road and the turkish area with a stunning mosque. there is Bugis Metro station close by. many restaurants in the Duo complex and a fantastic supermarket connected to the station called Cold Storage. the gym is excellent along with the pool facilities. the room is comfortable and well maintained. the filtered drinking water is a great addition as you can use for all your drinking water without any plastic! the room provides robe and slippers to use to the pool/spa.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: We loved our stay at Parkroyal on Beach Rd. The rooms are beautifully furnished and staff are so friendly . It’s right across the road from Arab st and only a very short ride to all major attractions. If you stay in the club rooms the extra services are well worth the money and excellent .

title: Horrible Suite Experience. Not worth the amount paid.
desc: Horrible check in experience for my suite stay. 1700 for 2 nights and at check in i was denied amending 1 guests (which was selected mistakenly) to 2 as it was a couple staycation for a dance festival held at the hotel. "Number of guests is per booking confirmation". This inflexibility is ridiculous given how many hotels ive stayed world wide and never had this rule, much less for a suite booking. My partner had to pay for lounge benefits on top of the money we paid for 2 nights stay. Unacceptable. Similarly, the same staff member denied my late check out request only for another staff, whom i asked separately, offer us 2pm check out. Clearly, its the lady staff who was inflexible and unyielding, not hotel rules. As a new member and suite guest the entire experience

title: Wonderful hotel highly recommend
desc: My husband and I stayed at the Parkroyal on beach road for 11 nights in June on the way to Thailand and another 9 nights in the way home from Thailand. Only word to describe this hotel and staff and facilities is excellent and wonderful. Rooms modern, comfortable, big and well maintained. Pool big, clean well serviced and beautiful surroundings with a lot of lounges available. Hotel itself was renovated, modern, clean and very welcoming. Reception friendly with easy check in and check out. Concierge staff were so incredibly friendly, helpful and always on the look out for one’s needs. A very special mention must go to Viky at concierge desk. My husband stayed here on business 8 or so years ago and he remembered him. We left luggage here for safe keeping through him on our onward

title: Excellent hotel
desc: My wife and I stayed at the Parkroyal for 9 nights in June before heading to Thailand then back again for a further 9 nights after Thailand in July 2023. One one best describes this hotel and our stay here and that is Excellent. Hotel is renovated , clean, well maintained, has a beautiful large pool. Beds are very comfortable so are pillows and the room is large. Located across the road from Arab street and haj lane a main tourist spot. Eateries around this area can be very expensive but we found a fantastic hawker center called golden Mike hawker center. Great eateries with good food and cheap. Hotel staff are excellent from reception to cleaning to pool staff and concierge staff. I can’t find any negatives about staying here . We’ll priced and definitely a 4 star hotel with 5

title: Highly recommended
desc: Great location, welcoming and friendly staff who were extremely helpful, beautiful buffet breakfast, early check in Viky was a delightful and helpful porter Close to bugis street mall and MRT (10 min) walk Highly recommended

title: Not worth your money
desc: Booked a club premier room - horrible experience as the aircon did not work at all; tv remote control was also not functioning! Room service was also quite slow. Buffet breakfast food was not the best

title: Great Service and more...
desc: Great service, great location and great swimming pool, great food! Especial thank you to the staffs of 6th floor, Esther, Miew, Tia, Christina, more...you ladies are great and thank you for providing a wonderful and friendly trip!

title: Weekend getaway
desc: Went to Parkroyal Beach Road for weekend gateway Reached the hotel after walk. The lobby is nice and spacious. You can order meal online at lobby table and staff from Ginger will bring meal to your table at lobby area. Check in was effortless. Went to room for brief inspection Went to pool , the pool is of varying dept. Sat on kid pool and let jet of water massaged my back. Then went to pool bar to order fruit platter Menu at pool bar nothing much , no cocktail, just beer , wine and some spirits I had made booking for seat at Club 5 bar The bar got more cocktail and Bacha Coffee ( u can order one pot of coffee and food) I had soft shell crab snack and Singapore Buck ( speciality cocktail) Soft shell crab with spicy sauce .- very yummy! Singapore Buck cocktail- strong

title: ROYAL service at PARKROYAL
desc: The royal service I received, speaks for the hotel's name PARKROYAL. Excellent people, Excellent service ! The room is big, clean and comfortable. The room is nice but it cannot be complete without good staff & service. It is worth the value and I will not hesitate to recommend to fiends & relatives to stay with PARKROYAL

title: Great Staff & Accommodation
desc: Room was perfect - very clean & tidy, the bed & pillows so comfy & shower great Staff very helpful especially Jessie on reception & the men in concierge Hotel location was walking distance to lots of shops

title: Enjoyable stay.
desc: We arrived around 9 am and were advised we maybe could get into our room around 12, which we were more than pleased with. At 10 45 we were advised our room wes available fantastic after a 12 hour flight. The room on the second floor was excellent and catered for our needs. The pool on the 4th floor was huge, and nice and warm. A bar was attached, but the only criticism was that many drinks were not available. The staff were friendly, and food was available. Check out was 12 and we were able to extend to 1.pm. a other bonus was we were able to use the pool after check out. Will return next year. Thanks to all the staff.

title: Refreshed and spoiled at a gem on Beach Road.
desc: The bed was wonderful, the location superb, the room and hotel were wonderfully maintained and clean, but above all - the international staff of Level 6 were grace and kindness embodied. Thank you each to Christina, Tia, Esther, Miew and one who's name I am forgetting.

title: Good Hotel, but breakfast could be better
desc: Good clean rooms, very friendly staff, but the breakfast is not great. Not a lot of choices, Croissants very dry, orange juice cheap quality. In the morning very crowded if the hotel is busy. I think the breakfast area could be better organized and quality of food needs to be improved taken the cost per night into consideration.

title: Highly recommend
desc: Definitely 5/5. The staff we amazingly helpful, friendly and efficient from the moment we pulled up in our taxi. After a 14 hour flight this was so appreciated. We requested to upgrade our room which the reception staff were able to accommodate. The increase afforded us use of the Club- what a treat- Esther, Tia and Miew made us feel like family. We’re very keen to stay there again and enjoy the wonderful hospitality. Thank you Park Royal on Beach Rd.

title: GHA Member Improvement
desc: Being GHA Gold member wasn't enough. Benefits need more improvement. Staying over here, is to attend a meeting nearby. Also would like to increase my night stay. The room is clean and space is wide enough. The front desk lady is helpful. Manage to change a king size bed for me.

title: A comfortable place to refresh ….
desc: Hotel Has a good environment, Club Rooms are clean, staff like Tia, Esther, Mike’s and Christina are Polite, Friendly, Approachable and Helpful. Checking In and Out was smooth and swift. Location is within reach via MRT and driving is hassle free.

title: Perfect city centre hotel
desc: A Great hotel, perfect location opposite Arab street and the Arab quarter so loads of bars and cafes on the doorstep. The Hotel was spotless, pool on floor 4 was great, fab views at night. Highly recommended for base for exploring Singapore.

title: Great hotel choice
desc: Fabulous hotel. Just had such a lovely feel. Beautiful pool. Rooms were clean, functional and looked great. Staff were friendly and efficient. Well positioned. Walking distance to the Arab quarter which had fabulous food. Not to far from little India.

title: everything is a Good
desc: very good experiences stay with park royal beach road..strategic locations. nice accommodations, friendly staff, all the process very smooth start from check in & check out process. very recommended hotel.easily can find halal food because the hotel near bugis street

title: Family Staycay
