desc: Check in time was so smooth, attended by Jessie. She was very helpful, friendly and polite. What we requested for she try to fulfil it. Thumbs up 👍👍👍 Overall, Ginger restautant and swimming pool is good. Will recommend to my family and friends.

title: Very helpful staff and decorations for my proposal!
desc: The suite was one of the best places I have ever stayed, love the layout of the place, staff was helpful and friendly whenever we called down and ask for some stuff. Love the pre decoration that they help me for my proposal

title: Excellent stay brilliant location.
desc: Bedroom lovely and comfortable..made us feel as individuals as had taken a note of my husbands 50th birthday and our 25th anniversary and sent to our room a complimentary afternoon tea! The concierge young las was extremely helpful and knowledgeable regards area and using the metro service.

title: Super
desc: Nice room. Good meals. Lovely people and service. Costly but having access to the Club Lounge is a bonus worth paying for. Special thanks to Tia, Miew and Esther at the Club Lounge. Also to the two young men, sorry don't have names, doing the rooms on level 7, they do a wonderful job. Allan and Silke room 754

title: Great and pleasant stay
desc: Very pleasant stay. Room was clean, staff were friendly, gentle and helpful. Special thanks to Ray for his professional service and efficient arrangements. Glad to have such pleasant experience again. And I am happy to recommend this hotel to anyone who will go to Singapore - Good location, friendly staff and good breakfast.

title: Comfortable experience
desc: I feel comfortable with the room, they always make up the room I stayed. In short, my stay in Park Royal is the best, I will stay in Park Royal again once I visited Singapore soon. They have also a delicious free buffet breakfast.

title: Great stay at a great hotel.
desc: Very comfortable and clean room. The bathroom was well supplied with complimentary products. Great buffet breakfast that catered for all tastes. Viky, the concierge, was exceptional with his local knowledge that helped us make the most of our short stay in Singapore.

title: Excellent
desc: The amenities in the room was as per the expectation. The staff behaviour was very good. Their response to any query was very prompt. Initially I faced problem to get the taxis but the moment I came to know that the taxi booking was available on the concierge desk, i took the service from them. Trust me they were very helpful. Overall my stay in park royal was amazing.

title: Great stay would highly recommend.
desc: Couldn’t ask for anymore. Hotel was clean and had a great friendly staff. Christina and staff in the Club Lounge were excellent. The hotel was close to the MRT and other great sites. I would not hesitate to return to this hotel.

title: Lovely stay in Singapore
desc: Stayed here for 3 days, a lovely 4 star hotel. Arrived early due to flight times so our room wasn’t ready, however we were able to use the hotels facilities and pool which made for a relaxing morning. Breakfast was ample but basic. There is a local hawker a 5/10 minutes walk from the hotel, called the Golden Mile Food Centre, which provides plenty of choice and cheaper options for very tasty food! The hotel is located well if you like walking. It’s straight across the road from Haji Lane which has it’s perks. Haji Lane has plenty of bars and restaurants and really comes alive at night! However, if you want to visit China town, Marina Bay or Gardens by the Bay be prepared for a 40 minute walk or 30 minute MRT ride (get a taxi via the Grab app). Alcohol is quite expensive in

title: Wonderful hotel for a break
desc: Wonderful hotel. Staff attentive and helpful. Breakfast a must with a great selection to cater for all tastes. Close to all amenities and an amazing swimming pool to get you through the heat of the day. Beds are super comfy. And a special mention of Viky who is extremely helpful welcoming and always greeting you with a smile. Great place to stay. Highly recommend.

title: Excellent Service and Care.
desc: Absolutely fantastic service. A special mention to Aisah who works at the ginger restaurant - she is absolutely amazing. What a wonderful and caring person. What great care she takes looking after her guests. She makes you feel at home! In all my business travels, she stands out. A lovely caring person.

title: Regular visitor
desc: The hotel has excellent service esp at the concierge, Ginger and Bar 5. I stay in the hotel due to its proximity to our regional office. My only request is to provide bidet in the toilets. Almost all new hotels I have visited around the world have this already.

title: Amazing Service
desc: Park Royal gave us an amazing service during our stay there. Staring from the moment we checked till the moment we checked our they looked after every small requirement of us and the staffs were so humble and Rich in hospitality. I’d definitely visit them again ❤️

title: Stayed for 1 year, fantastic service and location!
desc: I stayed here for one year while working near by, the staff are incredibly friendly and helpful and always willing to assist where possible. The room was always kept in excellent condition and very clean. The pool and gym facilities are excellent and well maintained. Location is brilliant, across from Haji Lane and close to Marina Bay. I really enjoyed my time here , thanks again to all the staff for their help over the year. Sean

title: Excellent choice-one of the best hotel I have stayed in Singapore
desc: Breakfast, and food in general was amazing there - it was my first trip to Singapore before I moved here so, I was introduced to most of the local signature dishes in this hotel! Amazing location, just a few minutes walk from a metro station and about 15-20 minutes walk from the National Gallery / Marina Bay and just across the street from Haji Lane/ Arab Street. The room was very clean and comfortable, the staff very friendly & helpful and the service was very fast and efficient! I would definitely recommend it to anyone visiting Singapore as it's a great value-for-money option.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Stayed at the Parkroyal at beach road from 12 may 2017 to 15 may 2017 and my stay here was plesent. The hotel is located at a very good location. my check in was smooth. Breakfast spread was large couldn't eat eveything. Room allotted to me was large enough for a couple. Bathroom was clean and towels were tidy. overall stay was pleasant. i shall stay here on my next visit to Singapore

title: The Orchid Club is a business travelers best friend!
desc: The Orchid Club staff is exceptional. The professionalism and warmth they exhibit is superior. The amenities offered with the Orchid Club are an excellent value. As a compliment to what is truly a fabulous room, it made for an excellent experience.

title: EXCEEDED OUR EXPECTATIONS
desc: Spent two nights in this hotel with my husband and everything was excellent. The room was comfortable and clean, suprisingly. Best thing about this hotel is their staff. I give this hotel 5-stars for their customer service. One of their staffs, Maja, is very helpful and accommodating. Would recommend this place to my friends and family.

title: GREAT LOCATION & SLEEP QUALITY
desc: My husband and I stayed here for 2 nights on our Singapore stopover. Location was just great and mainly because of this, we will definitely stay here again when we next come to Singapore. It is a quick transfer from the airport, I think 20 mins max., though it seemed quicker; a nice stroll along the road to Raffles Hotel and surrounding area and 5-10 mins by taxi to Marina Bay Sands Hotel and surrounding area. There are restaurants and shops down the road opposite the entrance, over the foot bridge. Hotel staff were friendly and we ate in the buffet restaurant on our first evening. The food was nice and reasonably priced. The pool and patio area were nice for relaxing and we even sat up there with drinks later in the evening, after the bar had closed, just to have some air,

title: Remarkable experience!
desc: The amount I spent was worth every penny because of the luxurious ambiance. The newly refurbished superior room we stayed at was homey and even the bathroom was elegant. Location's also convenient especially if you want to visit Haji Lane. When we had our breakfast at the Ginger restaurant, we enjoyed the sumptuous food selection. Shoutout to Maja and Mia for making our stay extra special because of their superb service!

title: What a great find
desc: We stayed for 4 days and Hong Xia our room attendent did great job of taking care of our room, we had an Orchid Club Room with fresh fruit and chocolates, a super king size bed, a plush bathroom and wet room and beautiful toiletries. I used the gym each day..... it was spacious with lots of equipment and a walk to wall window that looked out onto the pool and Singapore flyer in the distance. The pool deck was also huge with lots of space for beds and toilets were handy close by. Reception staff were very smiley and professional and gave us a perfect late evening welcome following our long flight from Australia. Breakfast was busy with a huge cross section of international foods - dim sum, english and Indian. The front of the hotel has stairs to gain entry to the reception

title: Great place
desc: First time to book un this hotel. Place is nice, room is tidy and clean. Personel are really helpful and approachable, specially Maja. Everything is great. Made out vacation memorable! Very relaxing stay in hotel.

title: Great Service
desc: Great Service. Please use the hotel. Location is great! Enjoyed the food and swimming pool and sure a place for weekend family getaway.Friendly staff in all places and cosy environment that’s makes it all perfect with your loved ones.Kudos to all there for making our stay a great one.

title: Good Hotel in a good location
desc: We only spent 3 nights here but wish it had been longer. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Our room was of a good size, clean and comfortable. The drinks and snacks in the mini-bar were a bit overpriced so we abstained! The buffet breakfast is absolutely wonderful. There was such a big choice that I just couldn't try everything that I was tempted with. The bar at night was a bit disappointing with not as wide a choice of drinks and barely any snacks to accompany the drinks.

title: Loved this hotel
desc: Large room with the biggest bed I have ever seen. Was amazing to sleep in. The room was clean and large, and well positioned in Singapore. A great pool area and a well stocked bar. We were close to one of the really old parts of the city and it was great to explore the area as well. Would definitely stay in this hotel again.

title: Fantastic stay
desc: I don’t normally leave reviews but I was compelled to open a TA account so I could tell everyone how they MUST stay here if they go to Singapore. As work paid for my trip I thought I would treat myself a bit and upgraded to the club. What a great choice! Very comfortable room, excellent choice of food available but what really stood out was the great service. Esther was great, whether it was the fast, friendly check in or the friendly service in the lounge. Over the days I was there I noticed her interactions with a number of other guests who she obviously knew and knew her and while remaining courteous and professional they treated her almost like a family member, I am sure she is a big reason many people return. In summary, if you are lucky enough to come to Singapore, stay at

title: Grand but some area under rennovation
desc: Book last min, requested to top up for Orchid club room which you could not complain. Swimming pool access take a long path and the skybridge area was under renovation. It is facing the express highway so provided clear view even not at high floor.

title: Efficient, Quiet Location PLUS Great Service
desc: We stayed at the hotel during our visit in March. We arrived a little late, but Lynn was patient and kind and hearing that the other couple just got engaged, upgraded them to a room with a balconey. She was especially kind to us and very helpful with all the questions we have. Great hotel, not too big so it is more personal, cozy but with good sized renovated rooms - making our trip very relaxing and comfortable, and, very cared for by the wonderful staff.

title: Tranquil place close to the heart of downtown Singapore
desc: We stayed at ParkRoyal on Beach Road in mid-March because of a conference. The location of the hotel was perfect for people like us who wanted the convenience of being close to attractions, but not in the hustle and bustle of everything. The hotel is across the street from the heritage site of Arab Street. You can visit Haji Lane and Arab Street to get a taste of the crowds, but I recommend going a couple of streets east past the Sultan Mosque to streets like Kandahar Street for better restaurants and bars. The crowds are more manageable. Walk down Arab Street during the day while shops are open. The stores are not the same as in the early days, but if you’re looking for gifts that are more unique for Singapore, Arab Street is worth a visit. We hopped on the MRT (the hotel is

title: Excellent, warm and very comfortable
desc: A very good hotel, very well equipped and with superb customer care. I felt welcome and my needs were satisfied at all times. Big room, clean, comfortable bed, practical working desk and a couch to relax.

title: Worth the price 👌🏻
desc: Stayed in this hotel for a short vacation and Im glad i did! I accepted the offer to upgrade to the club which was worth every penny i paid. The room was new and they have an exclusive lounge which serves breakfast and happy hour. The highlight of my stay was the warm welcome of the ladies working at the club. Mia Mazel Esther and Maja were very helpful, nothing seems troublesome. I would recommend to visit their pool , swimmers will love it!

title: Amazing property
desc: Stayed here during the long weekend as I was recommended by my friend who had her wedding held here earlier in the year. The hotel location of the hotel is ideal as it’s conveniently situated near the train station, bars, cafes and a short walk from the Michelin star bah chor mee. Through my entire stay, I was impressed by the facilities of the hotel, mainly the gym and the room. I would like to extend my thanks to the team here for the service, especially Lean/leen from the reception and Zarli who surprised me with the cake! They are the gems of this hotel, so please extend my appreciation to them! However, there are certain areas which calls for my attention. I remember that on my last day, I went to the reception counter to get a room key cause I left it in the room. As

title: Lovely Surprise
desc: My husband and I chose this hotel for our anniversary and every thing was perfect. We were surprised when we entered our room decorated with anniversary banner and heartshaped chocolates, we were truly touched. We also loved the room especially the balcony! Breakfast and happy hours were busy, though the selection can be better, the service was perfect. The lovely ladies of club were a delight to talk to, we were truly taken care of. A pat on their back is well deserved. The location was good and the pool was a scene. Will be back!

title: Nice hotel
desc: Staff very kind and welcoming. Very good quality/price rate. Not so far from the bay. You can easily walk to there. Good breakfast. we have not tested the swimming pool. Possibility to leave your luggages for few hours after the check out. That's convenient. I recommend this hotel

title: Excellent stay
desc: Nice hotel, excellent location, very nice and clean rooms. Location of this hotel very good. Right across the street from Haji Ln and Arab street, lot of dining and Bar options. Easily accessible to all parts of Singapore.

title: Remembering why ...
desc: This visit reminded me why I joined the Parkroyal guest program many years ago - elegant excellence without the Las Vegas showiness of many modern hotels. Effecient concierge; attentive and very proficient checkin (and out) service - including the escort to and introduction at the separate Orchid Club desk; very good breakfast and club facilities on the Orchid Club floor that meant my mornings were quietly efficient, and quiet, preparation for the day ahead. A very comfortable room, great shower (didn't get a chance to try the separarate and deep bath). Simply grand, relaxing, and completely stressless - not one thing to worry about.

title: Good service, comfortable stay, room service food terrible.
desc: Enjoyed my stay at Park Royal. Good location for business, great service (Raj at reception was very friendly), comfortable room and I liked the teahouse. Where it let itself down was room service. As I was working away from home alone I ordered room service a couple of times but the food was very poor quality and not anywhere near the same standard as everything else offered by the hotel. Still, all in all I left fairly happy. You will get better value for money away from Beach Road - i.e look at Clarke Quay, which is much livelier.

title: Perfect stay at an superb hotel
desc: Room was nicely furnished, super clean and spacious than expected. Hotel is located within walking distance to MRT. Good hospitality. Staffs were professional and courteous. An enjoyable stay and definitely highly recommend.

title: Exzellent experience with Royal Park Hotel on Beach Road
desc: We enjoyed our short visit in Singapure, especially also our hotel. Nice, clean, good large room, friendly personal, The breakfast was good. The Hotel has an outstanding Pool with a fantastic view over the City

title: Flawless hotel
desc: This gorgeous hotel is completely flawless. The rooms and views are fabulous and the staff are exceptionally helpful and kind. We were able to reach the hotel quickly from the Changi Airport too. 😊 We highly recommend this place to all the travellers.

title: “Resort” in the City!
desc: A wonderful 2 nights weekend staycation at PARKROYAL on Beach Road with my Wife! I was impressed with the spacious and newly renovated Superior Room as well as the comfortable King size bed! Not forgetting the well time spent at the gorgeous outdoor Swimming pool with a view of Singapore Flyer and MBS as well! Incredible location: The hotel is just right opposite Haji Lane / Arab Street which gives you a different feeling while having drinks at the cultural district at night. Accessible to many attractions by taking Bugis and Nicoll Highway MRT (5 mins walk). Also, you can consider Suntec, Bugis Junction, Bugis Village for a movie / dinner with just a 10 minutes walking away! Strongly recommended! 👍🏻

title: Great, Relaxing stay
desc: We stayed here as we had an event in the Sky Ballroom. All rooms have recently been refurbished. Great hard beds, walk in showers (my favorite feature of the room) fast and friendly service at the front desk. Well equipped gym and nice pool area. Just a ten minute to city hall, or take the MRT Nicolls Highway just behind the hotel... Catering and service at the event was very professional... thank you for a relaxing stay...

title: Conveniently located and great concierge service
desc: The hotel can be quickly reached from Changi Airport, and it is located in walking distance from Sun City office towers and mall. I was impressed by the concierge service of Mr. Johnson. He helped me to find my way around and came up with great suggestions what to do in my free time. He was of great assistance throughout my stay. Congrats on a job well done!

title: Great staff
desc: A delight stay at Parkroyal the room is nice, clean an the bed is very comfortable. The orchid club lounge Esther are very attention to detail and the customer service was excellent. The service is very friendly and approachable. I like the lounge very nice, we definitely coming back very soon to stay at Parkroyal.

title: Wedding Anniversary banquet
desc: fantastic support from Felicia, nick, sollehin, desmond, and yusuff the sound man. Guys you have been great and can't ask for more. Looking forward to having you guys when i celebrate my anniversary. Kudos and appreciate all hard work and support. Pls thank your team of waiters too.

title: Wedding anniversary
desc: Fantastic service and support from Felicia, nick, sollehin, Desmond to Yusoff the sound guy. Guys have been great and can’t ask for more. Looking forward to having you guys when I celebrate my own anniversary. Kudos guys and appreciate all the support

title: You cannot sleep in this hotel
desc: I liked the pool area and the staff who work there always greeted us with a smile and were lovely, but it was our worst hotel to try to get any sleep, we both had ear plugs in but the walls are so thin you can hear the guest next door go to the toilet (nothing worse), then every door opening or closing ended with a loud bang, you can hear this upstairs and on your floor.... I very rarely give a poor review but felt for any other guests who want a relaxing stay, this is not the ideal hotel....

title: Very comfortable
desc: Very well presented hotel with nice comfortable rooms. The beds were very comfortable, the shower great and there is room in the mini bar fridge for your own drinks. Pool area was lovely with great views and very welcome after a long day sightseeing. Showing some signs of tiredness though with a few loose floor tiles. Had a round of drinks at the pool bar but they were very expensive but maybe expected for a hotel. The welcome from the door staff was always pleasant. There is a bus stop right outside the hotel with a service direct to sentosa entrance which was very handy. Had an issue at check in as we had booked for 2 adults and a 5 year old but found out there was no bed for my son! Apparently you only get a bed for children 6 years and above and it is £150 extra for 3

title: 5 night stay at Orchid Club
desc: We had a very enjoyable stay at Parkroyal which included an upgrade a deluxe room to premier room. Esther make my stay memorable, nothing was too much trouble and we have always greeted by a smile. The parkroyal staff provide excellent service in a relaxed atmosphere. We would recommend to our friend and family when they travel to Singapore. Kudos to Esther Parkroyal the place you will be treated as royal 🙏

title: Amazing stay at an awesome hotel
desc: From the moment we arrived tired after a 12 hour flight to the moment we left with the concierge getting us a taxi at 6:15am we had an absolutely amazing experience at the Park Royal on Beach Road. The staff were all friendly, helpful and smiling, happy to help with any enquiries we had. It was one of those rare times when you come away totally satisfied with what has just gone before.

title: Great stay in the Orchid Club
desc: We stayed in Orchid Club Deluxe Double room 673 for a 7 night stay, this came with access to lounge, priority check out, complimentary breakfasts in the lounge or at Gingers and evening cocktails and 2 items of laundry per day for both of us. We arrived at midnight and checked in from the main lobby reception desk a process that took only minutes. The room was spacious, well maintained and clean, with a nice view of the surrounding area. Bathroom was a reasonable size with 2 shower heads. Towels, bathrobes, toiletries, hairdryer etc were all provided. The room's sound insulation was good, and we heard no sound from the adjoining rooms. WIFI was exceptional with great speed. We were particularly happy as they had a non-smoking policy. Complimentary laundry services were

title: Excellent location, friendly staff
desc: Ideal location and aptly placed away from the city hustle. The staff were friendly and very helpful. Checked into the club deluxe room and would highly recommend to travellers who wish to experience premier treatment. The many bars and restaurants within walking distance is definitely a bonus.

title: Good location..great pool..the rest very average
desc: First the good points about the Park Royal on Beach Rd. Well located.. good trasnport links with a bus stop right outside the hotel and two MRT stations within five minutes walk. Also plenary of taxis and Grab cars avaiable. So the hotel is a good base for visiting Singapore. The pool and gym facilities (and staff) are excellent and are a good selling point for the hotel. As is the excellent concierage service. However that's where the good points stop. The hotel itself is rather disappointing..particularly in view of the large numebr of great hotels in Singapore. Standard room OK but could do with modernising. Old fashined and noisy A/C. Reception staff not particularly friendly or helpful. More interested in getting you to pay for an early check in. Breakfast not great. Yes a

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: We recieved a warm welcome from the Concierge and the reception was so friendly..The room is spacious especially the bed..Had a great stay and the reception had allowed us for complimentary late check out understanding our situation that we had come for a function..Great hotel to stay..

title: Great Stay and Well Looked After by the Orchird Club Team
desc: Located only a few mins walk from the MRT Station and only a few stops away from the harbor and all the attractions of Singapore, across the road is Arab street this is the perfect place to stay. We booked an Orchid Club Room and arrived on an early flight and had a room ready when we checked in which was spacious and well appointed. The bed was SUPER comfy and we were well rested the entire stay. I can say enough how friendly the Orchid Club staff were to us and thank them for looking after us so well during our stay. They left a little platter and a note in our room as it was our honeymoon and that sort or personalized touch you just don't see anymore! This was an excellent place to stay we cant wait to go back again!

title: Wedding Solemnisation & Lunch Banquet (19 May 2019)
desc: My Son (Gideon) held his wedding solemnisation & Lunch Banquet at Park Royal Beach Road. The co-ordinator for the wedding is Ms Felicia. Her superb and meticulous co-ordination from food tasting to wedding solemnisation/lunch banquet left me greatly impressed. I have received excellent feedback from our guests for the excellent food and impeccable service. Once again Felicia thanks for making my son and spouse, and my family members to have an enjoyable and memorable day !

title: Never less than perfect.
desc: I returned to this property for a second stay because the first experience was great. This visit was a three-night stopover on the way home from Europe. Quiet and luxury greatly assisted with timezone adjustment. Orchid Club rooms have quiet and luxury in spades. You are guaranteed the best possible sleep. Once again on this visit, everything was perfect. Staff at all levels are the best and deliver quiet, respectful and prompt service. How often can one really say 'Perfection. Nothing at all went wrong.'. I'll be back.

title: One of the best!!
desc: Truly impressed with our 4 night stay at the hotel, we chose to stay at the Club and its worth the price. Breakfast was more convenient and exclusive in comparison to the main restaurant. A generous selection for the evening cocktails was served as well. My aunt and I would like to thank the ladies at the club reception. Maja and her colleague Ester were very helpful and friendly. We felt home away from home. We were truly taken care of, not forgetting breakfast chef, she's a sweetheart.We hope to meet the lovely Team again next year.

title: Dinner buffet in Ginger cafe
desc: The place is cosy and nice. Their staff are friendly n courteous. The food is fresh & yummy especially the crabs and other seafood. Will visit when they host the crab fest in future. Please let the main chef know of our request. Thank you

title: Great city hotel.
desc: This hotel is in a great location, the Arab district is across the road too head out to for a evening meal and a few drinks. The pool area is massive for a city hotel. Has a good breakfast with a big selection. Staff where all good and could not do for more for you. My only slight negative would be the room was on the smaller size. However to be fair we did have a extra bed in the room for our 4 year old. Also we did not spend any great length of time in the room as we where exploring the city or enjoying the pool. I would be more then happy to book this hotel once more if we come back to Singapore.

title: Wedding 25 May 2019
desc: I'm truly grateful to have Felicia & her team of elites from Park Royal on Beach Road, for our wedding, which was help on 25 May 2019. Felicia is very professional and efficient in answering all our inquires during our meet ups. We obviously had so many questions and requests through not being able to be there physically, but she was there to quickly respond promptly to all our emails and messages, even when we sent late at night. We would like to thank Felicia a million times, as young couples like us, we are often flicked-minded and couldn't make up our mind & decision. We keep on changing our mind even till the last minute, but Felicia was still quick in responding to our changes. During our actual day, there's some miscommunication between one of the waitress and our

title: Comfortable, well located hotel
desc: My wife and I recently stayed 3 nights at the Park Royal on Beach Road. This is a modern hotel that is well located - just opposite the Arab Quarter. Lots of interesting fabric shops that my wife loved! Plenty of choice of cafes nearby and only about a 10 to 15 minute walk to the Bugis Street markets if you are into markets! The hotel staff were welcoming and our room was very spacious and comfortable. Great bed! We would definitely stay there again.

title: Wedding banquet @ grand ballroom
desc: The Grand Ballroom was tastefully decorated and had a very nice ambience to it. The staff were attentive and helpful. On top of that, the food served was excellent. The programme was well-coordinated and the length of everything was great. Overall, a very well-thought through event by organisers.

title: Big Thank You!
desc: My wife and I stayed at the hotel to visit our son and the ladies at our floor on level 6 are gems. Big thank you to Maja for sorting my American Airlines flight, it was not her job but she patiently assisted two not so young people in need of help, it was a very kind gesture and not a hint of displeasure from her despite the 15min call from AA to Japan Airlines, i couldnt thank her enough. She even gave my wife a lovely fan before we leave the hotel as a souvenir, very warm service. Sending regards to Mia, if i remember the name correctly, the lady with a sweet smile who took good care of us during cocktails. she remembered not just our drinks but the drinks for the table next to us and next to that table as well. We want to thank the ladies for the whole stay, it felt like

title: Great service from the Orchid Club team
desc: I stayed for 5 days on a business trip. My work had chosen the Orchid Club package this time, on my previous stay I had been in a regular room. I must say that the service from the team, especially Mia and Maezel, was great! They were very friendly, helpful and fun to chat to. Having the drinks and food options in the lounge was very good to return to after a hard day at the office. I am likely to return again soon, so hope I can stay there again.

title: What great service
desc: Thanks to the staff at ParkRoyal. As always great service and such a friendly hotel. Special thanks to Kurtis and Mia at the Orchid Club, what a credit you are to this hotel with your friendly and professional service. I am looking forward to my next stay.

title: Mini rugby tour!
desc: Had a lovely stay. Paid a little more for a renovated room which was really worth it. Nicely decorated and spacious. Very nice pool area where the kids enjoy the afternoon. Very kids friendly will highly recommend.

title: Recommended
desc: We had two great nights here on our way to Germany. The room was spacious, clean and best of all the aircon was effective and very quiet. The shower was very good, I love good pressure and the bed was comfy. The location is very convienent to the city and locally there are heaps of fantastic eating establishments. Highly recommended.

title: My choice in Singapore
desc: A very nice and comfortable hotel strategically located in the heart of Singapore. Rooms are modern and clean with the bed extremely comfortable. I like very much the walk in shower and the overall silence of the room at night.

title: Great family getaway
desc: It was an awesome stay at Parkroyal on Beach Road with my Wife and kids enjoying the food and Swimming pool.Was a second trip there and sure a place for weekend family getaway.Friendly staff in all places and cosy environment that’s makes it all perfect with your loved ones.Kudos to all there for making our stay a great one.

title: EXCELLENT SERVICE!!
desc: My husb book a surprise staycation for me on our anniversary. Room is clean & view is good. Food during the evening cocktail is good. Special shout out to Nina for attending to us. She shld get a staff service award for taking really good care of us! We enjoyed our stay there and the services we received by Nina really made us satisfied with our stay in the hotel.

title: Great Room and close to MRT station
desc: The location is not too far away from Marina Bay if you wanted to walk - about 2kms. Very close to Buigis Street Market place. The Hotel was excellent for our 4 day stay, bed was comfy and the room itself was great.

title: Very friendly
desc: Very welcoming, friendly staff always be smiling especially viky in concierge. Good breakfast, room service. Convent location 10mins by taxi to orchard or marina bay. Nice room. Will return next time I visit Singapore.

title: Six Day Holiday
desc: We recently stated at the Parkroyal on Beach Road and found it to be a great place to stay for a visit to Singapore. Rooms were clean, staff were friendly and courteous. The hotel is located close to a train station and its an easy walk to the CBD, Little India and Kampong Glam areas.

title: Friendly and Welcoming
desc: We stayed at the Park Royal at Beach for 6 nights from the 13 May. We booked the Orchid level. We were checked in by Mia who was very friendly and welcoming and made us feel very relaxed. During our stay we were in contact with many staff members. Esther, Christina, Kurtis and Maezel always greeted us by name and were at all times friendly and welcoming. We would like to say a special thank you to Maezel, who very kindly gave me one of her own spare contact lens case as I had forgotten mine. When we told Maezel we had visited Singapore some 40 years ago for our honeymoon and that we were in our 40th year, she surprised us by delivering a beautiful plate of chocolates and fruit, a bottle of wine and a beautifully handwritten card. What a fabulous touch. Thank you so much

title: 12 Nights on business
desc: I’ve visited this hotel 4 times now in the last year. Club rooms are bright and clean. Brilliant service! In particular Maezel and Mia always looked after me in the guest lounge. Would definitely recommend.

title: Our Stay in Singapore
desc: We were very happy staying at the Hotel Parkroyal on Beach Rd. It was not cheap, but price / value were correct. Warm welcome at the reception, with very friendly and helpful staff. Our room was on 3rd floor, and we noticed a strange odor in the corridor (artificial smell similar to the one used in the cars to avoid bad smelling). The temperature in all public places in the hotel was for us to cold. Very nice and clean room, wifi was fast and worked properly, with the curtains closed the room was dark also at daytime. Breakfast buffet was excellent, always filled up, egg dishes were prepared freshly, and the staff was very friendly. As we had a late flight, we could use the pool and wifi after checkout and our bagages were looked after.

title: Top Hotel
desc: Very nice hotel in center of the city. The rooms are very modern and well designed. The bed very very comfortable one the best one I slept in over the years. Breakfast is good but not breathtaking. Pool and gym are very good as well. Overall good value for money.

title: Equally treated
desc: My colleague book a stay on the club floor for a couple of nights. 1 of the night he invited me to join him for cocktail + quick meeting at the lounge. The lounge is nicely located overlooking beach road. Selection of food is satisfying. Upon reaching, we were welcomed by staff named Nina. She is very polite and is very professional in her work. Cocktail last for about 2hrs. Throughout the whole time I was there, Nina did not treat me any different though I am not the staying guest. Though she was abit limping, she still goes round the lounge every now and then to make sure every guest drinks is always full, service level at it's best. Thumbs up to the great hospility! Please give Nina a recognition and all the rest she deserves. Already planning to stay here on my next

title: Warm Welcoming
desc: We stayed here a few days back and I love this hotel!Transportation was easy than i expected.Finding food at night wasnt a problem to make our tummies happy.There are a few 24 hours eating places.We tried ramen stall located opposite of the hotel and its a 10 mins walking distance.Its very convenient to go to other places as trains and buses are everywhere.We visited the spa in the hotel and I had Bindu who did my massage and she's a gem!She took care of me and I had an amazing massage!Not forgetting to the front desk staff as well!They are so warm welcoming and very informative.I was confused as i dont know what kind of massage to go for.They helped me figure it the type of massage I should opt for...very friendly ladies..would have definitely gone back for another treatment if

title: Great Hotel
desc: Great hotel with super nice and helpfull staff Staying on Top Floor with regular lounge visit for breakfast and diner drinks the team around Maezel have been extremely good and caring for their guests. We felt in good hands and treated very well - we will be back!!

title: Authentic; personal and professional customer service
desc: Thank you! 5 star Authentic Service and great location. Li, my housekeeper and Club team, Mazel, Kurtis and the ladies and Club Chefs are first class. Mazel is a stand out! Her warmth, expertise and service, is priceless. Allen at reception was fantastic. Great bedding, great pool, great food and a home away from home.

title: Avarage
desc: room configuartion is not ok for business trip as bathroom and other. no working desk, for sofa or divan you cant walk throu the room. If you use floor mat in bathroom, you can not open any door which will stuk in floor mat

title: Amazing stay, great staff
desc: Kept coming back to Park Royal Beach Road not only because of the good location, but also because of the great staff especially Maja and Kurtis from Club. They completed my entire stay in Singapore. Thank you Park Royal.

title: Great hotel and facilities
desc: Overall a good experiance. Clean modern rooms . Good swiming pool and gym . Great location once there we could walk everywhere we needed to including the gardens and a quick cheap fare to sentosa island

title: Great service at ParkRoyal @ Beach Road
desc: Celebrated my partner’s birthday at ParkRoyal and it was definitely a good time there. Was greeted and escorted by the staff there as we booked the Orchid Rooms. I’d like to point out a particular staff, Nina, who definitely made the stay better. She had gone through out of her way to makesure I was comfortable, getting back to me whenever I had enquire certain things. And also to the ParkRoyal Staffs who came to my room and presented a cake. The room was spacious, equipped with what they had offered and most importantly clean! I will definitely recommend this hotel to my business partners and friends!

title: Clean, fresh and large bed
desc: A nice clean hotel. Check in was easy and bags brought to the door. The bed was massive, plenty of room to move about. Blackout curtains hid the car park view! Staff were friendly and efficient. Large choice of breakfast goodies.

title: Fabulous stay!!
desc: I recently had the most fabulous stay at Parkroyal on Beach Road! Some friends and I stayed for a week and indulged in the ‘club room’ option. We felt that the extra money we spent on the club option was really worthwhile and the service provided was excellent. Esther & the other staff looked after us really well and were always very friendly and helpful. Thanks for a wonderful week!!

title: Strategic Hotel to Stay
desc: This is my first stay at beach road when visited Singapore. I’m impressed with this hotel location, it’s pretty strategic. It takes only about 7 minutes walk to Nicol Highway MRT Station, and 5 minutes walk to Bugis MRT Station. Also there’s a bus stop in front of the hotel and a pedestrian bridge to walk across the road to reach such as: Haji Lane, Arab Lane, etc. I must say that this hotel’s service pretty satisfying, the hotel staff are friendly & super helpful. Hotel facilities such as swimming pool, breakfast & café are pretty awesome. I really enjoy my stay during my business trip to Singapore.

title: First stay at this hotel but will definitely go back.
desc: Stayed 3 nights, the room was a very good size and very well maintained. The staff are friendly, professional and helpful. The pool area is very good, sunny spots as well as good shade. Breakfast buffet had many choices and was suitable for all. The staff kept the selections replenished constantly. Overall a very pleasing stay.

title: Good
desc: I would rate for 7 from 10. Quite good location, not my favorite, but it’s still ok, with plenty of restaurants and pubs. Good service and comfortable rooms. Good burger at night time with room service.

title: good location and comfy
desc: good location not so far from air port and near to travelling point like Bugis. Haji lane is opposite the hotel and only 10-15 min to Bayfront. Only 5 min to Suntech city department store. The room is clean and comfortable. All utility are available e.g. iron, hair dryer .

title: Save the best until last
desc: Spent the last night of a big trip here and loved every minute of it. Large, comfy room with all the best facilities. Loved the pool and its surrounding views of Singapore. Staff were great and made us feel very welcome even for a short stay. Great location and a short distance to buses/trains, restaurants and shopping centres. Left well rested fro the final leg of our journey.

title: Singapore holiday was everything I hoped for and far far more
desc: Park Royal was a great hotel, such delicious, excellent food, lovely staff and helpful too. We hope to be back soon. Lovely views from the pool, and very good location for seeing everything. Walking distance to Raffles and museum. Try the underground - so clean and orderly.

title: I often pass through Singapore & stay at The Park Royal it is outstanding value for money
desc: I have stayed in many hotels in Singapore & find the Park royal on beach perfect, its well positioned for transport links & the night life around Haji lane just over the road is very good.The staff are so help full especially on the club floor, I would like to mention: Maezel, Majja, Esther, Mia, Nicci & Allan for making our stays so memorable :)

title: Be Careful Very Careful
desc: The hotel double charges you. They also swipe your card in excess of what they tell they will. then they give you a reversal slip and ensure that the reversal doesn't happen. Emails are not replied to. Best to avoid this property and this seems a new scam to commit fraud.

title: Trip to Singapore
desc: My family and I flew to Singapore for a short trip over a weekend for a wedding we were attending. The stay was exceptional and beyond our expectations for a Parkroyal hotel. Kudos to the team for ensuring everything went smoothly.

title: Great location
desc: Great location, lovely hotel, bed very comfy. Swimming pool was awesome and John the doorman looks after you with a big smile. Take taxis they are really cheap but train station a short walk and easy to get around. Singapore is very safe and clean loved our stay 😎

title: Great location
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights. Choose this hotel as it was close to everything but not in the main hustle and bustle. Check in was quick and easy and we ad 2 rooms beside each other’s as requested when I booked. Staff were nice but not overly friendly as I have found in other Park Royal hotels I have stayed in. Was not prepared to pay $80 per couple for breakfast, so every morning we ventured out and had our breakfast around Singapore. The room was a good size and the beds were huge. Pillows were soft but made a call and slightly harder pillows were dispatched almost immediately. The air con adjusted itself all the time, sometimes leaving the room very hot. The pool area is good, the pool itself is huge with lots of deck chairs and shade. Had a couple of lunches at the pool

title: Always excellent - have been coming here since 1998
desc: We began staying in this hotel in 1998 and every time we're in Singapore stay here. It's always been a great place to stay - a walk to Raffles and Little India, but, in recent years the development of little Arabia has made it even more attractive - great food across the street. And the incredible bar with the ballroom dancing at night is something unique. Can I also mention the excellent service of the concierge - Dan. And the duty manager Joe was great. Dave Ashmore (London/Melbourne).

title: Disappointing service
desc: No ramp for strollers, and no help from concierge in carrying the strollers up and down the flight of stairs. Receptionist was really cold.. brushed away out request for assistance. Definitely a wet blanket to our wedding anniversary celebration.

title: A Great Holiday Experience
desc: The Park Royal Beach Road is an excellent hotel & location to stay when visiting this beautiful city .. Well located in easy walking distance of an MRT station , shopping centres & a wide variety of restaurants ..we thoroughly recommend !!

title: Lovely hotel but...
desc: This was a lovely hotel in a good location. The rooms were spacious and clean and the breakfast buffet was vast although it would have been nice if the food was halal, particularly given its location. It is worth noting that the only access into the hotel was stairs or a disabled stair lift. We were travelling with our 2 year old daughter and when asleep in her buggy we had to carry it up and down the stairs- I would think that a hotel of this calibre could quite easily provide ramp access. The staff did their job and some were nice but overall I didn't think they were particularly approachable or pleasant - again in a hotel of this calibre, a nice friendly service is part of the experience.

title: Nice hotel, nice stay
desc: Clean and fresh hotel. The room was a good size and well maintained and clean. The pool was a large size, especially for Singapore as was the gym. All the staff were friendly and helpful, thank you Allan on the front desk for checking us in quickly without any problems. There are plenty of shops and restaurants just across Beach road but the area around the hotel is nice and quiet. 5 to 10 minutes walk to the MRT and there are many bus routes passing close to the hotel. Overall a very good place to stay in Singapore

title: Excellent Service
desc: I stayed in this property for a Business Meeting from 28th May to 2nd June 2019. Club rooms on 7th Floor are really great.. One of the best experience i had was with the concierge Person- Johnson, he has been a excellent help during my stay. You tell him your request and he will make sure it is done.. Great People makes the property five Star

title: Honeymoon
desc: Spent 3 wonderful day on my honeymoon with a nice hotel.Warm welcome with bright smile by Raj and Dilah. Highly satisfied with service and hospitality.Fantastic stay, good food, good location and excellent room. Overall it was a great experience staying at Parkroyal. Receptionist staff very helpful during check in and check out time. We definitely will stay here again. Thanks alot Parkroyal for the excellent service.

title: Friendly staff and good view for relax
desc: Excellent experience, especially tzu chi provide great service! Here got good view and friendly staff. Tzu Chi show her hospitality for us. For our hesitate she can give us clearly answer. I recommend here for get chilled at your holiday.

title: Overnight Stay
desc: I have been staying in this hotel for number of times and checked in by Raj this time. I was given a very hospitable and welcoming service. He also highlighted my benefits as GHA Platinum member as well. This Hotel is newly renovated, clean and spacious. Near Bugis for shopping and Haji Lane for cafes! 2 MRT's is walking distance (Bugis and Nicoll Highway). Highly Recommended!

title: Great location
desc: Good walking distance to a few interesting landmarks ...,fabulous pool offering yoga on floating mats,super cool..one of the most extensive breakfasts that I have ever had, in the dining room . Very friendly staff that helped us out with a few travel issues.Overall a great stay ,so much so we back there next month.,

title: Corporate event - Excellent Ballroom, Accomodations and Staffs (all levels)
desc: Great 3 days training event. Full involvement of hotel team, from GM to Concierge and Security, even the F&B part-timers are so dedicated to making sure that the service is in tip top conditions. If you ask me to rate their service, it will be 9.5/10.

title: Excellent stay with Park Royal Beach Road
desc: First, I would just like to say that I am not really a hotel critic nor a person who likes giving reviews in social media platforms like this but I believe that what I have experienced is really worth sharing. I started with my arrival at the hotel with the smile as people from the entrance area greeted me with enthusiasm, check in was smooth and people at the reception were awesome. Concierge also helped me with my luggage. Upon entering the room, I noticed that it was neatly prepared and all the amenities I need were there. So two thumbs up for that! After settling I visited the surrounding and to my excitement I was definitely glad that food placed were near and taxis were not a problem to get. So location wise the property is deFinitely a 5STAR! The next day, breakfast at

title: Excellent Service by Joe Kok & Mia
desc: Joe was very sincere, served us and took meticulous care of our check-in, wedding arrangement and administration preparation. He made us feel very welcomed and special with personalised attention. He shared his experience and clearly explained to us the benefits we were entitled to during our stay. He made sure that we had everything we needed before leaving. Mia explained and discussed with us the the amenities arrangement and make sure we had the necessary contact numbers to ensure a smooth stay. Good work and great service by ParkRoyal on Bench Road.

title: Anniversary Surprise!
desc: It was our anniversary so we booked a staycation in this hotel. The lobby was okay and quite busy but it was refreshing being greeted by friendly frontdesk staff, thank you to the two friendly guys Allen & Raj. The room was so good and we were surprised with the chocolates and arrangement they did in the room. Such a lovely touch which we didn't expect. We really felt valued, especially when the manager named michel called to check on us. Thank you for a making our anniversary stay so special!

title: Very underrated property
desc: Booked a club room nearby the F1 pit for the Sundown Marathon weekend and was hosted by Tina and Nina from the Club Concierge. When we informed them that my friend and I will be resting after the overnight marathon, we were given a late check out of 2PM. We stay in the Club Premier Room and the room was of high quality. The bathroom was full of facilities and the bathtub was big, especially great for me who wanted to use it after for recovery after a long run. The other parts of the room were pretty as well and well furbished, perhaps the only part that is lacking a proper working desk. We also used the complimentary benefit of meeting room usage for our stay and we really liked the intimacy the space of the meeting room. The club lounge though smaller than other Pan Pacific

title: Mrs Atlanta
desc: The Customer Service that was giving during our stay by Kurtis was Awesome. Kurtis made our experience here memorable. Thanks to this awesome team!! Kudos!!! 6th Floor Customer Service Rocks!! I recommend..

title: Wonderful
desc: Stayed here for a few nights, fabulous hotel. Amazing breakfast every morning. Very good location. Staff so very friendly and efficient, especially Dilla. She is so welcoming. Would definitely return again.

title: Warm welcome
desc: I go to Park Royal every quarter and each time I am there they treat me warmly with a personalized touch. Always nice going back to PR. Service from the time you get off your cab to the tome you check out is consistently great.

title: Not suitable for wheelchair users
desc: To be clear, we were there for lunch and not to stay. There is no handicapped toilet stall on the entire ground floor of the hotel, including the restaurant, and we could hardly get the wheelchair through the main door of the restaurant washrooms. Disappointing. We won't be back.

title: Excellent service by Jun Ming
desc: We had our wedding lunch banquet at ParkRoyal on Beach Road Sky Ballroom on 16th June and Jun Ming was our Banquet Manager. When we came for our food tasting 2 months ago, Jun Ming made sure that everything was well done, took our comments and feedback seriously. He was humorous and friendly and really helped us to enjoy our meal. He even went the extra mile to ask the chef to prepare one serving of yam paste for us when what we ordered was aloe vera, just so we could decide on our choice of desserts. All our guests were very satisfied with the food on the actual day and complimented that all the dishes were well done and delicious! Jun Ming is very meticulous and used his experience to suggest ideas to us so that our march in will look more spectacular. He is very

title: Spectacular location
desc: This medium priced hotel was in a perfect location for the Bugis Kampong Glam area which was just across the road providing lots of restaurants and action. The hotel was clean and efficient and service was good.

title: Value for money
desc: Hotel is at a Good location and refurbished rooms were comfortable. Property is definitely value for money. .. Service was better than expected too. Staff were accommodating and attentive... F&B outlets have improved too.

title: Wedding Banquet - Thanks Teri
desc: Attended a family wedding lunch banquet, on 22 June 2019. Everything was normal. Nothing much to shout about. However, Teri was very friendly, attentive and prompt. This left an impression. She stood out from the rest to me. I had a very pleasant dining experience. Please treat her well! She is great! Thanks again Teri!

title: Thanks for the good stay
desc: Hotel is just right place and the staff is very friendly especially Esther in orchid club. She will take care of your need and always willing to help. Pool is very good and all the restaurant and bar is very good. Room very quite and the bed is very coomfy and we sleep very well.

title: So great service
desc: Great service at the club lounge and special attention from the team. Very service oriented and I was amazed when Maezel was greeting people and welcoming back few guests to the hotel. Feel like coming back home.

title: First visit in Singapore
desc: Amazing hotel, location and staff. Esther are amazing and very cooperative and helpful. Room are very spacious, clean and good quiet breakfast at the club lounge. Swimming pool is very nice and clean.

title: Excellent stay!
desc: I was attending a business conference and stayed in the executive level. The service was friendly and impeccable! I'd like to particularly acknowledge Christina and Nina for being like my PA away from home!! THANKYOU!!

title: Great stay
desc: Had a fantastic time at this hotel, very nice reception and rooms. The pool and gym are great. Had beakfast each morning which was lovely and fresh. Staff very friendly and also welcoming. A lady called Dilla gave us some great advice on where to visit, lovely lady. We would recommend this hotel and stay again.

title: Great place to stay with friendly staff and outstanding service
desc: I chose this hotel for location, pricing and facilities. First visit to Singapore so we were excited to visit and experience all that it has to offer. Hotel room was clean, tidy and the bed was excellent, a good night sleep after long days of walking around. The staff were all friendly, consistently acknowledged us each and every time and were there to help with any questions. The Pool area was awesome and you needed a swim with the humidity!Breakfast included was great, the Chinese restaurant was outstanding (Best Crab fried rice EVER!) Take 5 was a bit of fun and staff there were excellent. We will definitely stay again on our next visit. Well done Park Royal Singapore!

title: Wedding Lunch on 15 June 2019
desc: We had our wedding lunch on 15 June 2019 and we are extremely grateful to have Jun Ming and his team assisting us. They were accommodating to our requests and ensured that everything went smoothly. Jun Ming even offered my wife a cup of water halfway through our table to table photo-taking. A reason we selected this venue was also because of the blinds which can be raised after popping of champagne. Our guests liked the idea and complimented on the good service they received. We are very impressed and highly recommend Park Royal Beach Road Sky ballroom for couples to hold their banquet.

title: Good Heritage lunch buffet at Ginger Restaurant
desc: My husband and I visited Singapore and we wanted to try the heritage lunch buffet there. They have everything that we wanted to try. Lots of varities, satay, laksa, chicken rice, curry and many others. Food is tasty and service is good. Price is reasonable. I would love to come again next time I visit Singapore !

title: Orchid Club Lounge VIP Service
desc: My husband and I had stayed in Parkroyal hotel on beach road, on June 2019. We will like to thank to Esther and chef Ai Fang got they exceptional VIP services. They are definitely the asset of Parkroyal hotel. We will be back again very soon. Once again thank you for everything.

title: Amazing Hotel
desc: Overall an Excellent Hotel. Just across Arab street where you can find lots of good restaurants/cafes. Fast internet connectivity, friendly service from reception to concierge staff, cleanliness 10/10. Sound proofing of room door can be improved. Can hear other guests walking pass the corridor, talking /shouting, slamming doors. I am a light sleeper and woke up several times in the middle of the night.

title: Fantastic Club Stay
desc: Fantastic hotel in the most convenient location around city. Breakfast at club was great with lots of different selection. I only stayed for 2 nights but the staff at the Club especially Maja made me feel at home. Very welcoming, always smiling and helpful with any assistance we require during the stay. Highly recommended!

title: A PLEASANT STAY
desc: i had a very warm welcome from Lynn at the front desk when i checked in. When the duty manager Dillah realised that i have mobility problems, she moved me immediately to a suite where the shower room is accessible. Taka, Jimmy and staff from the concierge is always there to help without being asked. Although there were a few hiccups in the beginning, the staff were quick to apologise and put things right quickly. It would be great if all the staff speak English. All in all, i had a pleasant stay and will be happy to return to this hotel in my next visit.

title: Biz hotel
desc: I stay with this hotel a bit frequent since it is under my discovery loyalty program. It is normal business hotel. The good thing here is large bed with very comfortable mattress and pillows. It is really good for having good sleep after long day in a meeting. Amenity is ok. I like ginseng soap comes up with natural smell, but they don’t provide same good sense with bath gel! They place only simple amenities if you need shaving kit, body lotion or cotton buds you have to ask. Another good this is 24hr fitness center. Also pool is closed quite late by 10pm. Since it is a business hotel, it is really hard to expect for a plenty of buffet in the morning. I realize they have only few choices swapping each day. For example, Japanese choice will serve you soba with dipping sauce.

title: Spacious room and convenient location
desc: The room is quite spacious, just find the bed a bit higher compare to others but very comfy. Location is very convenient, the walking distance to both either bugis or nicoll highway mrt station are quite short.

title: Ginger
desc: Great Service, attentive and friendly staff especially Lisa. Had a pleasant dining experience. Only disappointment is the Salted egg crab. It's too sweet and no salted egg taste. Perhaps could add a few more dessert items.

title: All is well when ends well
desc: first of all there about 4 or 5 hotels with this name so you must know also the address check in was unpleasant because the receptionist who took care of us. finally we received the room on the executive floor, room which i realy recomand to be booked. big room big balcony you have everything you need. breakfast was very good plenty of choices.it fits more the asian guest than the european buffet dinner we came late so they recomanded a la carte except the reception, the service at the f and b dpt was lacking the smile and the welcome we did not use the pool we just visited it and it looked good, realy good reception manager was of great help location very good close to some important tourist attractions by walking distance

title: Family hotel near Haji Lane
desc: When my husband and I, with his 2 senior parents and our 1-yo daughter in tow, went to Singapore for a wedding last month, we were looking for a hotel which offered a cot in the room. One of the options I found was this hotel and that, on top of the price, was the main consideration at that time. Location: The hotel is just across Haji Lane and Arab St, quite convenient when you go hungry. The nearest MRT is around a 10-15-minute walk so if you're not used to walking, it would be better to take a taxi. Rooms: We got the most basic room and we were placed in a level that was recently renovated. The room was clean, spacious and comfortable. We loved it! They also replenish the water bottles everyday. Service: The staff, particularly the front desk and concierge, were fantastic.

title: THE STAFF MAKE OUR STAY SO ENJOYABLE
desc: Just stayed 10 nights at the Parkroyal on Beach Road for the 5th Year running and every year we are never let down. The rooms, facilities, location are all perfect. All is made so great by the staff from the minute we step foot onto the 6th floor for check in....being greated by some familiar faces , getting great service during our stay till the sad time of departure when we say our good byes.We will be back in 2020. Special thanks to Christine, Maja,Mia, Ester, Mazel and Kirtis....while at times you are under pressure you always give us the personal touches and attention ....A big thanks

title: Great hotel!
desc: I have stayed in Grand Park and Park Royal hotels whenever I am in Singapore. My first time to stay in Park Royal Hotel Beach Road for a symposium. Their location is great with restaurants, shopping centers and MRT stations near to the hotel. My stay was very relaxing with a very comfortable bed. Staff were accomodating and professional especially Patricia in the concierge/ reception area and Mei Mei of the cleaning staff. Will definitely be back and highly recommend the hotel.

title: Very good and well located Singapore hotel
desc: We stayed here in July for 5 nights as a family in 2 rooms at the start of a holiday around the Far East - we had booked and paid for the hotel in the UK as part of a tailor-made tour with a rate that included breakfast. Upon arrival, we had to wait for longer than the standard check in time to get our rooms as the hotel had missed than one room needed to be a triple. However, we used the pool for a couple of hours whilst waiting, which made the time go quickly. Unfortunately the 2 rooms we were allocated were not adjacent but on different floors of the hotel (one on the 3rd, one on the 6th), which wasn’t exactly convenient - especially as you are restricted to the floor of your room in the lifts. Hotel rooms were very clean and quiet with standalone showers instead of baths

title: Super, modern hotel
desc: Loved my stay here. Modern and clean with welcoming staff who went out their way to call me by my name and assist all the time. Loved the pool and the spa. Great location too within walking distance of shops, Arab quarter and subway stations. Plus there are a couple of Starbucks nearby too!

title: An Oasis staffed by GREAT STAFF
desc: First stopover on a long holiday which set the standard for all other hotels to follow. Great location, very good facilities (and pool), very good restaurant - but outstanding staff. Our every need or query was quickly responded to by reception and concierge staff. we could not recommend this hotel more highly. Yes it is undergoing minor refurbishment out the front, but this did not detract from a great stay. The staff all desrve the GEM Award for Going the Extra Mile.

title: Trip to Singapore
desc: Hotel was clean, staff were very friendly and the facilities were excellent. Excellent pool which wasn't too busy, good gym and great choice of restaurants and bars within the hotel. Hotel is situated in a great location.

title: Holiday at Parkroyal on Beach Road
desc: We stayed at the parkroyal on Beach Road for 2weeks at the end of July and thoroughly enjoyed it, very friendly and professional staff, one that stood out to us was John the doorman, nothing was to much trouble and he always stopped for a chat,it was my wife's birthday and our wedding anniversary during our stay and the hotel put on a lovely plate of goodies for us, would recommend the breakfasts,big variety available, location was excellent,, thanks again Parkroyal on Beach Road for making our holiday a memorable one.Alan and Leigh Rust

title: Appreciation
desc: I want to take few moments to express my admiration for the staff on the orchid floor. They were amazing in discharging their duty. Their over all performance was excellent. They were courteous and paid great attention to details. They represented the hotel with grace and charm. I will always come back again and recommend this hotel to my peers. Best Aloysius joseph New York USA aj30301@gmail.com

title: Muslim prayers 5 times a day annoying
desc: Muslim prayers 5 times a day annoying, hotel ok, their english average, had to wait for drinks by the pool for an hour because of staff shortage, lady at upstairs breakfast was lovely, the doorman (the one with no teeth) was friendly & helpful, tv was tiny, upgraded room on 7th floor was great,

title: Great Hotel & Excellent Staff
desc: This was our first time in Singapore and the first stop over on our family holiday adventure. I booked an Orchid Club Premier double and a twin room and both of these rooms was made available with my bed preferences and was on the same floor. Upon arrival the luggage was quickly seen to by the hotel porters and check in was initially done downstairs but then we was taken up to the club lounge reception and wow what an amazing area of the hotel. Maezel and Mia greeted us and took all the relevant details and finalised the check in process. They even went out of their way to give my mother a wonderful surprise cake whilst providing some party wear props and decorating her room to wish her a happy 60th birthday, which was greatly appreciated. We was always greeted with smiles and

title: Blissful peace in the middle of the city
desc: I had a great stay at the Park Royal on Beach Road. It was handy for sight seeing and activities, day and night. After a busy day, to come back to a beautiful room and comfy bed was just the thing. I enjoyed cooling off at the pool with a swim and a cocktail. Just the thing. Nothing was too much for the staff, who were all friendly and kind and who did their jobs well. I arrived tired and stressed and left, feeling relaxed and happy.

title: Staycation to celebrate Anniversary
desc: Decided to check in this hotel where we had our wedding banquet here. Decent room size except is on 2nd floor! This is the lowest level I ever stayed in hotels. TV sharp clear view is a big plus. Toiletries not much to rave. Uploaded hotel in room menu for reference.

title: Excellent Stay!
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights from June 29-July2. Our stay was great! This hotel is at a great location with attractions nearby. There is a pedestrian bridge right across this hotel which you can walk to Haji Lane and Arab St., a great food and shopping hub. I must say that this hotel is clean and it’s staff is super friendly and helpful. The pool is big and clean. Staff is always present around the pool. We booked two rooms with King beds and Orchid Club access. Check-in process was smooth. Front desk lady named Lynn was courteous and fast. Each floor has its own service desk with staff present 24x7. Our floor manager was Maja Tolentino. Maja is an excellent person, so cool, caring and helpful. She made sure our questions answered whenever we needed anything. She

title: Disrespected by staff
desc: I stayed here with my father, mother, and in-laws. I was charged a $300 deposit, while they were only charged $100. What Is the implication there? Also, our room was far inferior to my parents’ and in-laws’. Even though we were all on my reservation and I payed the same Price for all the rooms. My wife and I were given a room with no privacy, and an awful view. Also, we were not equipped with coffee. I am extremely disappointed to find out that not everyone gets the same level of service here, and I will avoid this hotel next time I travel to Singapore.

title: perfect nice hotel
desc: Perfect location, easy to get food. Staff are friendly they are remember the name. Hotel room was Clean, and with Nesspresso Coffe Machine make the room is perfect. Not so many hotel equipped with this Nespresso .

title: Perfect stay as usual
desc: Thank you to all the staff on the 6th floor. They are a credit to your hotel. Always greeted with a huge smile when visiting the lounge.. Food and drink in lounge was excellent everyday. Would advise recommend anyone booking to pay the extra for floors 6 or 7 with lounge access.

title: The perfect stay
desc: Excellent staff from check in to room service. Friendly and efficient. Made me and my family want to stay longer. The location of the hotel made it ideal to walk around and catered to both adults and children

title: the best hotel that i was said after shangri -la
desc: i was there from 21 july to 24 july and the service staff from the telephone operator ,the front desk girls ,the bellman ,the lady in 6 floor and the room service staff have make my stay a memorable once .I still can listen the vibes and the clear voice of the telephone operator who answer my call and assist on my need .the once that make felt special that every request i asked will be assist and there is staff who call and check whether i received the item and do i need further assistance .To all this hotel is the once that you should stay if you in singapore .this few name that i can remember as their service to me is from their heart and i always remember them .....maya .noor i always remember them for their clear voice of greeting when i press 0 the bellman jimmy a gem of

title: Massive pool with view
desc: A great hotel for a family holiday - close to the best parts of Singapore and with a massive pool with a spacious deck and view to Marina Sands, perfect for winding down at the end of the day. Buffet breakfast provides options from all over the world. Joe Kok was very helpful for us at reception.

title: Conference and Banquet
desc: I came here to attend a 3-day Asian Conference on Crime and Operations Psychology. Surprised that the entire adjoining building ball room areas and lobby were specifically catered for the conference. Grand and Sky ball rooms were spacious and can accommodate all the participants. I was here 3 days and the environment was so conducive for learning. The atmosphere was relaxing and the presentations by the various psychologists anspecialists were mind provoking. The sound system was perfect and there was no disruption. The organizing committee of psychologists really understand human nature and has scouted for the best hotel to suit everyone's learning needs. I came very early and was greeted by the hotel staff at the entrance of the conference hall. It was not easy greeting

title: Great luxurious hotel with great staffs
desc: Amazing hotel with great facilites, comfy and well decorated rooms, perfect location and to top it off, wonderful staffs who are friendly and welcoming. Definitely recommended you go for a Orchid Club Premier room with lounge access !

title: Fabulous !
desc: Stayed in a 2 bedroom serviced suite great location,clean rooms and very friendly / helpful staff.John the doorman kept us entertained and was very helpful ! Would definately recommend to families and groups.

title: Great Stay!
desc: Well-renovated hotel in an interesting location near the Arab quarter. Very clean, light and spacious rooms with great beds for a very good night's sleep. Staff at the Executive Lounge - Mia, Maezel, Christina and gang - offer excellent service; professional, very helpful yet congenial. Concierge are attentive, prompt and helpful. A great hotel to come back to - time and again.

title: Comfortable
desc: I enjoyed 2 nights in this very nice hotel. Relatively small compared to the giants of the city so felt welcoming. Nice room and a really good varied breakfast. Good location for the historic parts of town and not far to the new shiny parts. 20sgd taxi ride to the airport.

title: Another Great Stay!
desc: Every time we visit Singapore, I always look forward to our stay at Orchid Club - the staff take care of us throughout our stay and exceed our expectations all the time. The staff who clearly stands out to us again is the beautiful young lady named Maja - she remembers us from our previous stay and never disappoints to provide us impeccable service. The facilities of the Club is also in tip-top condition. What more can you ask for?

title: Relaxing and friendly
desc: Spent a few days at the Park Royal waiting on family to arrive the staff were extremely helpful especially Kurtis, Maia and all the team on the 6th floor. Readily accessible to many areas either by walking or catching the hotel shuttle bus.

title: Staycation
desc: Stayed one night for a staycation. Great services. Great staffs! The kids enjoyed themselves at the pool. Do take note that one side of the pool is 2.45m. Great variety of selection for breakfast as well.

title: One of the best hotels I've stayed at, little to now flaws and it felt good to come back to the room after a long day.
desc: PARK ROYAL on Beach Road is absolutely one of the best hotels out there in Singapore. I don't even know where to start, everything about the hotel was pretty much perfect. The staff were very welcoming and polite as soon as I stepped into the hotel. The facilities available were amazing, the pool had a wonderful view and the pool itself is very clean and feels good to swim in. The gym also welcomes you too a variety of equipment to work out with at a high quality. The room was wonderful, the beds were comfortable to sleep in and the room gives you plenty of extra space. The bathroom was perfect, nothing bad to say about it. One of the best things I have to say is where the hotel is located. It is so convenient, there are a variety of restaurants in front of the hotel and there

title: Our preferred hotel in Singapore
desc: I just don’t know where to start. This is a exceptionally great hotel with extremely professional staff throughout. We arrived early in the morning and was offered early check in without even asking. The front office staff truly delighted us with this experience. Our 6 nights stay was perfect from start to end. This is the reason why we keep coming back here. Location was great, hotel offered great amenities and also has an extremely good in house spa facility. Since our flight out was at night, we were given a late check out too. Overall, the experience exceeded our expectations time & time again.

title: Comfortable hotel
desc: Nice and cosy. Had a wonderful sleep. Staff are warm and welcoming. Very relaxing place to rest in. Breakfast is ok. Has a wide variety to choose from, ranging from congee to different breads. Do need to refill faster as some of the food was cleared very fast. Overall a nice comfortable stay

title: Amazing hospitality and unforgettable stay
desc: The Park Royal on beach Road hotel is a real gem! We stayed at the hotel as a family of 4 and truly enjoyed the hospitality. This was our 4th stay and as always its very welcoming.The staff throughout the hotel were very professional, friendly and extremely helpful. We arrived relatively early and were amazed by the hospitality given to us. Everyone is so welcoming that it feels like coming home. Also a special mention to a few people who has made our stay unforgettable. Ms Herlin Leman who always ensuring we were well looked after, Ms Dillah Nazeri ensuring our late check out was smooth, the daily greetings from all the bell men making us feels special - Vijay, Dan, Viknesh and few others too. Also special thanks to Ms May and Ms Rita as the Ritual Massage is out of this

title: Anniversary weekend
desc: The staff were friendly and the concierge were helpful. The pool area had a great view. Ginger had a variety with their buffet which was fine. Some dishes were delicious and others just not to our taste. However, overall it was satisfactory. Club 5 had a fun vibe with a DJ there. Our room was on the second floor facing the front of the hotel. There was construction, however the noise wasn’t too bad. Our king size bed was very comfortable and the amenities were all there except the lotion. We loved the free bottles of water👍🏼. Location of this hotel was wonderful. Two mrt close by and taxis were readily available. If you like to walk, Haji Lane and other areas to shop and eat are across the street. We had a lovely stay for our first trip in Singapore. Thank you ParkRoyal

title: hotel was wonderful
desc: this hotel was close to everything close to mrt the hotel rooms were very clean for such a large hotel it was very quite in our room we were on the 4th floor the pool area was great lovely views from the pool over all we love the hotel would stay there again

title: Our go to place - does not disappoint
desc: We have stayed at this hotel quite a few times now and we love it. The staff in the Club Lounge are always welcoming and friendly.
