There's one lady's name that I don't recall so it would be unfair of me to list the names of the special staff who, once again, provided us with outstanding service during our recent visit. The chefs should also be acknowledged as also they also do a wonderful job. The pricing of drinks in the bar and the pool bar is too high and next time we would drink elsewhere. See you again later in the year.

title: Comfortable hotel great location
desc: Stayed for two nights on our way home from Europe to New Zealand, this was a great place to relax and unwind. Our flight arrived early but we were able to leave our bags and use the pool and showers until we could check in. The pool is large and lots of seating and recliners, my only complaint was the price of a beer. The room itself was big and very comfortable, great bathroom and amenities and the location superb. We could walk to a lot of local attractions or just a few minutes walk across the highway over bridge to the Metro.

title: HAD A GREAT TIME !
desc: we were invited to a friend's wedding at Park Royal Beach Rd on 17th Aug 2019. Event was at Sky Ballroom. went with my mum, who had been using her walking stick due to Knee prob. As it was our first time there, i approached the concierge counter for directions. Greeted warmly by this lady "Assalamualaikum", attending malay wedding?she pointed us to the right direction and even walked my mum up the stairs,at the same time made us felt very welcomed. May sound like a simple gesture.. It was so genuinely helpful of her. i wanted to thank her afterwards but she wasnt there anymore. Please extend my warmest regards & thanks to Suhaila . Overall the venue, the food , the service was great ! will be glad to recommend Park Royal to all my friends & family

title: THE HOTEL STAFF ALWAYS READY TO SOLVE OUR PROMBLEM
desc: I stay at this hotel last week and at the above mentioned hotel and two of the service staff wins my heart .FIRSTis the bellman name farhan who without fail greet me and smile at all time and assist me on the transport me on the transport that i need (HE CAN RECOMMEND ME A TRANSPORT THAT FAST TO MY LOCATION .......the second outstanding is the telephone operator who answer my call by call me by my name AND ASSIST ME ON MY NEEDS AND HIS KNOWLEDGE ABOUT SINGAPORE IS A POINT BONUS FOR THE HOTEL ...OH HIS NAME IS NOR AND HIS VOICE ALWAYS MAKE FELT HAPPY AND ALWAYS MAKE MY DAYS .DEAR hotel manager well done as you have train your this 2 staff a value of service .NOW WHEN ANY OF MY FRIEND WANT TO VISIT SINGAPORE ONLY PARK BEACH ROAD ON MY MINE ..

title: love the staff service
desc: From the manager to the ground staff is outstanding with their service and their special touch really from their heart ..first is the manager Ray who assist me on getting the room i want and the call to see how is my stay ,second staff is the lady from club who always happy smile even she seems busy she still smiling or her name is Irene .3 staff is the once who main the swimming pool who always there to make sure we are safe .4 staff is the room service staff who always smile when sent the food and his service is the same with 5 star hotel staff his name is Aminruli .5 staff is the lady who clean my room her name kew and she even cannot speak english but any of my request she will sent .6 telephone operator who always have a cheerful and nice melody voice when answer the call

title: staff who did not know to said NO
desc: Sorry for late reviews as i was busy with my meeting and never have time to share my view ...okay there is a few think that this hotel is above their rating as they fit to be 5 star hotel .1 is the bellman a Indian guy who always smile and assist us on our need .The reception is helpful and try their best to participate our need .There is once of this hotel staff that if i have a opportunity TO HAVE MY BUSINESS in Singapore i would recruit him to work with me ,it because he always answer my call with the same tone by calling by name ,Assist me on my need ,Answer all my question ,Will always check whether i get all my request and i delighted to have he always answer my call until i felt that he like a friend and his name always on my mine (his name is Nor) that i always heard

title: Great example for Good Staff
desc: I came with my husband for vaccation...i am pregancy also..everything the hotel is very nice,the one girl staff very friendly & helpful throughout the stay.the staff name SHUAILA..i feel compartable for her & any enquires she tell clearly..and she more help for us..thank u so much SHUAILA.this moment is memorable and i never forget her .surely i will come back again..Thank you

title: Best Hotel
desc: This is a great hotel to stay in, central to most things in Singapore, easily accessible for sightseeing etc. . Service was great, staff were very friendly, nothing was too much trouble. Rooms are clean.

title: Great Hotel with Excellent Service!
desc: Was there some time in August with my family. Everything about the hotel was impeccable! Makes us want to stay there longer. Yes! The service by the staffs there was top notch with everyone smiling and making us feel at home. A shoutout to one of the staff named Suhaila. Was asking her directions to the pool and my kids went crazy and all excited, she gave us clear directions and also took time to entertain the kids for that brief moment which I felt was from the heart! Kudos to Suhaila and team for making this stay a memorable one!

title: Leadership Program
desc: They did it again! Impeccable service from entire Banquet Team! Specialy mentioned to Farihin, Jun Ming, Yusof from AV provides an unforgettable experience that is beyond words! I am always looking forward to hold my event in your hotel ballroom. Had the most events held in you hotel the past 1.5 years and these are the GEMs who have consistently providing an excellent service. Not forgetting, the lady behind this coordination, Linda Bakar from Events. Even though it is the Events Team that I am always lasing with, the Front Office Team never fail to make my 'stay' a memorable ones too. Always so quick and efficient with any request, Herlin and team. Keep it Up ParkRoyal!

title: Great location, great sleep, great service
desc: Stayed at the hotel in August- loved the service and the courteous service the Singaporeans are known for. The only issue was the breakfast buffet- by Singapore standards, far from good. Labels incorrect as well - indicated dishes that were not being served. Quality was just passe- a very average spread(quality) and has plenty of food for thoughts and improvement.

title: best hotel
desc: The best hotel to stay as all the staff are friendly and very outstanding an never never they will not help you so stay at the hotel for best service ...a few name that you should be serve dillah,lynn,dorathy,lisa,noor,keng hong,steven,mai,cindy and all the strongman at the driveway

title: Wonderful stay for kids
desc: My kids just loved the room once they stepped in. The kids tent and soft toy provided in the room were really brought the joy to my kids. They also enjoyed the games - Nintendo Switch by the pool area, the pool attendant Mr Lim was very helpful and friendly to set up the games for us and serve us ice water. I was really impressed when the concierge staff Mr Raj greeted me by name each time he saw me. We loved the pool and its view. The only down side was, we were asked to swim at one side of the pool due to their yoga on water lesson. The string they tied below the water level across the pool which to secure their floating mats may pose a hazard. My kids begged me to bring them back again as they just loved all the children activities provided by the hotel, and for sure

title: Great Stay in Parkroyal Beach Road
desc: We stayed on the club floor hotel rooms in Parkroyal beach road for stop over. The room was clean and neat. Club floor staffs are professional and always with a smile. We would like to thank Kurtis and concierge staff for taking care of us. They are very helpful and polite. Keep it up! =) Location of the hotel is very good, as it is only 10 mins away from the MRT station and close to the Arab Street.

title: Holiday to visit my daughter who lives in Singapore
desc: Had an enjoyable stay at this hotel from 4th to 8th of August. Our arrival was special and from that day on it was just fantastic. The doors were opened for us each time we walked in and at all time service went beyond our expectations. The staff are so courteous, attentive and kind attitude. The attention to our needs by Kurtis and Mia was excellent. Rooms were very clean and spacious with decent views. Pool area is very nice. Hotel also features a rooftop swimming pool with a Jacuzzi and fitness center. Another good feature of hotel is its locality. It is conveniently located in the heart of the city. Just a 5 mins walking distance from Bugis (MRT railway station). Enjoyed our stay immensely. Well done to the team at Park Royal Beach Road. Will definitely be back and highly

title: Pleasant Hotel, Good Location!
desc: The hotel is within walking distance of the popular Marina Bay Area. The staff are friendly and the prices reasonable. Only gave it 4 stars as did not get a chance to try the food and there were building works going on, the time we were there. But definitely a more sensibly priced alternative to the more expensive Marina Bay Area hotels and has a great pool! ;0)

title: Nice hotel and friendly staff
desc: Love their pool, the kids enjoy it very much. Pool staff is friendly and smiley. Location was very near to the city. Easily accesss to everywhere. I would love to take this opportunity to send my gratitude to Ken Hew, the receptionist. Although is late night but he helps me with all my questions and gives helpful tips too. Thank you Parkroyal and Ken for the lovely stay. Definitely will be back again.

title: Holiday to visit my son who lives in Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel with extremely friendly staff. Superb location with the MRT close by. Good choice of bars locally with a great atmosphere. We would definitely choose to stay at the Park Royal when we visit again.

title: Quiet & convenient to MRT
desc: Stayed in a club floor room & found the room very clean & comfortable. Huge bathroom with a large deep bath & separate large shower. Plenty of toiletries but oddly no body lotion which other hotels of this standard have. Room had excellent curtains to keep out heat & light for jet lagged people trying to sleep. Club room facilities are of a very good standard with many ample savoury & sweet choices for breakfast & in the evening. Again, oddly for a hotel of this standard, sparkling wine was only offered on a Wednesday, rest of the time had red & white wine, beer & some spirits only. All staff were very friendly & attentive with special mention going to Mia who was a delight!

title: Friendly staff, great location
desc: We love our stays in Singapore, but haven't stayed at this hotel before. After our recent visit this may become our preferred hotel! We arrived a day earlier than our tour which meant some changes to our booking - these first impressions were top notch. The manager, Joe Kok, made sure our stay would be first rate. The room and restaurant were excellent, and the location is terrific. A short walk finds a number of attractions and lots of eating places. We would highly recommend .....

title: Great Staff
desc: Wonderful staff. They went above and beyond for us. Big thanks to Kurtis and Mia for making us feel at home. Room was very clean and comfortable. Very well presented. Loved the dining room facilities.

title: Brilliant Place and Service.
desc: Thanks to all the staff. Special thanks to Kurtis, Bill Esther, Maja, Christina. 🤗 Lovely room and exceptional house keeping. Mind you we were on the top floor, 7th, with a balcony. Love to come again.

title: Great Location and Great Service
desc: Fortunate to stay in the PARKROYAL on beach road for 3 days and had a wonderful time. Stayed at level 6 with the complimentary orchid club and receive a brilliant service from a lady call Esther. She could not be more pleasant and helpful. The food in the club was fantastic and so convenience. The location is great, close to hugs junction the Arad quarter and local bars and restaurants without the cost of Orchard road. Would stay again because of the service from the team of Orchid Club

title: Excellent hotel for hosting an International Scientific Meeting
desc: I recently arranged an International Scientific Meeting for 125 delegates at the ParkRoyal Hotel on Beach Road. My experience with the sales and catering teams was exceptional. The Sky ballrooms were perfect for our meetings with excellent data projectors and screens. The food prepared for our breaks and lunches was of outstanding quality and there was more than enough for our delegates to enjoy. The recently renovated guest rooms met all of our delegates' needs, with a variety of options available to them. The pool was a wonderful place for relaxation and we enjoyed our welcome reception poolside, again with fabulous food and beverages. Many of our delegates also commented on the 24 hour fitness centre and the excellent showers and changing room facilities which many used if

title: Service with difference standard from the staff .
desc: This is My first time in parkroyal hotel and the first stop over to this Hotel I booked an Orchid Club Premier with my bed preferences and was on the same floor of the Club Lounge Upon arrival the luggage was quickly seen to by the hotel porters and check in was done downstairs but then I was taken up to the club lounge reception and wow what an amazing area of the hotel.Which i see other hotel if you booked a club floor it will take us straight to the club for Check -IN Kurtis and Mia greeted me when i reached the level 6 . They even went out of their way to give a wonderful surprise providing a Welcome Drink was greatly appreciated. I was always greeted with smiles and a conversation whenever I went to the lounge. Thanks guys. The rooms are clean, spacious and

title: Realy Nice Hotel and Staff.
desc: We checked in at 8.30 am, we got told our room would not be availible until 3.00 pm, but we could pay extra and have an excative room, get in right away and have breakfast, so we did upgrade, best decision we have made, the room on the sixth floor was big and very nice, the floor had concierage / reception area an excative lounge / dining area, were you could get breakfast, (which was very good), a drink and latter drinks and nibbles from 6 pm (not sure what that was like as we didn't go to it). The staff on this floor were extremely good and very pleasant. We had dinner in the resturant which was good and again the staff were good. We would recommend this hotel to every one and will definitely stay here again when we are in Singapore.

title: Good Location
desc: We stayed here in an club room, which I would highly recommend. the rooms thou aren't very sound proof, and we were on the top floor, bed was comfortable and room very clean,. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Close to the MRT at Burgis The best thing with the hotel, its right across the street from the funky Arab quarter, do yourself a favour and pop overrthere, amazing.

title: Solid 4* just outside the city centre
desc: I stayed in this hotel for 6 nights in late September 2019. I stayed in a standard room, i.e. not an Orchid Club room. The room was excellent - very comfortable with effective a/c, a good comfortable bed, it was very clean, and everything worked. Service was excellent - the concierge staff were very helpful, and specifically a) gave me a bent paper-clip (!) to remove the sim tray from my iPhone (I'd bought a local sim and needed to install it), and b) weighed a second small bag I'd bought to transport some purchases home - this was necessary to work out if I was going to be over the baggage allowance for my flight home. I can't really comment on the restaurant as the only meal I ate there was breakfast. That was fine for my requirements - I'm not a great breakfast eater - and

title: Best Hotel located in the heart of Downtown Singapore
desc: I paid slightly higher price for this hotel as opposed to Park Royal in Kitchener road, mainly due to its location ! From Swimming pool to in-room service, reception and the restaurant, i had no issues. rooms and bathroom were spot on clean and the beds were very comfy !! Will definitely return !!!!

title: Lovely hotel
desc: We stayed here for 5 nights at the end of Sept/beginning of Oct. The room was luxurious and spacious. The staff were really helpful and friendly. The breakfast was varied and of very good quality. The hotel is in a good location, close to MRT station and all the sights. We highly recommend this hotel for a stay in Singapore.

title: Fabulous stay at the ParkRoyal on Beach Road and Singapore
desc: Had a weeks holiday in Singapore and was recommended to stay at the ParkRoyal on Beach Road. The check in at reception with Arifah was the start of a great stay, she was so accommodating, friendly and helpful. The room was lovely & clean. The pool area, gym and spa added to our stay. Great views from the pool. A lovely breakfast place not far down the road called Wakey Wakey was superb & great coffee. Concierge couldn’t be more helpful. Great location for the train or walking distance to visit areas and attractions.

title: Lovely trip
desc: Everything was lovely.I love how convenience this hotel is.Its so easy for us to explore other places.I went for a massage as well in the hotel.Lisa and Fazilah if i get her name right,such wonderful girls.Bidu is a gem.Definitely coming back for 2nd time.

title: Great Hotel
desc: Don't usually leave reviews...but just had to retell the amazing experience I had a few weeks back. Hotel location is spot on for travellers looking to shop and dine, as Bugis and Haji Lane are only a few walking minutes away. Pool was gorgeous, spa massage was great and value for money and the room excellent. Staff was all generally nice and polite. Special mention goes to Dila (not sure if I got it right) who made my check-in process the fastest I've ever experienced..very efficient staff and always smiling. Hope to return again.

title: Staycation
desc: First time staycation in this hotel. Family friendly, superb service from counter staffs and duty manager, Mr Joe Kok who goes extra mile to make our two children happy and comfortable. Also, extra added surprise by serving them ice cream. A wonderful hotel stay. We will definitely be back soon...

title: Great Hotel
desc: My partner and I stayed during the Formula 1 and had a great time. The hotel is a 5-10 Minute walk away from the track and nearby Shopping Mall. Our check in was quick and the room was really nice, big & modern. No complaints!

title: Compliments
desc: My experience in PARKROYAL on Beach Road is extremely satisfying. From the doorman onward it is all good all the way. Specifically. John the doorman and Jimmy the concierge are both tops in service. It made my stay feel very welcome. Thank you

title: Still fantastic
desc: My husband and I returned to this hotel after our last stay there in 2014. We loved it then and love it still. The staff are very friendly and helpful and nothing is too much trouble. We stayed in one of the Orchid Club rooms on level 6 and it is really worth the extra that you pay to stay there. The rooms are a great size and have been refurbished since our last stay. They look great and so modern and spacious, in particular the king size bed which was so comfortable after a very long fight. Another highlight of this hotel is that after a long day sightseeing you can return to the Orchid Club and enjoy complimentry wine, beer, and food between 6.00pm - 8.00pm each night. What a great way to relax at the end of a hot and tiring day. Staying in the Orchid Club rooms also

title: Welcoming and good hospitality
desc: Thank you to Ms Fadillah who has made my stay in Spore so welcoming and memorable. Also Thank you for your hospitality and friendly service. I will definitely be back and stay at the same hotel with my family.

title: SG Fun Day
desc: Loved the place! Feels homey and made us wanting to stay there longer. Accommodation is great. Shoutouts to Mia and Esther for helping us during our stay. Can’t wait to book another stay here for a weekend bonanza. Definitely will recommend!

title: Excellent refurbishment with great Orchid Club Lounge
desc: Location - the property is located along Beach Road, right opposite Haji Lane and its neighbouring alleys. Concourse is right next door which gives you access to a comparatively sad handful of F&B. Then you get The Plaza which is the smallish block of F&B located to the behind of the hotel. But all these places are un-sheltered access which means rain will cause plenty inconvenience. Nearest major mall will be Suntec City which is about10mins unsheltered way away. Price - SGD183.60++ = SGD$210nett for 2 pax under the Member's 14 Days Advanced Purchase rate. One of the cheaper staycation rates in Singapore. Prior to Arrival - with this rate in mind, I emailed the hotel to confirm the possibilities of the double upgrade so I know which room to book. The reservations team

title: The best and most personalised service I’ve ever received
desc: What a beautiful hotel situated so close to central Singapore! The room was beautiful and perfect, especially because of the comfortable bed and pillows. Furthermore, the receptionist named Patricia really made my stay a wonderful one from the beginning. She advised me and my friend about what there is to do around Singapore and even came to my room to gift me chocolates and a sweet note of her well wishes during my stay in Singapore. She really went the extra mile and is a truly an asset to this hotel. I have never received such lovely and genuine service, despite travelling often for business and pleasure. Park Royal on Beach Road will be first in my mind when I stay in Singapore again! 10/10 highly recommended!

title: Wonderful service, passionate staff,nice venue and nice rooms
desc: I selected parkroyal beach road as my wedding venue in early January this year. Halfway they sometime in april/may , the staff in charge resigned and left without informing. In a change of luck of things, Felicia Koh took over our case immediately. She immediately reviewed and took over our case very quickly. The time she took over was when the most coordination and detail planning was required. Felicia was detailed, experienced and is able to give us advice and recommendations. This shouldn't come as a surprise as we found out that she was with the hotel for a really huge part of her career since the earlier days. Under her expert guidance and assurance, we were able to get up to speed and get the event planned out smoothly. We were really thankful, quite embarrassed that we

title: Fantastic stay in Singapore!
desc: My husband and I just got back from a wonderful honeymoon in Singapore. We were very happy with the ParkRoyal on Beach Road. The staff were so friendly and helpful and couldn’t do enough for us. The bed was huge and the room modern and clean. Great pool area and in walking distance to Haji Lane which was so much fun and a great spot for afternoon drinks. A special mention to John the doorman, always greeting us with a big friendly smile, having jokes and a laugh with us and helping us with Taxi’s and tourist information. Allen on reception was also great to deal with and a huge help to us when a few things went wrong with our booking dates. We would definitely recommend the ParkRoyal on Beach Road and we will stay here again on our next trip.

title: Business Trip
desc: Great location, walking distance to Bugis and just in front of Arab Street & Haji Lane. Best rooms are on the 7F with access to the lounge located on the 6F. Got the King size bed, it has a bathtub with a separate shower cubicle. Had a private balcony, although view was the Pan Pacific Residences. Room size, it was spacious had the usual amenities i.e. Nespresso maker, ref, safe,etc. Include in your request that it be near the elevator. My room was at the farthest end of the corridor and the walk was quite long. Overall would stay back in the hotel. Trip to the airport only took about 15 mins and there’s always a taxi available in the lobby.

title: Another excellent stay
desc: I stayed at Parkroyal at the commencement of my trip through South East Asia. On arrival I was welcomed and quickly checked in. My room was large, clean and beautifully presented. The staff were all warm and welcoming, the breakfast selection was good and the location is ideal to head to local attractions. The hotel is currently upgrading their front facade however this did not disrupt normal business or travellers at all, and noise was minimal. Definitely recommended if you're looking for a solid hotel with great customer service.

title: Great Hotel
desc: We always stay at Parkroyal on Beach Road whenever we are in Singapore which can be 4 - 5 times a year. From the minute we arrive the porters welcome us back, the front office staff are very friendly, and the staff in the club floor lounge are the best. The rooms are also spotless and the most comfortable bed we have ever slept in.

title: Place to enjoy your holiday
desc: Good concierge and operator 24 hrs on duty.Concierge Vicky and Johnson very helpful and caring for the guest as they help me on a few thing and I appreciate it. The reception is the best place to walk pass as the staff always smile and welcome the guest with open arm . The operator are very good and they know singapore very well as all their suggestion was good and it really a tourist place and thank to Nor who suggest me to a nice indian rest to eat and i enjoy the food so much, thank Mr Noor for the good suggest as i and my family like

title: Good club lounge
desc: Having enjoyed a visit with friends here in July 2018, I returned by myself for a few nights in October. The staff in the Club Lounge, Mia Esther and Mazel, are very welcoming and took good care of all the guests, despite being run off their feet by the number of Australians in town for the Johnny Farnham concert. The food in the lounge is always great, the swimming pool has fantastic views and the location makes it readily accessible to all shopping precincts.

title: Excellent Staff
desc: We are regular visitors to the Park Royal Beach Road and want to commend the Orchid Club staff - Maja, Esther, Suhaila, Maezel and Mia for ther didicaiton to their guests. And a special mention to the boys at the front door, always welcoming and happy - Nicky, John, Dan, Taka & Caini. They set the scene of a great stay!

title: Very nice hotel worth upgrading to the Orchid club
desc: We stayed here for 2 nights in October. Checkin was quick which is always a bonus. The hotel is located across the road from the Arab Quarter, I definitely recommend a visit to this lovely section of Singapore. The beds were extremely comfortable and the room had a great shower with lots of hot water. The pool area is very nice and the pool is quite large and not too cold which is unusual for Singapore. The only negative I have is I ended up in the kids pool as the main pool is quite deep even at the shallow end. We upgraded to the Orchid club which was well worth the extra money. Great selection for both breakfast and dinner. Yes I will stay here again next time I visit Singapore

title: Pls stay at this hotel for Christmas as service is 100% Best
desc: Stayed there with love once. Building is old but room is clean and bed is comfy. Location is great as it is very near Haji Lane and Bugis. Near MRT Bugis station. Near high end shopping center and cheal finds in Bugis. Also, you can walked to Purvis street, National Library and Marina Bay Sands.This hotel is a pleasant surprise. The rooms were spacious and clean and the view of the city was fantastic! Hotel staffs were friendly, approachable and helpful. Free wifi and cable too as well s free parking. Location-wise it was just outside the fringes of the city but you can go anywhere from there as the MRT station is just a 2-3 mins a=walk away. FOOD is everywhere around this place. Don't forget to visit the original and old ZamZam restaurant opposite the equally old and majestic

title: 1st stay and yet the worst one ever!
desc: When i first checked in, the staff at the reception were gloomy and tired, no smile at all. But when i got into my room, it had this strong musty smell with the drilling sounds as well and i hated it. The pool was nice, calming and relaxing. The hotel service is not what i expected when i arrived in Singapore. Would never recommend this hotel.

title: Wonderful end of our 2 month holiday
desc: I would just like to thank the Parkroyal for a wonderful 5 night stay and especially Esther and Christina and all the staff up in the club room for their fantastic service and friendliness the food and drinks were great. Our room was beautiful so clean and the bed so comfortable and a fantastic shower. We had the buffet breakfast down stairs such a fantastic selection and so tasty.

title: Excellent
desc: I stayed here for 2 weeks in the club room which gave me access to the lounge, 2 items of clothing laundry for free each day and being a Black Card member I get $10 SGD credit for the mini bar each day. This is because the hotel cannot provide me with a double upgrade. The staff are excellent starting with John at the entrance. The club staff Maezel, Mia and Maja cater for all my needs such as arranging halal chicken curry and parata for me. I went down to the Spa and had a good massage by Rita. The hotel room is good but as a business travel it would be good to have a desk but the hotel arranged this for me. WiFi is very good and the location is perfect. Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Great place to stay
desc: We stayed for 3 nights on a stopover to Australia. The hotel is in a very location and close to MRT. The staff were very friendly, especially Allen on reception who was very friendly and efficient in dealing with our enquiries. Our room was spacious, very clean and with simple decor. The bed was exceptionally comfortable. An all round good hotel.

title: Comfortable hotel
desc: We stayed in this hotel due to our wedding back in Oct 19. The hotel location is at beach road, nearby there is many shopping centers and eateries. Before our arrival, the hotel staff has called us to confirm our arrival, after our arrival, we do not need to do check-in at the counter and the staff bring us up to our room directly and we do the check-in there. There is complimentary meal which is good as we do not have time for our lunch, so we ordered chicken rice and vegetarian bee hoon. The order take a bit long though, so when the food arrived it is not so hot. The hotel room is spacious and the aircon is quite cooling, not much of a scenery though as we are facing the nicoll highway side. I like to emphasize that this is the best sleep that I ever got as the bed is very

title: Wedding dinner at Park Royal
desc: Attended a friend’s daughter wedding dinner at Park Royal. There were 4 ballrooms at Level 1 at East Entrance. Carpark is just below entrance. Very convenient to park to get to ballrooms. The ballrooms look very new and recently renovated. Food and service was good.

title: good hotel - great staff
desc: great facilities at this hotel, but for me the staff really make it special. I have stayed in 3 other hotels in Singapore but have never felt so welcomed (either in Singapore or anywhere for that matter)... Maja, Mazael, Suhalia, Mia and Esther all looked after me wonderfully and spent time to get to know me. Also the hotel is well placed for Arab street and Haji street entertainment / restaurants. also a good sports / spa facility. :)

title: Excellent Location, Pool, Room
desc: Rating would have been excellent but for the fact that each time we went to reception we were talking to the same woman who lacked customer service skills! We had asked for a high floor with river/rear view but were given a third floor room facing the street/construction work - when we questioned this we were told we could have the room we wanted upon payment of ++dollars, we had not been advised of this on booking - so there you have it, what looks like a good deal might not be but it was the attitude of this person who got particularly stroppy when I mentioned trip advisor! Anyway, lovely room serviced well - such a comfortable bed,great linens, powerful shower, comfortable seating/desk. We asked for milk for the morning tea, did not use the restaurants. The pool is a

title: Fabulous hotel, fabulous staff, fabulous location.
desc: I was impressed with the professional yet friendly staff from the moment I arrived. The rooms I had were extremely comfortable and clean (extended my stay and upgraded). The convenience of the orchid lounge was a major factor to making my stay enjoyable. And particularly Maezel, Esther and Suhaila with their kind and caring service. This hotel is in a great location. I enjoyed the vibe of the village across from the hotel and the amazing architecture in and around beach road. The Hop on hop off bus stop is conveniently across the road. I hope to return.

title: Business trip - October 2019
desc: Very good hotel. Nice facilities. Buffet is expensive, but excellent. Lovely pool, and very good gym equipment. Good location near to trendy laneway eateries. Easy walk to Suntec shopping centre and marina district

title: Hotel with the staff who provide helpful and care service
desc: Thank to the staff who assist me on all my assistance .When i asked for a place to wash my laundry as i did not want to have a dryer ,he did advice me the nearest laundromat and also a direction to make sure i get to the place .When 2 days i asked for direction of place to buy some clothes that cheap this guy recommend me with a place that save me from spending more.When i need a taxi to airport he assist me with the right taxi and also arranged for bellman to pick up my luggage early in the morning. What make me happy with his lovely touch is to wish me a good flight and see me again is something even your bellman never wish me (a wish is also a prayer that we need )Thank Mr Noor a millon thank and not forgetting the guy who check me out his name is ken thank Mr ken and the guy

title: Done with a smile
desc: With only 7 floors, and built as a cresent, by Singapore standards posively a Boutique Hotel. Recently refurbished and with more being done to imrpove the entrance gardens it really is a first class establishnment. At one end of the concourse is a first class multi cuisine restatruant with Andri as an excellnt Restaurant Manger suppotred by well trained staff. At the other end us an equally impressive Chinese Restauarnt. So all tases are catered for at veery competive prices. Reception / Check out was equally impressi ve and the Conciegre staff led by Sam are really impresive. Over a 4 nught stay we were made to feel really special by staff who gave 110% and all "DONE WITH A SMILE".

title: Excellent customer service: Sue & Maezel
desc: Had a staycation for my 2nd Anniversary with my husband and I was heavily pregnant. Had abit of mixed up of my bookings/room confirmation but both friendly-smiley ladies were extremely kind & helpful, as Maezel retrieved/solved immediately with the right room confirmation without further delay. Sue on the other hand approached & assisted me with drinks/cookies at the Club Lounge area while waiting for the room to be ready. To my surprise, Sue even gave us complimentary chocolates/cookies (to our room) with well wishes card before heading home after her working hours. I find that was truly sincere & thoughtful of her to have done that. Professional and courteous. Will certainly look for them in my future stay here again. 5 stars for both Sue & Maezel pls.

title: Awesome trip
desc: The hotel was awesome we upgraded to gain use of the Orchid Lounge, Maezel and Sue were absolutely fantastic hosts and the made the stay even more pleasurable with their knowledge of the area and their bubbly personalities, definately worth it.

title: A cool sanctuary in Singapore heat
desc: Location, downtown adjacent to the Arab Quarter, the best spot for quirky bars, shops and delightful perfumes. The hotel sports a gym and sumptuous outdoor pool, with lots of room for lounging peacefully and a full bar. Ginger, the name of the restaurant, is large, buffet-style and is open early for breakfast. The beds were king-sized and so comfortable. Helpful and attentive staff. For $5 SGD you can be at the Raffles, or shopping.

title: Great hotel - location, comfortable/spacious room, friendly services, breakfast & swimming pool. Costs creeping up.
desc: Park Royal Hotel, Beach Road, Singapore Two years back we passed through Singapore and, based on a personal recommendation, stayed at the Park Royal for a few days – it turned out to be a good choice. Check out the previous review from June 2017 - good things were much the same this time round too. Negatives? This time they were hardly worth mentioning. The Park Royal delivers. As you’d expect the place was much the same – crescent shaped structure rising to seven stories on Beach Road opposite the ‘Arab Quarter’. For those of you who like the cuisine of North Africa/Middle East, this is where you explore the different tables of an evening. Eat at the upper end of Bussorah Street and you’ll over-look the iconic Madjid Sultan/Mosque. Exit the hotel, cross the footbridge in

title: Great place to stay and close to Bugis
desc: The place is great for business stays but from the looks of it a great place for family get always too. I saw lots of families by the pool which is amazing btw. The staff is warm and friendly and the location is great - Clark quay and Bugis are close by.

title: Two week stay at ParkRoyal
desc: Myself and my colleagues came to Singapore for business for two weeks on a gruelling schedule. The amenities and staff at Park Royal Hotel provided us with a level of comfort that allowed us to work to the best of our abilities. I would like to thank all the staff for their friendly service, and in particular Maezel and Sue on the 6th floor.

title: Amazing customer service!
desc: Me and my husb decided to extend our stay by a couple of days in singapore. Got ourself a room in the Deluxe category. When arrived, we were happily greeted by the reception staff named Nina (if I remember correctly). She was prompt and helpful. She noticed I had a small cut, she rushed in to where I assume was the office, and came out with 2 plasters! Very thoughtful! The pool view was amazing! Had our breakfast at the restaurant, food is okay and staff was helpful. We were checked out by a cheerful chinese lady. I would definitely come back with the rest of my family members again! Thank you ParkRoyal!

title: Relaxing stay during business trip
desc: Hotel is nicely located in the city. Rooms are very clean, staff in general is very friendly The hostesses in the Orchid Club are super friendly. Sue and Mia; thank you very much for making me feel comfortable. Facilities such as gym and swimming pool are perfect after a busy day.

title: Excellent Hospitality
desc: I would like to start by appreciating the smile on staff face. Especially Sue and Mia were excellent in their service. I met them on lounge at 6th floor and they were excellent in their communication and were very warmth in their gesture. Really appreciate them and wish them all the best I. Their future endeavours. And Park royal , keep up the good work and I plan to visit you guys again in December. Farid Wadhwania

title: What a pleasure to stay in this historical hotel
desc: Thank you to everyone at the Parkroyal beach road Singapore, for making our trip comfortable and giving us whatever we needed. It was a pleasure to be able to stay with you, thanks to Shah in the gym/swimming area for her help! Please pass our thanks to everyone at the hotel. We look forward to returning one day. Special thanks to the telephone operator ya their name is Fifi and another guy (we cannot remember his name ) who answer all our needs and even as we request for late check -out ,They take us by surprised by giving us to 1 pm . ! Clean, comfortable, great location, helpful staff. Amazing food and hospitality.Date of stay 02 oct 2019 to 06 oct 2019

title: Great service, very friendly people
desc: The room is very spacious and clean. Standards of hygiene are excellent in the bathroom/shower cubicle. The food at lunchtime in the main restaurant (Ginger) is exceptional. The business suite exec lounge on the 6th floor is well attended and the staff within that area are amazing. Always attentive and able to tend to every need. I would particularly like to thank Maezel, Sue, Maja and Esther for their help and guidance on places to eat, shop and visit.

title: Excellent Service from Jimmy the Concierge
desc: We really enjoyed staying at this hotel, we had a nice comfortable room which although overlooking the main road was quite. There was a wide selection for breakfast which we enjoyed. Jimmy the Concierge was so helpful when we were planning the trip in the UK, arranging for the additional cost for a late room check out, booking us onto a half day city tour and providing details of the 3 day Tourist Travel Pass along with the estimated cost of a taxi from Changi Airport. Some tips from us. 1) Bugis metro station is a 10-15 minute walk away where we purchased a 3 day Tourist Pass at the cost of $30 ($10 is given back when you return the card to the ticket office), the metro is really easy to use, all the signs are in English. 2) Fika Restaurant across the road at 257 Beach Road

title: Pleasant comfortable hotel, good facilities and location
desc: Thoroughly enjoyed our two brief stays at the hotel. We found it good quality and very comfortable. We discovered the lovely pool on our second stay. We only used the restaurant for buffet breakfast, preferring to eat out but it was of a good standard. Great location near the old Arab quarter.

title: A Hotel To Come Back To
desc: The staff make Park Royal a 5-Star experience. Good hotel food outlets, excellent pool/gym and spa facilities, and a stone's throw from the interesting Arab quarter and Little India. Convenient to CBD and airport.

title: excellent services at executive floor
desc: I choose the hotel for the location close to my office. it is also convenient to go out for dinner or drink. But I also realised that the service at executive floor is excellent, enjoying benefits... and the facilities are very good.

title: Brilliant location and perfect tourist hotel
desc: Stayed recently with my husband and grown up son. We had 3 nights after a 10 night trip to Bali. Breakfast is great, pool and views are stunning, excellent gym open 24 hours. Helpful staff who sorted out your room when I was not happy with the view. It was good to have a family room, but those rooms not great for views. We were offered a better one the next morning. Thank you 😊 Location is great we live to walk and walked every where. So much is very close by restaurants, trendy bars, food markets, Little India, religious sites etc. Raffles for Singapore Slings $33. YOLO! We also walked to Marina Bays Sands and that area one day. Then Orchard Road shops another. One if our favourite visits was free. The Bicentennial Event in Channing Park. Needs to pre book. The

title: Convenient location, good hotel and great staff
desc: To anyone thinking of staying here, I say just do it! It’s in a great location and close to so many local attractions. We have stayed at this hotel several times before and were happy to see on return that most of the staff were still there. As a GHA Discovery Black level member we were upgraded to a Club room. The rooms were recently renovated and are a very comfortable size. There was a lovely welcome back gift waiting for us which is alway a nice thing for returning/loyal guests. We ordered a pizza by the pool and while it looked great it was a tad disappointing as the base was rather hard and tasteless, but the toppings were great! This time I did get to experience a massage at the St Gregory’s Spa which was thoroughly relaxing and would highly recommend. The

title: Found my handphone
desc: I am staying in Park Royal, Kichener Road and traveled to Park Royal Beach Road for the symposium and I forgot my handphone in the taxi. I approached the concier and had been served by Johnson. He simplu asked me to write some information and also asked for the type of my phone and the receipt. He quick pick up the phone made called and reach the driver. While meeting, he could find my phone and safely deliver it to the hotel. Thank you, Johnson, its a big help for me. May God bless always you and your family.

title: 1st experience was great now it is average
desc: My first stay was great and people so kind, my room very good. Now every time I go there I don't find again kindness, no smile unfortunatly. I continue to go there because it is convenient, clean, overall ok.

title: Businesses accommodation
desc: The Beach Rd orchid club is outstanding, the hotel is perfectly placed in the business district for my requirements but most of all the staff are outstanding in particular, Ester, Mia and Maezel. The restaurant on ground level has a vast variety for breakfast.

title: Charged more than expected on check in.
desc: The hotel is in a good position and clean. rooms are not very big for twin club floor rooms. BEWARE We booked this after consulting with the hotel and GHA what grade room we would need to book to have use of the club floor lounge because of my GHA black membership. I booked the grade suggested so that my membership would upgrade me to the club floor with its facilities. When I arrived to check in I was told because of my membership they were happy to upgrade me to the club floor but we could NOT use the lounge without paying quite a lot more. As we needed the club floor facility for business we had no choice as we were their at reception but to pay even though I complained and asked the receptionist to check email correspondence. This left a bad feeling as it was not dealt with.

title: Very good experience
desc: The hotel truly offered more than I had expected. Very clean and pretty rooms, the gym and the pool are very pleasant and well equiped, the breakfast was divers and of very good quality. The service was nice, the location is a good one. Indeed a very good experience.

title: Great stay at Orchid club lounge
desc: I come here for the lad few years. The reason for me to come back here regularly is the warm welcome that we get and the service in Orchid club. Ms. Esther and the team always greets us with such refreshing smile, and try to accommodate all our request. These r the few things that differentiates them from other places. Thank to the entire team for such effort. Keep up the great work.

title: Fantastic
desc: The hotel is near our office, thus easy travel from workplace to this hotel. They offer good breakfast. Stay was no hassle at all. Amazing location and staff were polite, responsive and very accommodating.

title: Great family stay
desc: Spent 5 nights with family with orchid club access. Rooms were very comfortable and ideally located for activities. The club was worth the extra money given the cost of food and alcoholic drinks in Singapore. The staff (particularly Mia and Patricia) were lovely and really looked after us all stay. Hopefully be back again.

title: Good value hotel
desc: I had been looking to the rooms in Singapore after reading many good reviews. But Parkroyal Bugis had extremely spacious rooms , v comfy beds , v clean and v good buffet breakfast. Although the Indian options were a bit limited but in a foreign land u cannot really ask for more. Situated at an intersection where u get lovely Pakistani /Arabian/ Lebanese food . Bugis street is a 5 minute walk away, v good shopping area for mementos. Loved my stay at the Parkroyal . Friendly staff. I recommend to stay here for long or short periods.We had a great time in singapore and would recommend this property to friends. Centrally located and safe hotel.We were greeted by Raj and Nina at check in who were completely obliging and guest focused in ensuring my request of room was able to

title: Fun hotel to stay
desc: I was lucky to stay in this hotel for my staycation. The staff are friendly and helpful as my grandmother is wheelchair they really take care of her. Farhan and taka thank you for your caring service ,the operator always ready and my request been sent thank sima, Lisa and fifi for the fast and efficient. The club floor stay Christina, marzel and maja they always smile and serve us with open heart. Lastly thank to Allen, mun, arrifah and Nina for their assist on our room and during check in and check out also not duty manager joe for his assistance too

title: Can’t fault anything!
desc: We had a fabulous family stay at Park Royal on Beach Road. The property has excellent facilities and fabulous staff particularly in the Orchard Club lounge! Mia & Patricia really looked after us with delicious food and drinks each night best service ever and we have had a very enjoyable stay. The rooms were lovely, beds very comfortable and housekeeping immaculate. We will definitely be back!

title: Lovely Service
desc: Hey, I stayed at the Park Royal beach road in singapore for 3 nites and it was a lovely experience. The staff especially Taka & Jimmy at the concierge were so so helpful in all our interactions. If you ever stay there, make sure to give my regards to Taka. Thats Taka in the picture. M the bald guy !! Cheers

title: Don't exercise barefoot
desc: An otherwise wonderful 5 day stay was somewhat ruined by being ejected from a near empty gym for not being in running shoes! Apparently the hotel issued white slippers were impermissible as well. I know rules are important but there was no posting of the rule in the gym or in the hotel information in the room or on the website. The fact that I had exercised barefoot on the previous 5 days without any issue makes it all the more puzzling. Unfortunately there was no reasoning with either the attendant or the security officer who was sent to remove me. I know they were just doing their job. However, with a long day of travel ahead, I was looking forward to a workout. Otherwise the hotel is lovely. The rooms are spacious, the beds comfortable and the pillows among the best I have

title: 3Rs & 3Fs Stay cation
desc: Relaxed, Refreshed & Rejuvenated and Friendly, Fabulously & Favourably sum up the great Stay cation. The pampering and memorable experience was made possible by comprehensive facilities (gym, swimming pool & spa), good meals and last but not least, great service by following staff serving in different sections of the hotel. They were friendly, helpful, accommodating and served with passion and smiles. Front Office : Ganesan, Allan, Lynn & Lina Concierge : Taka Housekeeping : Hao Ling Ye, Mei Mei & Liping Ginger Restaurant :Mag Orchid Club Lounge : Maja, Irene, EstherChai, Michael, Maezel, Patricia and Chef Chris Tan. The room was newly renovated, modern and chic which have a warmth and home feeling. It has a neat, clean and tidy layout. Indeed, a great stay. Hope to be back

title: 2nd time stay - this time without the perks
desc: No complimentary upgrade even though booked on website Early check in but --- for an extra 90 SGD even though we were checking out at 5 am so well ahead of the 12 pm checkout. Kinda lacklustre... kinda sucked this time round Location was good close to Haji lane That's about it..

title: Clean, comfortable and convenient
desc: We stayed here for a few nights before boarding a cruise home and found it very convenient to all the areas we visited. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the pool has a great view over towards Marina Bay Sands and the gardens,

title: Great Location, Friendly Staff, Food Not as good as other Parkroyal Properties
desc: We stayed here for 3 nights when we returned from the Maldives.  The room was comfortable and pretty spacious.  The location of this hotel was great, directly across the road from Arab Street which had heaps of great funky, cool restaurants, cafes, bars and boutique shops. It was also close to a great shopping Centre - Bugis and walking distance to Raffles Hotel for the famous a Singapore Sling.  Breakfast here wasn't bad but having staying at other Parkroyal properties around the world, I must say this Parkroyal was pretty disappointing. Other Parkroyal properties are so much better than this one in regards to food. Most of the food wasn't bad but some food wasn't great at all as it was dried up eg. poached eggs with hollandaise sauce, french toast, bacon and didn't look

title: Home away from home
desc: The always welcoming team of the Parkroyal on Beach Road again made me feel at home. Patricia, Mia and their colleagues on the club floor made it another comfortable and nice stay. Looking forward to coming back soon!

title: Great Location
desc: This was our first visit to Singapore, and we were so impressed with the Park Royal Hotel. From the moment we set foot in the hotel we were greeted with friendly smiles and were treated as if we were returning guests. For us the hotel was in a great location, only 15 minutes walk from Bugis MRT station.. Unfortunately we could not check into our room before 3 pm but the front desk did their best to allocate us a room as early as they could. Big thank you to the staff who came to our room with a Surprise birthday cake and Banner for our room with happy birthday on it, they even sang happy birthday which made my day. The room was very clean , comfortable and had all the amenities we required. We enjoyed room service on 2 mornings with a great selection for breakfast. And on our

title: Orchid Club
desc: Loved our stay and the staff were amazing. Great location just across from Haji Lane and its multitude of dining options. The Club lounge had great options for breakfast and the evening canapés. Very good size room compared to other Singapore hotels we have stayed out. This is our new favorite and will be back next time.

title: Great Location Great Staff
desc: Thankyou the managment and staff at Parkroyal on Beach Rd We stayed in the club rooms which I would recommend The Pool and the Gym were well maintained and a pleasure to use Breakfast was also V good But the highlight for me was the Staff from the management to the cleaners

title: Amazing stay!
desc: I stayed over the Christmas period and had an exceptional stay with warm service from the hotel staff who did above and beyond my expectations. Like to specially commend Esther and Mia for making my stay such a lovely one. Esther arrange for balloons and flower petals in my room which are so amazingly beautiful, I later got to know she has to painstakingly blow the balloons herself! Mia also arranged flowers for me in the room and such a sweet gesture warms my heart. All the staff in the executive floor are amazing with special thanks again to Esther and Mia. They made my stay a memorable one. I'll definitely be back again. Thank you from Miss Ada Tan

title: All round lovely hotel, great atmosphere.
desc: We had a great stay at Park Royal, great location such variety of food and shopping. Bugis junction is two streets up within walking distance. Dillah the duty manager and all the staff were very helpful and accommodating, thank you.

title: Superb customer service, attentive and merticulous
desc: I booked a staycation around mid December. There was some error in the booking system as the hotel is under the Pan Pac Group. However, their duty manager, a very attentive and sincere lady called Dillah attended to me when I checked in. She listened to my needs and my stay was memorable. My kids and family enjoyed the room thoroughly, facilities and the ambience. The pool area was a favorite because the view was unblocked and windy. The sweet spot was the positive attitude of the staff, everyone served us very well. Shoutout to Raj at the reception and Jimmy at the concierge.. u guys are top class!! I will be back soon!

title: Another brilliant visit to the Parkroyal
desc: This was about my 10th stay at the Parkroyal on Beach Rd. I wouldn't stay anywhere else in Singapore as it is like a second home. The concierge always welcomes you with a smile, and all staff you pass in the corridor say hello with a big smile. The fact there are several staff there who have been there from over 20 years is a testament to the hotel. A special treat to stay on Orchid Level this time for my 50th birthday and I even got a little cake with my breakfast on my birthday, as well as a second one later that day delivered to me room. Best view from the pool deck to watch NYE fireworks, which took our minds off the bushfires happening around family at home. Went to the gym every morning and spent countless hours by the pool. Keep up the great work Parkroyal :) Will be back

title: Great Buffet
desc: Stayed for a night and came this time for the festive lunch buffet. The buffet is the most worth mentioning here. Looked through reviews of a few hotels and decided to come here because we ate their festive dinner buffet a few times previously. I was a little worried about the difference in the variety of food since there was a price difference between lunch and dinner buffet.. I am glad I did make the wrong choice. We were actually in for a shock with their spread of dishes which seemed even better than the dinner buffet. Being extremely picky eaters, my son and I were able to find different types of food to our liking. I especially love the cereal prawns, except it was too spicy so I dare not eat the cereal bits. The prawns were fresh and big and very well flavoured. I don't

title: Great Hotel we'll worth a visit
desc: We stayed for a week over Christmas in their Orchid Club deal on floor 7. Excellent value, good pool, exceptionally clean. Staff could not do more for us. We would definitely stay there again. Food in the lounge was enough with branded drinks.

title: Good location with Great service
desc: The hotel is in a very convenient location near to bus and MRT stations. It's walking distance to tourist spots across the road and is easy location to get around to different parts of the city. Staff were very helpful and provided good and efficient service. Room was very clean and comfortable.

title: Best hotel in town
desc: Business trip to this hotel. 2nd time to stay here. Everyone is kind and willing to help. Special thanks to reception team, Yuvaraj and Ray to assist my requests when i check in, Nina, a Malay lady who always put her smile on face to welcome anyone. Thank you.

title: Great location
desc: Hotel was on beach road not too far to walk to the city. We thought it’s a good location to explore Singapore. Room was very spacious, clean and comfortable with all the things you need. Free Wi-fi, complementary bottle of water every day, tea and coffee making facilities and a extremely large and comfortable bed. Pool was great with a bar and towels provided when using it. There’s a good gym room next to the pool. Didn’t eat there as we went into the city for breakfast and meals. But there was breakfast available at extra cost and also room service should you want that. Also a restaurant on site. Staff we found were very friendly, polite and very professional, Overall a great place to stay, we would certainly stay there again if in Singapore.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Clean room and friendly front desk service staff Location of the hotel is walking distance from Bugis train station and across the road is Haji lane (Great place to wander around for small pubs and shops)

title: Great Experience
desc: Great location and great facilities...must stay place with family...the pool is nice to spend time leisurely with a great viewand ambience... Gym and Spa besides it adds to the experience.... The staff of the hotel makes it feel like home...The credit goes to the hotel staff for the overall experience..

title: Excellent location and great value for money
desc: We were extremely pleased with our stay here. It’s the type of hotel that will not disappoint. We didn’t have high expectations so we ended up being really happy with the location, ease of parking our vehicle within premises, comfort of the room & bed, the amount of space we had w a Family room upgrade (we booked a Deluxe). It was such an enjoyable stay for us. Will definitely return.

title: Hotel with a worderful service
desc: I seldom give review as it waste of time ,but my expreince with this hotel staff make to write the review to make sure their boss know that in this small hotel of 4 star have a staff who gives a 6 star service and he is not the bellman or servers but he is a just telephone operator but his service is like he is a front office or even concierge .Every question he can answer and his positive attitude and willingness to serve us is a wow factor.He will always make sure we get what we request and make us felt comfortable .Noor you are not just a staff but a friend that wekcome me to singapore with your warm hand .Thank for the suggestions and recommendation for the nice food and places of tourist .

title: December Visit
desc: Our stay at the Park Royal on Beach Road was amazing. Allan at reception helped my fiance when he needed to find a doctor on the first day of our holiday. All staff are respectful and every staff member we walked past greeted us. The orchid club premier room with balcony has fantastic views over Singapore towards the flyer. This hotel is highly recommended - we were sad to leave and move to our next hotel.

title: Wedding Lunch & Stay
desc: We would like to thank the ParkRoyal team for our wonderful wedding lunch. Felicia has been a great help and advisor in planning our wedding and ensuring it went on well. The food served were one of the best I have had for a wedding. The chef took note on our feedback during the food tasting and ensured the flavours were right. We had a team of experienced banquet staff and they are friendly and efficient. Kudos to them, our guests were well taken care of. During our 2 nights stay at the orchid club room, the staff were quick in responding to our requests and needs. The room and grand ballroom looks new and well kept. Very clean and was a comfortable stay for us. Would definitely recommend ParkRoyal on Beach Road to everyone whether it's for wedding or for a stay.

title: Parkroyal Beach Road outdone yourselves!
desc: Previously i had made an erroneous booking on 14th Dec which the management graciously deferred to the intentioned date - 21st. Although i didnt have the any prove of the change from my end, i was greeted with a usual smile by Lynn whom quickly checked me in without any delay. I appreciate the quick and smooth process. Further was greeted by a fresh bowl of fruits & chocolate together with a handwritten note from the GM. Through my stay in the GHA hotels, this has got to be one of the most memorable one.. not forgetting and appreciate Lynn whom gave me a room with a nice view of the Sngapore Flyer which is the icing on the cake.. Well Done Parkroyal Beach Road.. i would be back before you know it!

title: Would Definitely Come back again
desc: It was a pleasant experience. My sister booked this lovely hotel to celebrate my birthday. There was efficient service starting from the front desk to the operater to the spa and poolside areas. The staffs were extremely friendly and thoughtful to decorate my room and give a complimentary birthday cake. Thumbs up! Would definitely want to come back for another time!

title: Amazing hotel trip by Dpauls
desc: Thanks dpauls team for making our Singapore package amazing and memorable. Thank you hotel staff Of Parkroyal beach road. Wonderful rooms, honest and hard-working staff, breakfast was also good. Thanks everyone

title: Amazing experience
desc: What a wonderful way to spend 3 days in Singapore. One of the best hotels we’ve ever been at. From the ease of checking in, the beautiful rooms and amazing service. Breakfast is fantastic. We will definitely return.

title: An excellent choice near the city sights
desc: Room was comfortable and clean. The location is really great - right near the metro, restaurants, shops and sights. It is very easy to reach the main sights by walking from this hotel. Good breakfast: lots of options and fresh fruits:). The gym and pool area were nice and peaceful. Staff was very friendly and helpful. I would choose this hotel again definitely. Good value for money:)

title: Great hotel and spa
desc: So I have reviewed the hotel and exec lounge before and they are still as great as ever with the friendliest staff but I have also been using the spa attached to it and should take time to review them too. Excellent front of house and great staff, especially Bhindu who always does a first rate strong sports massage. Highly recommended.! I will be using them again in my March visit.

title: Repeated Satisfaction
desc: This is the second time we have stayed here at Park Royal on Beach Road and was thoroughly satisfied with the services. I could not imagine staying anywhere else when in Singapore. The staff are such an amazing credit to the hotel and that is what brings us back. The rooms are always so clean and the food is delicious at breakfast.

title: Excellent!
desc: Place was top notch. Exactly as advertised. From the reception for the check-in to the exclusive lounge on the 6th floor where we got free, unlimited drinks all day during our 3-day stay and our hassle-free check-out, this place is worth every pound I spent! Not to mention the great staff, especially Lynn and Christina. Their hospitality and kindness are amazing!

title: Another great stay
desc: As usual the hotel provided great stay and when you combine it with the Arab quarter across the road you have a lively experience. I am not sure why but Trip Advisor wants a 200 hundred character review, so this is a filler in order to make the above comment.

title: Wonderful Hotel
desc: Fantastic Hotel, staff were very helpful and obliging would definitely return in 2021, cleanliness was 100% as was the service lovely fresh food which was constantly being replenished. Ray and his team couldnt do enough for us Thank you to all the staff especially the porters .

title: Perfect Staycay
desc: As an ex hotelier at a 5 star hotel, I'm blown away by this Hotel! I stayed for one night on 26 Jan. For the price, the Club level has the service standards of a 5-star hotel's executive Club. Maezel and the Chinese bespectacled gentleman whose name I didn't catch, were absolutely amazing with their level of professionalism and attention to service. From name recognition to promptness of service to friendliness/warmth, I am thoroughly impressed! Wouldn't say the same for the live station chef in the morning when I came in at 9.50am and he grumpily made my scrambled eggs as he was hurrying to pack up, or the pool attendants who seemed to treat the foreigners better than locals. Remember that locals are also paying guests! The room was in tip top condition - kudos to housekeeper

title: Excellent customer service experience
desc: We stayed at ParkRoyal on Beach Road - Singapore. All staff are very friendly and welcoming. The breakfast buffet has a variety of delicious food. The first day my husband had an upset stomach. The manager on duty Dillah Marsh made a courtesy call to check how our staying was and when she found out about my husband. She was very concern and asked me if she could help us. She came to our room personally to delivery some fruit, crackers and tea. She delivered an exceptional customer service. Above and beyond our expectations. We highly recommend the hotel.

title: Returned again to our favorite hotel in Singapore.
desc: We had another lovely couple of days in Singapore staying at the Park Royal. It’s location is fantastic close to the vibrant haji lane market which has live music in the evenings and beautiful jewelry and scarf shops. It’s very close to the train station which takes you very quickly into the famous gardens. The rooms are clean, modern and great for families. Breakfast is incredible. The pool area is so relaxing, well maintained and perfect for R&R. Staff especially the duty manager Dillah made sure we had the best experience we could. Lastly I highly recommend booking yourself in for a massage while there. Thanks again and we will see you in two years when we return. All the best Lisa

title: Thank you, Jimmy
desc: We recently stayed for 2 weeks at Park Royal, second stay for 2019. As always friendly, clean and fabulous service from staff. This trip we fortunately met up with concierge, Jimmy. No request was too small and his connections enabled some special experiences.Really added to the trip!! Thank you, Jimmy and all at PR. Thoroughly recommended!

title: Great hotel in Singapore
desc: We stayed here for 1 night after returning from a cruise. The hotel was able to accomodate a late check-out since out flight was not until evening. Our stay was great. Close to MRT station, and right across the road from Haji Lane, which is a must see at night. The staff was excellent and very helpful. The pool is beautiful and I enjoyed an aweson=me massage at the spa which is on premesis.

title: Exceptional Hotel
desc: The ParkRoyal on Beach Road is our hotel of choice every time we visit Singapore. It is located close to 2 MRT lines, Kampong Gelam, and many restaurants, cafes and food courts. The breakfast buffet is great for all tastes. The rooms are well sound-proofed and comfortable. The staff is always attentive, professional and very helpful, even with jet-lagged and cranky customers. Special mentions to manager Dillah and receptionist Celise who went above and beyond to make us feel welcome. Highest recommendation!

title: Highly recommended
desc: We recently stayed at the park royal on beach road in Singapore. Upon arriving at the hotel the staff were very friendly and welcoming. We checked in, went to our room and found it to be very clean and spacious. The bathroom was spotless and was a good size as well. We had the buffet breakfast included in our package and it was one of the best buffet breakfasts we have had at a hotel in a while. There was a lot of variety to choose from. Toward the end of the trip, I came down with a virus, my partner alerted the staff that I may need medical attention, The hotel staff were great in helping me. They organised a taxi to take me to the raffles hospital and when I returned they checked in and were very helpful with anything I needed to make my stay while being sick more

title: Good Value, Good Location
desc: Centrally located, the ParkRoyal on Beach Rd offers all that the traveler needs. Staff are very efficient friendly and helpful. There are a number of restaurants available including a lounge area on the 6th floor which was offered at $70 per couple per night. This included breakfast and evening meals, both in a buffet format. Between 6 and 8pm drinks are included. There are ample restaurants across the road as alternatives to in house dining. The only negative is that the en suite is a bit smaller than normal

title: Great hotel
desc: Great location, close to MRT stations and just across from Haji Lane, Arab Street, Kampong Gelam, and many restaurants. Clean rooms and quality bathroom amenities. The staff were nice, professional, and very helpful.

title: Orchid club
desc: We got back in our home after travelling for a month. Our stay in parkroyal on Beach Road are great. The staff in orchid club are all great and always give us a warm smile especially Esther. She help us s lot and very patient I'm suggesting good place to visit. She always smile. We were happy to see her around during breakfast and cocktail time. We will definitely back in Singapore and stay in this hotel.

title: Semi Luxury Sanctuary in Arab Quarter
desc: While this property might not reflect the luxury of other higher end hotels belonging to the PAN PACIFIC hotel group chain in Singapore and around, it sure comes with the right amount of comfort, luxury, hospitality, and tranquility. The hotel could get crowded most times, as it is quite popular with savings-conscious travellers, making the Checkin and Checkout experience a nightmare. We know this well as we have stayed here for a few weeks in the past and very frequent guests here. However this time around, we got quite lucky(probably as a result of the Corona virus impact) and the check in process was a breeze and the whole property felt a lot more peaceful and calm. Also, it seemed like the management have even refurbished a lot of rooms and common spaces to give it a strong

title: A conveniently located hotel with extremely helpful and lovely staff
desc: We visited this hotel at the beginning of the corona virus outbreak. The hotel's attention to cleanliness, and registering everyone's temperature on entering, was impeccable. We were very impressed with the helpful and friendly staff.

title: Amazing stay excellent service
desc: Booked this hotel through booking.com, I must say this was one of the best hotel I've stayed so far in Singapore. Perfect location, everything is between walking distance. Excellent breakfast with super friendly staff.

title: Outstanding of the Orchid Club
desc: This is second time for me and my girlfriend stayed at orchid club for new year eve for a short vacation. We stay in an Orchid Club room again, the bed are so comfortable and the pool are big and have a great view. Well worth it. The staff are provide excellent service and all the lovely care to me and my girlfriend. The orchid club team Esther and the team are very more helpful, thoughtful and kind to me and my girlfriend. We have a good memories on new year eve and were recommend to all our friend and family to stay in Parkroyal on beach road. Looking forward to come back here again.

title: A Most Amazing Stay
desc: We were transferred to this hotel after being informed that the original hotel we were booked into was undergoing refurbishment work, and we didn’t want any disruption during our short stay in Singapore. We were absolutely delighted with the quality, location and comfort this hotel gave us, we were so well looked after by all the staff, but we have to mention the wonderful service we received from Maezel in the Club Room on Level 6, she was absolutely delightful, and her local knowledge was exceptional. Maezel is a credit to the Hotel. In fact all the staff in the Level 6 Club Room were so unbelievably kind to us we enjoyed every aspect of our short stay in Singapore. We would not hesitate to return on a future trip. Thank you all at the Park Royal Hotel Beach Road, Singapore.

title: Great Stay, excellent staff
desc: We arrived very early and were offered an upgrade to Orchid club, and given immediate access to a lovely room the bed was so comfortable . We used all the benefits of the Orchid club, Maezel and her colleagues were so attentive, friendly and made us feel very comfortable. The complimentary pre dinner drinks and snacks were excellent and served with smiles. The hotel is within easy walking of the Atlas bar, the Andaz tower and Arab quarter with many vibrant places to eat on the doorstep. The MRT stop is nearby and the tourist pass got us out the the Botanic Gardens etc with ease.

title: Good Place.
desc: Good service by the front office team Upon arrival.. and good service by DM Daryl. They gv us late check out. Room was nice. Convenient for family. Near Arab street. Easy for us to find halal food....

title: They go the extra mile
desc: My stay didn’t start well as I got a noisy room but the staff reacted directly upon my complain in the middle of the night and proposed to change the room. Big up to Joe Kok who made sure the same day and the day after that I was well settled. Will definitely go back

title: Really nice Hotel, good food , great staff!
desc: The Beach Road Park Royal is well located easy access to the sights of Singapore. The staff are friendly and helpful and the food in all dining areas was very good. Wiuld recommend this hotel and will happily stay there again.

title: Visit Feb2020
desc: Stayed here for 5 nights in an executive orchid club room (Our 2nd visit). The hotel has an ideal location with all things easy to walk to (which we prefer to do!) Marina Bay Sands is approx 20-30mins walking.City hall raffles etc only 5-10mins. The room was on the 6th floor and gave us access to the executive lounge which provides tea coffee soft drinks throughout the day FOC. Between 6-8pm alcoholic drinks cocktails etc and a selection of food again FOC. This was excellent, However a special mention must go out to the reception team/ladies on 6th floor who were outstanding in every way and ensured everything we needed was attended to and always took time to ask if there was anything we needed or they could do for us This made us feel that little bit special.The room itself

title: Amazing service!
desc: The Park Royal on Beach Road is a lovely hotel in a great location - right across from Arab Street. Beautiful pool area as well. But what sets them apart is their service level. We had to change our flights (thanks to Covid-19) which required lengthy - and I mean hours - time on the phone to Air Canada. It was a series of international calls, but Lynn was incredibly gracious, helpful and patient in her support. Can’t thank her enough! What a star member of a truly amazing team at this hotel. Mr Jimmy at the concierge desk is also worth a special mention. Thanks everyone- you’re the best!

title: Lovely Hotel
desc: We arrived quite late at night but our room was ready for us. We had to have our body temperature taken at reception because of the ongoing coronavirus. 1 of us was 1 degree over but we explained we had been travelling for 24 hours and it was very hot but not sure If that makes a difference or not? The room was lovely. A good size and an amazing bed with 4 comfy soft pillows. We had a perfect sleep for our 5 night stay. The cleaning staff were great. The room was always immaculate. Breakfast was included and was open until 1030. It had a good selection of western and Asian dishes. The reason we booked this hotel was for the swimming pool which was quite big. Lots of sun lounges and tables & chairs too. 1 day was busy but other days were very quiet. We used the gym, this was

title: Perfect service and friendly staff
desc: everything was perfect and professional - location and short walk to two different MRT lines very good - close to the arabic quarters and not far off the indian quaters a very good place - beside the mentioned quality of the hotel

title: Top class hotel in a great location
desc: The hotel was very nice and they made every effort to make you feel welcome. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. The fitness facilities are excellent, as is the pool. There is a small bar.

title: Very warm hospitality by their super warm staff
desc: We travel to Singapore often and were used to staying at ParkRoyal Serviced Suites or Pan Pacific Serviced Suites both on Beach Road depending on their availability.
