This time around when we planned our trip, we were a little apprehensive about how it would be staying at Hotel Parkroyal with no comfort of our own kitchenette. But the warmth and comfort extended by the staff here has exceeded our expectations. It was anniversary day before yesterday and all I had requested Maezel was for a piece of cake to surprise my husband. Not only did she arrange for a delicious chocolate tart along with a tray of cookies and chocolates but also decorated our room beautifully. We were all hearts for her and her colleague Mia. Keep it up guys! Look forward to being back here on our next trip

title: Comfortable and relaxed
desc: Staff helpful, friendly, courteous and professional. The reception staff were very helpful. Excellent facilities, particularly the gym and pool. Had an excellent meal at the Chinese restaurant. Will stay there when I next visit Singapore

title: Excellent service and comfort
desc: Having last stayed for several visits in 2014 I was pleased that the high standards of this hotel have been maintained when I stayed again in Feb 2020. Nothing is too much trouble for the friendly, helpful staff. Even though the business lounge was busy in the evenings the service was excellent. This hotel is highly recommended.

title: Great hotel, location and pool area
desc: Great hotel and location. Pool area very nice relaxing with great views. Very clean rooms and reception. Small shopping centre behind with plenty of other shops and local restaurants close by. Opposite Little Arab area of city which has lots to see, shops and restaurants. I had mentioned it was son's birthday and they put up a banner and gave him a cake. Very thoughtful

title: Great hotel with good facilities
desc: Stayed for a week here. Loved the gym and the pool facilities. Close to good restaurants. Easy walk to most locations. Breakfast was really good. Had issues with wifi and they were fixed super quick. I’ll stay here again.

title: Wedding Lunch and a night stay
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to special thanks Banquet Manager Jun Ming & Sales Manager Felicia for helping out the wedding lunch held on 22nd Feb'20 at Sky Ballroom. The event runs smoothly. Jun Ming is very responsible & extremely helpful and responds swiftly on all matters. Both Felicia & Jun Ming always go the extra mile and get things done. Well done!

title: Nice and Excellent stay!
desc: Dear Felicia and Team, Many thanks to you guys that made our Event such smooth and sailing. Deep in our heart, we really appreciate the help and advise rendered to us from planning to execution on our actual day, fulfilling our requests and assuring us The flow was great and the guest is understanding and complimented about the individual plating of dishes to them as well as the number of precautionary measures the hotel had in-placed. The room was well maintained and the service crew is professional and provided assistance whenever there's a need. Thank you very much!

title: Superb Hotel!
desc: During of lockdown of Malaysia, my company arranged this hotel for me to stay. I have been stayed this hotel since 20th March till now. Amazing...such a great hotel. Nice and comfortable room. Superb WiFi speed. Excellent staff - friendly and good housekeeping. My special thanks to Mr John for your good greeting with smiling each time enter / exit the hotel. Mr John was very helpful and assist me whenever I needed. Thank you to all staff.. well done and keep it up.

title: Excellent staff during Stay Home Notice at Park Royal @ Beach Road
desc: Today is Day 12 of a 14 days' Stay Home Notice (SHN) under the COVID-19 containment measures in Singapore. And I have been holed up in a room in Park Royal @ Beach Road. The staff have been exemplary making my stay here as pleasant as possible. Special shoutout to the Chefs, Kitchen, Room Service and reception staff. Given my dietary needs, I had been making many food requests over the last 2 weeks. And the staff have been very accommodating. They had taken extra efforts to adhere to or suggest alternatives to my requests. Today, the room service also made a personal note to me to hang in there and that they stand by to support. Am truly touched. Happy that I picked the hotel during this SHN. They have kept me safe, well fed and happy. Great staff who made the start pleasant.

title: Staying here till move into our apartment
desc: I want to specifically highlight Joe Kok Duty Manager - he has been nothing short of brilliant. I own a business that is in the service industry and I am always mindful of the level of service provided and the manner in which it is provided. Joe has been incredibly helpful, gone out of his way to help us out and make our stay as comfortable as possible at at time when it is extraordinary times in the world. No problem has been too big or small and most importantly he has done what he has said he would do and all with a smile and a willing attitude. Joe is the sort of person any business needs, especially now more than ever. Thank you Joe. I also commend the concierge team here who are always smiling and ready to have a laugh and make every time we walk in a pleasure.

title: Back again
desc: As we did last time, we chose to stay in the Orchid Club (floors 6 or 7), which caters primarily for business travellers. There are a number of benefits for doing so (nightly drinks and canapes, 2 pieces of laundry per person per day and, dedicated staff for check-in and other services). The hotel, which was very quiet during our latest visit (courtesy of the coronavirus scare), offers large, comfortable rooms that have been recently renovated, although it can be awkward to move around the comparatively small bathroom. The hotel itself is conveniently located, adjacent to the Arab Quarter and with quick access to the airport, MRT and multiple attractions. We enjoyed the hotel breakfast each day. When available, the beef rendang was delicious. From the chefs to the doormen

title: Excellent Service
desc: It was the first time my husband and I stayed at this hotel and we were/are impressed with the standard of service and cleanliness. We have done quite a few staycations in other hotels but we think that our stay at ParkRoyal is the best due to their professional and helpful hotel staff. Moreover, the location of hotel the great as it is near eateries and the MRT. We are looking forward to our next staycation at ParkRoyal.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: We really enjoyed our stay. Great service and facilities. The pool was amazing. The only thing was food was quite expensive. But it was tasty and well prepared. Location was excellent and the staff were were friendly and courteous

title: A good location with reasonable price
desc: A wonderful stay during my business trip to Singapore with good price and strategic location. Thanks for the better room upgrade. i received friendly and warm welcome from the hotel staff! It is value for money too!

title: Change of scenery
desc: Picked this hotel for a change of scenery. Close to Arab Street and Bugis just 600m down the road. Was nice to be greeted “Welcome back” each time we returned. Pool area superb! Rooms quite spacious and beds super comfortable. Bathroom had fantastic water pressure and temperature. Great spot and highly recommend.

title: Memorable service!!
desc: We had our first staycation as a married couple. It was a awesome & memorable service for us. Specially I would like to mention Lyn from the front desk. She was really friendly and helpful. She really gave us personalised service during on our stay in the hotel by checking on us if we received the items we requested to be sent to the room. She even offered to send them up to the room which was really sincere gesture. She also surprised us by arranging a bottle of wine In our room & greeted us personally “Happy Marriage!” But all the staff are warm and friendly even room attendants. I would like to thank everyone for given us such memorable staycation.

title: Week in Singapore
desc: We stayed in Orchid club premier room which includes a balcony. We were lucky enough to have a view of Marina Bay Sands and Singapore Flyer. All the staff were so friendly. We got a lot of sightseeing information from those in club lounge and no request was a problem. The doormen always had a friendly greeting despite the added burden they had with temperature screening of all entering the building. It was good to see hotel taking this precaution for the safety of us and their staff. We had a small issue with running water on balcony but it was fixed promptly. The bed was luxurious; we had 7 nights of blissful sleep. Bus stop at door and train station 5 minutes walk; we only used a taxi to get to and from airport and this was only because of the amount of luggage we had.

title: Felt like royalty
desc: Amazing experience! Staff were outstanding and very helpful with our requests. Clean and tidy, this hotel is a must when in Singapore! From the time we arrived, the staff knew our names and made our first visit to Singapore very special.

title: Park Royal Beach Road
desc: Awesome stay awesome helpful friendly Staff will definitely be going back sometime in the near future. Awesome after a full day tripping around Singapore to come back to such happy helpful people and a few tasty cocktails by the gorgeous pool

title: Dinner at Sichuan Douhua at Parkroyal Beach Road
desc: Quick family dinner at Sichuan Douhua at Parkroyal on Beach Road on 31 March 2020, we are very impressed by the thorough precautionary measures taken by the Hotel amid Covid 19 outbreak. Security associates are diligently checking and guiding guests to rightful directions depending on guests' purpose of visit. Other than temperature taking at the entrance like all the restaurants, dining tables have been placed apart with substantial distance to secure guests' safety. Dishes are as delicious as usual, services are kept excellent. At the end of dinner, restaurant staff presents every guest a glass of throat-soothing Chinese herbal drink which is very thoughtful and touching. Many thanks to the Hotel management, we feel safe and psmpered when dine at your Hotel restaurant.

title: Highly recommend
desc: I have booked 3 nights on December for travel on 25 March 2020 and T&C was non refundable, due to Covid19 I have to cancel my travel plans and I contacted Agoda and they have sent a request to the hotel. I received response from the hotel- they will do the full refund- even this was non refundable and today I received my full refund back to my Credit card. I will definitely stay in this hotel for my next visit Thank you PARKROYAL on Beach Road !!

title: 2020 staycation
desc: Great stay as usual. This time round, stayed in a suite room. Nice room size with a separate bedroom and lounge area. Great hospitality, especially Maja and her team of staffs at the club lounge (level 6). Will be back again.

title: Good hotel for a long term stay
desc: It’s been a very comfortable and satisfying stay, the credit goes to the entire staff And especially Reika, Arifah, Jimmy, Johnson, Sam, Dillah Saini, Dann, Ganesh Celise,ray, John The team has really made me feel at home away from home. Also the hotel is situated at a very convenient location. Will certainly be my preferred choice going forward.

title: Nice comfortable stay
desc: The Stay in Parkroyal was very good and comfortable. Special thanks to Mrs.Maja, Mrs.Christina, Mrs. Mia, Mrs. Maezd and Mrs.Yi En. and also for Housekeeping and all other stuff so I felt very well. I will come back again.....

title: Happy stay
desc: Stayed there for 6 weeks during my Stay Home Notice and the Lockdown of Singapore. All facilities where closed so I can't say much about it. But everything was compensated more then enough from the lovely staff of the Orchid Club. Special thanks to Maja ,Mia Maezel Yi En Christina. I would come back just because of you friendliness and hospitality

title: Excellent Hotel Environment 👍
desc: Since my stay here for almost 2 months, the staff here are very friendly! 🥰🥰🥰.The room service staff do excellent job. At this moment I need to highlight about good service of Mr John(Doorman), he is a very humble and friendly on welcome the guests 😊😊😊.... Keep up the good service and thanks to all the staff at PARKROYAL HOTEL@BEACH RD👍👍👍

title: Outstanding service and friendly staff that makes you feel at home@Park Royal Beach Road
desc: I checked in on 10th June 2020 and checked out on 14th August 2020. As mentioned all staff are friendly. I was caught by surprised when amenities was placed in my room and a card wishes me Happy Anniversary. I salute all the staff who make this happened and the effort they took to surprise me when I'm back from work. It was a pleasant stay as i felt at home every time I came back from work. Fantastic service from Operator, Reservation, Front Office, Concierge, housekeeping, Room Service and last but not least The Front Office Senior Duty Manager Dillah which never fails me whenever i need assistance. Kudos to Hotel Staff of Park Royal On Beach Road. You all really WOW me during my stay. I would definitely love to come back and stay again.

title: Best staycay ever!
desc: Thanks Dillah for giving us the free room upgrade to Junior Suite! Enjoyed the bathtub and huge room. Check-in was a breeze with Regina (thank you!), service was perfect. Hygiene and security was on point, in-room breakfast was so convenient and importantly, yummy! Overall experience was superb, will definitely recommend families and friends to Parkroyal. We return for another staycay!

title: Highly recommended
desc: Rooms : 4.5/5 - Stayed 2 nights in Orchid Club Premier Room, Large, Clean, and Comfortable. Nice city view at the pool. According to their website, welcome fruit platter, daily newspaper, and fully-stock minibar (only consists of Nespresso, coffee, and tea) are included but we are not being served with. Their website should really need to be updated. Cleanliness : 5/5 - Expectation. Service : 3/5 - When we entered the hotel, there were no front-of-house staff come to lead and greet us as well as to process our check-in. During our checked in, the receptionist looked gloomy so we did not feel welcomed. Besides, not much explanation on the hotel facilities was given. It seems like they did not want to entertain us although there were no other customer around. Until we meet

title: EXCELLENT!!
desc: Awesome customer service by Jeremiah from the reception counter,he went the extra mile by explaining to us the dos and don't in a very very polite way making us feel very comfortable,this is already the second time we are booking the hotel for leisure because the services here are just over the top. DEFINITELY will come back again for sure!!

title: 2 Night Staycation
desc: Chose Park Royal@Beach Road as our staycation venue. Was using Hotel.com special rate for booking. Had a pleasant stay and welcome by front desk staff Jeremiah and Celise. In general all staff are very helpful. Hotel surrounding is good. Lots of food and shopping area. Gonna come back again for staycation if there's a good deal.

title: Just the best!
desc: Came here on 18th august & came again on the 23rd august. Booked the same type of room as we are just in love with the service provided right from the lobby area to the checking in to the room service, obviously also the room. Celebrated my Fiance’s birthday & the amenities provided for the birthday man was just great. Will come again for sure! Shout out to our Front desk guest agent: Jeremiah - He served us on our first time here & also the second time we’re back. In fact he remembers us upon our second time coming back here 😂 Also to the Guest service agents: Mia, Desmond, Maezel - They were the ones who handled our evening refreshments. Very good service! Makes us fall in love with this hotel again & again. You’ve gained love for your hotel from the local couple.

title: Staycation on our honeymoon during covid-19
desc: The day arrive at the front desk dillah the manager assist on the check in on that day...friendly, commitment on the job, once arrive in the room with the surprise on the deco for us...just married banner and some balloon...and one more suprise on the cake that was sent to the room. Once again thanks to parkroyal staff for the deco and cake the frontdesk staff dillah and the rest of them thank you so much see you guys again...

title: Great deal and stay
desc: I just returned from a staycation at the Orchid Club Deluxe room and it was a very satisfying stay. The hotel staff, Jeremiah, was very helpful in explaining the details and aiding in our requests. As part of the Orchid Club privileges, we were served a sumptuous meal along with beverages and snacks for dinner in the room. Maezel came by and ensured that we had a pleasant meal with regular refills of drinks. We were told that the hotel was running at full occupancy so it might be difficult for us to get our complimentary late check-out at 4pm. However, Reika managed to get us a late check-out at 2pm and we're thankful for that. Due to the Covid situation, there was no buffet spread for breakfast. Instead, we were provided with a menu upon check-in to select our breakfast to be

title: Check in was great. Staff was very friendly.
desc: I would like commend on the service by Parkroyal staffs especially Jeremiah and Reika for helping me the Check in process. Jeremiah was talkative and I like how he just strike a conversation with me. They are not shy to approach anyone. Though there was a Hiccup on my side but they actually waited for me to resolve it Thumbs up for the excellent service. The room is also what was advertised and it is comfortable.

title: Amazing!!
desc: Stayed here on the 27th August 2020. Made a couple of request prior to booking date as it was my wife's birthday. Hotel was prompt in replying to my request. Upon arrival,was greeted by Dillah whom assisted us with our check in. Whom ticked all boxes of being a GREAT service provider. Room was decorated with a simple yet warming decor fr the missus birthday. Dillah then came up personally with a small cake to wish the missus Happy Birthday. Talking about going the extra mile,she did a few. Complimentary cocktails in the room,in room dining just made this staycation a memorable one. Thank you team PARKROYAL AT BEACH ROAD!YOU GUYS ARE ROCKSTARS! This will be our favourite and first go to hotel for our next staycation. Stay safe and keep rocking guys! Room 571 The Djeffry

title: Nice and well organised hotel
desc: I can’t forget my staycation experience here. Worth the money and their service is exceptional. Can’t wait to go back. During the covid 19 pandemic, this hotel is providing masks and sanitizers as well. So cool!

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Had a fantastic Staycation in Park Royal Beach Road. Nice and friendly staff especially Maezel who serve us with a big smile and great service. Would be back next year for our birthday celebration again.

title: Great family staycation in an Orchid Club room
desc: We had a wonderful staycation on August 30th in an Orchid Club Premier Room. The team kindly met all of our special requests. Reika was especially helpful with our check-in. She ensured that our room had an amazing view of the Singapore Flyer, which blew our 2-year-old daughter’s mind when she saw “the wheel” so close from the balcony. Reika also thoughtfully followed-up to ask what our daughter thought about it when we checked out. Our package included a delicious dinner delivered to the room, which they made vegetarian at our request. We enjoyed the pool, which had a shallow area for our daughter to play in and a beautiful view of the wheel. There was no need to book a time - there wasn't ever more than a few people there. The ParkRoyal clearly has a strong focus on

title: Staycation
desc: I booked the orchid premier room and it was the BEST decision ever. I wrote in to the team that it’s a surprise stay for my wife and at the same time celebrating our babymoon there. The team at Parkroyal made everything easy. From checking in, to cocktails being served to us surprisingly. And even our breakfast! We literally stayed in the room the whole time we were there because it was too comfy! The bed was huge and bedsheets are so comfy! Thank you to Mia and Maezel for serving us cocktails, twice! With a big smile. Felt like we were being served in the aircraft. Service was great from everyone at Parkroyal. Thank you so much! We will definitely be back here again in the future!

title: Terrible view, subpar service, and double check your credit card statement!
desc: We booked this hotel for a staycation for a weekend in August. They put us up on a stuffy room with a terrible view of a steel roof (see photos). We didn't ask to change rooms because they told us the hotel was "fully booked" despite the pool being completely empty, the restaurant closed, and no guests anywhere due to Covid. On both of the 2 mornings, we woke up to find half the room without electricity. Can not use the bathroom because the lights don't work. Both mornings, an electrician had to come in and perform 10-15 minutes of work in the room. Not a relaxing way to start your morning. See photos. Service was bad as well. Hand sanitiser near the lifts empty, reception gave us a coupon for the pool bar which was closed due to Covid, etc. I was willing to set this all

title: Hotel Booking System Error created an opportunity for Hotel Team to Shine their Hospitality Service
desc: With the current situation facing the world and our own country, we were dying to have a break from home at an approved hotel thus we were looking forward to our staycation at Park Royal Beach Road. Unfortunately, upon check in time, check in counter was unable to retrieve our room from our booking number due to a booking system error at the hotel end. We were flustered and voiced our unhappiness regarding this issue. Fortunately, the Front office manager, Dillah handed our issue with professionlism and courteous coupled with a stroke of luck, we managed to get our requested booking with some enhancement from her initiative. We were so impressed with the quality of service and stay that we approached her for another staycation package. We were very thankful to Dillah and her

title: Staycation post COVID - Absolutely over and above expectations!
desc: I had a 2 day 1-night staycation with Parkroyal, end Aug 2020. Honestly, I was not expecting much from the hotel considering the dated outlook of the hotel building and its hotel lobby area. It didn't help when there were 'tour buses' streaming in, bringing in loads of people. However, my impression changed shortly after check-in. Let's break this down systematically... Check-in: Check-in staff was polite and helpful. Can't help but notice that there was a slight disparity of information between us and the couple next to us. We were told that our check-out time would be at 12noon and we can't have later check out as the hotel was running at full capacity. However, the couple next to us was told that they could check out at 1 pm and they would try to extend the late check-out

title: Remedy from hotel
desc: Hotel gave me a full refund upon receiving my previous complaint. I hope they will strive to improve customer experience with better staff training instead of using this as a remedy action everytime. Not sure if I will try again at this time.

title: Great stay, great service and food: staycay package
desc: Stayed in a Orchid Premium Club room that came with bf and evening meal. Staff is very accommodating and helped change the room with view of the office block to view of Singapore flyer which is amazing. The balcony is nice and windy. Due to covid19 the complimentary club access is changed to evening meal which is a full 4-course with free flow of drinks and alcohol. Also went for a local experience where chefs showed how to cook up some local delights. The chefs are knowledgeable, friendly and happy to impart cooking tips. The rooms are spacious and new. The pool is big with a deep end of about 2.5m. The premium rooms come with a nespresso coffee maker and standard room kit like hair dryer etc, a couch and large sturdy marble table for meals and balcony for fresh air.

title: Excellent Service, Great LOcation
desc: Stayed one night @ Orchid Club Premium. Excellent service provided. never felt so pampered. dinner delivered to your room. free flow cocktail trolley patrolling down the aisle every half an hour. Special mention to the hotel staff - ALLAN, for managing my check-in so well. managed to put my anxieties at ease and enabled me to enjoy my stay at the Hotel. Well done Team :) Another mention to the hotel's location. Culturally rich and bustling lanes lined with turkish and other international cuisines and souvenir shops. What a great way to live as a tourist in my own COuntry.

title: Amazing Stay 😊😊
desc: Booked a staycation to celebrate my birthday... Convenient location..walking distance to bugis and shopping mall... Staff are very kind and friendly especially Reika and Arifah.. Kudos to both of them...

title: Dishonest mentality of hotel
desc: Booked this on Singapore National Day hoping to catch the fireworks from the pool. However, the hotel did not make any effort to inform guests that they are closing the pool at 8pm on the night. There was no notice set up at the pool that it will be closed just before the fireworks start and I could see other guests also being turned away when they showed up at the pool. Knowing that guests are booking their hotels mostly for this purpose, the hotel should be upfront and informed guests to make sure we are aware instead of discreetly going on with business and even having room rate increase during this weekend. What is worse is that the duty manager said that we are not able to view the fireworks from the pool in an attempt to chase guest away. If fireworks cannot be viewed,

title: Excellent Stay in an Excellent Hotel!
desc: My husband and I celebrated our 3rd Anniversary and ParkRoyal on Beach Road was our choice. We had excellent service from start to end. We were upgraded to a suite with beautiful decorations, and we enjoyed how hospitable all staff were. The food too, was delicious and flavourful! Thank you for making our hotel stay and anniversary such a memorable one! We will definitely book this hotel again for future stays!!!

title: Jason gan
desc: Reika was very helpful.she upgraded me to junior suite without additional charges.thnks!she was very efficient and friendly.she was very helpful also.the hotels services are excellent.her managers service was excellen too.thaks!

title: Excellent Staycay Deal
desc: Orchid Club Premier Room was a steal for the staycay with the ongoing promotion. Room and washroom was extremely spacious. Complimentary were great too. Would like to commend the staff for wonderful service and always having a smile. Mia, Maezel, Maja and Desmond went their rounds for refreshments in the evenings and were always helpful. Regina and the front desk was really helpful as well. Well worth the stay!

title: Best Staycay
desc: This is probably the best choice I made when choosing a hotel for my staycation. The hotel made special arrangements for me knowing that I was there to celebrate an occasion. The room and bathroom were so spacious and cleanliness level was on point. I really enjoyed the complimentary welcome cocktail, that includes free-flow of beverages. Both my partner & I are so impressed by the awesome services they provided throughout our stay. Will be back for another staycation soon!

title: Commendation
desc: I would like to commend Regina and Reika for their exceptional customer service. They were very helpful and polite. I would also like to commend the hotel facilities. We enjoyed our stay at Park Royal.

title: Great experience, spacious and comfortable room.
desc: We stay a night in the suite for one night during covid-19. The hotel prepared an essential kit including facial mask & sanitiser which is thoughtful. The room is spacious & well kept. Reception is brief and the service rendered is excellent especially Ms Yong Sim. Thank you very much. Thoughtful arrangement of the cocktail beverage staff, they offered to come back in 30 min to refill our drink. Thank you. Everything else is nice and comfortable. Overall a great staying experience in Singapore.

title: Weekend Staycation - Website needs more information for guests
desc: Booked this hotel for a long weekend staycation. Purchased the package with the club access. Disappointed to know that club was not open and that all dining had to be done indoors. I just wished this information was stated upfront on the website. As breakfast is no longer buffet style, breakfast sets had to be ordered the day before. Each person is entitled to only 1 main course, and the manager at the front desk was not flexible to even accomodate an extra bowl of porridge for club guests, considering the set breakfast portion might not be adequate for every individual. Cocktail and dinner portions were good. Rooms met cleanliness expectation. Plus point that each person gets 2 pieces of complimentary laundry. Staff called back to follow up on every request/ call made to

title: Excellent service
desc: Check in for 1 night. Excellent service from duty manager Mr Joe Kok. There is some hiccups during checkin, but Mr Joe reacted immediately. Excellent service attitude! Resolve immediately! Will come back for another stay

title: Viewing the room before staycation
desc: Rated excellent! On the 11th Aug, I went down to view the room that I've reserve on 14th Aug to 16th Aug. Assisted by Mr Joe kok, he's quite a nice guy. Everything explains detailed, patience enough to bring me up to the room. Strongly recommended for staycation if wanna have nice view and great hospitality by the staffs over there...

title: Fabulous Vacation!
desc: Booked this hotel for my staycation and it was wonderful! Upon arriving at the hotel, both Mr. John and Mr. Fahan were professional yet friendly when scanning our temperature. Also offering help with our luggage too! When registering, the staff were friendly, with special thanks to Arifa and Desmond for the smooth registration. The location of the hotel is convenient, as I was able to explore the many shops just outside the hotel. The swimming pool was great and clean as the scenery is identical with the picture online. It was a memorable trip, that I will recommend to my friends and family in the future!

title: Anniversary Staycation Getaway
desc: Supposed to celebrate our 16years anniversary in Europe and due to the pandemic, trip was forced to cancel. Decided to do staycation in this property instead as I know the it has a pool which can do laps swim. Before arriving, we know bfast will be served in room but was not aware that club lounge is under going refurbishment. ( as we paid for club access rate ) at Orchid Club Room Category. Was sort of disappointed. However we got a room balcony facing Singapore Flyer and the impeccable service from the guest service agents during happy hour. Thank you Marzel, Mia and Regina especially, If it was not bacause of your awesome service, our anniversary stay in the hotel will be another regular staycation nothing to talk about when me and my partner checkout. Des & Bill 14-16Aug

title: Excellent service!
desc: I would like to compliment the excellent service provided by the hotel employees especially Jeremiah & Rose at the reception counter. They made the checking in a breeze and hassle free. Also, the compliment goes out to Christina who came to our room a couple of times to ensure we are not lacking out on any of the necessities that was provided by the hotel. Thank you, guys! Not forgetting that the room we stayed in is equally as pleasant and clean. A perfect staycay! These had made our stay an extremely pleasant one!

title: Had A Fantastic Staycay ✨
desc: I had an excellent 3D2N stay at Parkroyal Hotel, in the Orchid Room. Was beyond happy with daily perks that came along with the room such as complimentary breakfast, evening cocktails and priority check in and check out. The room was large, came with a balcony and an awesome city view and was well maintained and cleaned. We were well taken care off during our stay and I particularly enjoyed the exceptional and friendly service from Mia & Regina who made sure our dinner was delivered on time or if we needed more refreshments. Will definitely be coming back soon!

title: Staycation
desc: it was a great experience being upgraded to an Executive Suite. I had a relaxing time over the weekend. I would recommend this hotel to my friends. I was attended to by Yong Sim & Jerrmiah - polite & helpful. Best regards Dertuen

title: Excellent service
desc: Service rendered by staffs, especially Jeremiah, Reika and Regina were excellent. We had a good stay with Parkroyal Beach Road. Service staff on the whole are also friendly and helpful. Hope to come over again. Thank you for memorable experience.

title: Short stay
desc: My partner and I were here for a short staycation during the weekends! Location of the place was good, rooms was big and spacious. Really impressed with the Concierge team! Amazing, confidant and a positive bunch of people! Keep up the good work!

title: Great place for Staycation
desc: Stayed at the hotel for the National Day long weekend. The staycation package was worth the money and the service was excellent. Housekeeping made sure out needs were looked after and the room was very clean and nicely decored. Loved the bathtub and the rainshower. Mae & Tina who served the cocktails to our room were very friendly and came back multiple times to ensure we had penty of drinks. Room service was also good although they mixed up some of our orders but fixed it quickly. Overall a really good place to stay and we had an excellent time!

title: Orchid club premium king
desc: Nice staycation at the orchid club premium room. Due to covid19 safety measures, the club lounge was closed. However, evening hors d'oeuvre was still served in room. Mia and Jeremiah are very friendly, they make rounds every 30mins to check if we need extra drinks including alcohol beverages. Pool is huge with nice view. We got room 733, though partially blocked view by Pan Pacific, we managed to have a good view of the ndp fireworks from our room. Slight down side will be that the balcony is facing nicoll highway will some traffic noise, for light sleeper like me, it was a Lil concerning. But my hubby slept like a log.

title: Good service and friendly staff! Strongly recommended!
desc: Strongly recommended hotel! Having a team of friendly staffs lead by duty manager Mr Joe Kok who especially attended to us when we encountered an issue with checking in. Not only did he rrsolved the issue with the checking in, he brought us to the room and ensured that all things are in order and we are pleased with the room! Good service.

title: Great second stay!!!
desc: This is my our second visit at this hotel and we enjoyed every part of it. The whole experience was good. Because of the safety measures, all the food and drinks have to be served to our room. Customer service was excellent and super friendly. Initially we booked one night and we wanted to extend. We weren’t sure if there was availability because there was none online. But we met with the Duty Manager at the reception and he assisted us. He was very thoughtful and he extended his service to make sure we’re accommodated well. Thank you Joe and everyone who served us.

title: Lovely Room with great service
desc: Booked the Orchid Club Premier Room which is located on the building’s highest floor (7th) and has a view of the Benjamin Sheares Bridge + Singapore Flyer (Room 754). Do take note some rooms may be blocked by the Parkroyal Service Suite/The Plaza building, so do put in a request prior to arrival for a room with view. Staff also decorated the room with banner and balloons for this birthday staycation, and even gave a birthday cake! *Room package* The room package included in-room breakfast and also evening cocktail. We were surprised with the amount of food given for evening cocktail and as such didn’t find the need to head out for dinner. For the drinks during cocktail hours, the staff will push a cart down the hall and knock on your door every 30mins from 6-8pm (4 times).

title: Ray kok are very good and friendly hotel staff.
desc: Very good hotel and service. Stay here during the pandemic, Ray show his professional to welcome us when we returned to hotel. I signed up the gym member, enjoy to use the facilities provided. Thank you everyone here.

title: Great customer service
desc: Staycation for my husband’s birthday - staff decorated the room and also delivered a happy birthday cake to the room free of charge. Joe Kok was fantastic and made it a wonderful stay with an upgraded room - to a huge suite- and late check out. All staff were polite and very helpful - Thank you Would highly recommend

title: Staycation
desc: having joe kok to serve you is a blessing. he bumped us up to the orchid club room as the room we booked wasn’t available when we came to check in. he even brought us up to our room to make sure everything was okay. my second time here in 1 month, extremely satisfied with the service here!! 😍

title: Pleasant Staycation
desc: Stayed w friends and got the orchid room. Was surprised they served free flow of drinks and snacks from 6 to 8pm and dinner was served in our room too. If I'm not mistaken christine and her colleague were the one serving from door to door and always with a smile. We're delighted through out our stay although at that point of time there were some major works done at the lobby. In addition, it's near to amenities and walking distance to Bugis street and city. Looking forward to stay here again.

title: Great hospitality, comfortable stay.
desc: Booked a stay for a relaxing retreat. Had a warm welcome by Mr Joe Kok. He checked us in and took care of us throughout the process, giving special care and notice to our request of a room with a bathtub. He upgraded our room to a big spacious one with a balcony with a beautiful view and gave us a late check-out. We were welcomed with a refreshing juice and chocolates. In the evening, we were served a scrumptious dinner together with cocktails in our room. Maezel and Christina came by with their cart filled with tipples and refilled our drinks thrice! The service and hospitality we received during our trip was great and we would highly recommend the stay. Will definitely be back for another stay.

title: Lovely pool, comfortable rooms and excellent staff.
desc: A nice place for a Singapore staycation, mainly due to the pool area where you can relax and order food and drinks. The rest of the meals are served in the rooms as the restaurants are all Covid closed. That said, the food was very good and the service excellent. A few issues with noise from other rooms (there seems to be a soundproofing issue), but the duty manager Joe was on hand to help with an upgrade to a quieter room, which was much appreciated. He genuinely seems to care about customer service which was lovely to see. Thanks also to Allen on reception who was very helpful.

title: Enjoyable Staycation
desc: Hotel's lobby undergoing renovation however this doesn't affect the warm hospitality given to us. Exterior looks a bit worn out but the room is fairly new. Given the current Covid situation, the Club Lounge that comes with the Orchid Club Room are no longer accessible and instead a 4 course meal was served in room with servings of alcoholic beverages in the form of pushcart every half an hour. I was surprised on how the hotel took the effort of not only providing a cake but also decorating the room for a birthday celebration. Definitely not something I would forget about. Due to bad weather on the night of our stay, the concierge provided us with an umbrella that saved us from being drenched in rain. Thank you! It's truly a memorable stay for us.

title: Terrible waiting time for check in
desc: We decided to book park royal club room to celebrate our anniversary on 31oct as we see tons of positive review. But we were so wrong. We arrived at 2.30pm for check in, but was told us our room is not ready. After returning at 4pm, Our room is still not ready. Finally after 2.5 hrs of wait, we received our key at 4.54pm. We decided to cancel our late evening plan as my wife was exhausted from the Long wait and there wasn’t enough time for her to doll up.

title: Great First Visit, would definitely be back
desc: My stay with Park Royal on Beach Road on 27 Sept was amazing. The overall experience was great, starting from booking and email communications on my stay prior to my arrival. Duty Manager Darryl was prompt with his responses and was knowledgeable about the hotel to answer my enquires. Room (Orchid Club Premier Room) - Clean and Spacious. Modern design and brightly lit. Comfortable bed and a huge sofa and TV. Toilet ensuite is clean and brightly lit. Comes with a rain shower and huge tub. Staff - friendly and approachable. Front desk staff was able to provide clear instructions with regards to breakfast arrangements (due to COVID restrictions) and were very helpful to accommodate us with an early check in and late check out due to our planned itinerary. Local Experience - had

title: Relaxing Stay and good Promotion
desc: I booked two rooms for our family vacation, one was the Orchid Club Premier Room and the other a Superior Room. Both rooms were huge and very clean. They have very comfortable Bed and Pillows, which just lets you stay in the bed even more! Perfect when you’re looking to get that needed relaxation. The Club room was very well worth it! As part of their safety measure, breakfast was served in the comfort of our rooms. You get to pre-select them prior to your check in date: Breakfast has four options: 'Go Local' Breakfast, Chef’s Special, The Health Boost, & The Classic Continental. Evening cocktails were served in the room as well from every 30 mins. Aside from the snacks and drink, they provided dinner as part of the promotion - which was really good. The pool is huge! If

title: Great Stay with Excellent Service Staff
desc: Stayed over the weekend to celebrate our anniversary. Room was very clean and spacious, they had done up decos to vibe up our celebration. The Room service guy Eric was very friendly with great service. Was served by him for cocktail Dinner, he greeted us with great warm smile even though it was a in-room dinning experience. Excellent service. We met up with him along the corridor after leaving the room for checkout he greeted us once again very cheerfully and hoped to see us again very soon. Will Definately be coming back! Great Rooms and Great staffs!

title: Birthday celebration Staycation
desc: Have my Birthday staycation at Parkroyal on Beach Road...initially had abit of hiccup but was resolved by Duty manager Mr Joe Kok👍👍👍 Would like to give compliments to Joe as I’m very impressed by his prompt response/action & greatly. appreciated. The club lounge staffs are very friendly & nice too😊 Highly recommended ✌️

title: Excellent Service, Beautiful Rooms
desc: Came here on a staycation and upon check in we were greeted by friendly receptionist. While there were some delay in checking in due to influx of guests, the duty manager was nice and attended to us shortly. The room was also nicely decorated with balloons without requesting. I feedbacked that the room had a slightly funny smell and the duty manager, Joe was quick to attend to my request. Excellent service from Joe as he immediately changed our rooms to one with a beautiful view. Really pleasant start to the staycation and looking forward to staying with Park Royal in the future.

title: Staycation
desc: I had 3D2N staycation here, booked 2 rooms. Upon my arrival, the manager Mr Joe, welcomed us with great service ensuring that we get to our rooms correctly. We booked 2 deluxe rooms. Both rooms were clean and well maintained. Location wise is very convinient as we have a lot of Halal food variety across the road. Pool was huge and there’s kid’s pool area too! Overall, we are satisfied with our stay. Will definitely make a return. :)

title: Wonderful Stay
desc: We had a wonderful stay at Park Royal. The staff was attentive and had kindly decorated the room upon hearing that it was our anniversary. We were heartened by the gesture and will definitely be back in the future.

title: Good location for quiet stay and very near to Arab St
desc: I stayed at room 295. This room is bigger than the other rooms my family stayed (room 235, 236 and 271). It comes with 1 king size bed and 1 super single bed. Amenities in the toilet is quite basic, but it comes with iron and board and hairdryer. Check-in was quite slow but the lady who attended to us was very pleasant. The swimming pool looks quite big for a small hotel. Location is very near to Arab St (just across the overhead bridge) - good for travellers to explore one of the Singapore's attraction with a wide variety of food and drinks cafes and restaurants. The Sultan Mosque is also within walking distance. The price however is a little bit pricey for a small 4-star hotel. Plus point - very comfortable and large king bed. (One of the best bed I have ever slept on out of

title: Superb Service @Park Royal Beach Rd
desc: I was amazed by Park Royal service staff for their prompt and pleasant service. I especially would like to give my compliments to concierge Jimmy and Farhan, and also to Frontline staff Mun who graciously see that my stay is smooth and impeccable. Nonetheless, kudos to all Park Royal staff who made our stay a safe and comfortable. Keep it up! Happy Guest from 291 5 Sept - 7 Sept 2020

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Booked the deluxe room and it was unexpectedly spacious. Upon making the booking, I enquired about a birthday cupcake for my partner's birthday and to our surprise, they decided to decorate the room with banner and balloons as well. Despite being busy, they took the time to actually do that. Thank you to Reika for the smooth and fast check in. Great experience overall. Highly recommended!!

title: Clean and friendly staff
desc: ParkRoyal Beach was my choice of hotel to surprise my husband for his birthday. The location is a thumbs up with easy access to find food,just opposite. The team have set up aminities and birthday cake for my husband. I am a hoteliers myself and YES the receptionist was awesomely friendly, patience and have spoke clearly when they explained the do n dont to all guests during this period. Good job 🙂 A million thanks to all staffs especially to the lady who checked me in, soft spoken and friendly. Thank you ParkRoyal Beach Road Team. Be Safe..

title: Value for money and attentive staff
desc: The staff was attentive and attended to our queries during our stay. The food was also good. One of the staff, Maezel, always greet us with a positive and cheerful outlook. She even ensure my children felt welcomed during our stay. Will definitely be a choice hotel for us. Thank you Parkroyal!

title: Good service and food
desc: We stayed in a Orchid club deluxe room, which came with access to cocktail club (dinner and a roving drinks trolley). The upgrade was worth it, and the service was excellent. We attended a short cooking class in the adjoining restaurant in the afternoon free of charge, and the chef-instructors were friendly and very helpful. Much thanks in particular to Maezel, who made sure to come by regularly during dinner hours for drinks and light refreshements. Five star service all around.

title: Super Friendly Staff
desc: Initially we booked for 2 nights and in the end the kids wanted to have another night so we managed to extend another day with the same rate. Thanks to Duty Manager Joe, he is very helpful, chatty and friendly to assist us with the extension. I would like to thanks another Staff Ken, he helps with me with a late check out (supposed to be the actual check out day) knowing that I check in slightly later on the actual day. Thank you Joe and Ken for your excellent hospitality. Will definitely recommend my family and friends to stay in Park Royal.. thumps up!

title: Excellent service!
desc: Booked a stay at the hotel, have a bit of delay when booking in, but the manager Joe is extremely helpful and helped me to check in as fast as he can. wonderful room and stay! Excellent service by them! Especially the manager Joe Kok! Highly recommended!

title: Service
desc: First time staying here Great location, clean rooms and good service from Manager Joe Upon check in I had to wait for the room to be ready but the manager is very helpful Love this place def would come back!!!

title: Memorable staycation to celebrate our engagement
desc: My fiance and i had booked an Orchid Premier Room to celebrate our engagement, with the help of the hotel's reservation executive Maezel. She had been been the most approachable and helpful in replying all my emails. Knowing how important this staycation meant to us, she reassured that she would prioritise our reservation for early check-in and late check-out, despite the hotel being fully booked for the September school holidays. Together with her team, they decorated our room for the occasion. We also had the chance to attend the local experience workshops on cocktails making and tea appreciation which were enriching and interesting. In order to ensure that we still enjoyed the benefits of the orchid club, they ensured that our meals, drinks and even snacks were delivered to

title: I had a great staycation!
desc: Totally worth to have staycation with the hotel! I love the new renovated room, it is very comfortable and bright ( But my room a bit dusty ) I got a club room, too bad the club lounge is close during the circuit breaker, I hope the hotel can mention that at the booking page. I'm glad that the food for the breakfast, evening cocktail are SUPER tasty! The cocktail on the wheel is a cool idea that the lounge staff Maezel and Christina push the drink in trolley to the room every 30min to serve for the evening cocktail. Maezel also take my special coffee order and made it very nice for me. There is a miscommunication about the laundry, the hotel booking page mentioned all club room entitled 2 pcs per guest but it never mention have to give the laundry by 10:30AM! The lounge manager

title: Shower in common spa toilet, painful massage, super cold and small room
desc: Tried the promotion “Rejuvenation for the body” (sgd 168). The receptionist didn’t confirm which treatment I have chose. I was brought to a room without attached bathroom for my treatment, which I need to wore the bathrobe coming out of my room to the common toilet to wash after the body scrub. Inside room was super cold however they were not able to adjust for me. The massage was super painful, and I can still feel the pain when I back home. I was asked about the service when I made the payment, however they just not answering to the feedback. I was shocked with such a bad service under such international hotel. 第一次到Park Royal 做Spa。一星期前訂了「Rejuvenation for the body」(sgd 168) 。今天到了，職員並沒有再決認Package 內容，帶了我到一間沒有廁所的房。因為安排錯誤的關係，做完body scrub ，我要穿著浴袍到房外到Spa內公用廁所沖身。最難為的是，浴室內連掛浴袍的位置也沒有。

title: 1st time...good
desc: Came for a staycation with family. Hotel is near to Arab street and walked a lil further to Bugis area. Receptionist and Front door staffs are friendly..upon our arrival. The entrance from outside carpark to the hotel has no slope so have to carry your luggages up the stairs (not sure if they do cater for those in need of easy access to the hotel without walking up the stairs - tink able to enquire the hotel on that). Hotel rooms are nicely set up..although there was a lil delay of the birthday cake (was told that they wld be giving 2 cakes to my kids as both havg birthday celebration before our arrival)...but had to call the kitchen to ask on it...and was given 1 piece. Nways...its alright. Was told previously that the cake given is Halal. Swimming pool at Level 4 is

title: Hotel Staycation
desc: The second chance staying at park royal beach road. Love the newly renovated interior and exterior of the rooms. But sadly the room is dusty! Bed was filled with previous occupants hair hidden beneath the bed sheets. Hotel tap water flow for some strange reason was weak at the basin area which mostly dispense hot water for the longest possible time despite tap outlet turned to cold water. Breakfast was not fantastic as before. And FYI hotel gesture to provide free sanitizer and wipes along with 2 mask was thoughtful. But don’t bother to use the mask which is of very bad quality! Would not have stayed again if not for the deal I got it at! For the same price, I would have stayed at pan pacific service apartment located just beside park royal beach road.

title: Orchard Club Premier Room
desc: We stayed in the Orchid Club premier room (booked a deluxe and opted for a slightly more affordable option for upgrade, will be notified and charged at the desk if rooms are available) It came with a balcony and was fantastic! This room offered a lovely view of the Singapore Flyer with no obstruction. Thank you to Lynn for checking us in so swiftly and to Maezel for your impeccable service during cocktail hours. We were slightly disappointed when we found a strand of hair in one of the pillow while exploring the room for the first time. There was a housekeeper on the floor so we brought our pillow to him for an exchange, he was apologetic and changed it quickly. We didn’t found the need to raise this matter as the rest of the room was clean. However, with COVID19 it would

title: Staycation with my family
desc: I came here for a staycation with my family. Booked for 2 night stay deluxe room and opt for complimentary room upgrade under members privilege. During check-in one of the staff at the front desk offered us a complimentary room upgrade to orchid club deluxe room. We quickly check in to the room as our baby boy was cranky.On that night i was browsing the parkroyal website and i realise that we had check in to deluxe room instead of orchid club deluxe room. So the following day i came down to the front desk and highlighted this matter to them. They truly sorry for their mistake. They expedite our room upgrade with spore flyer view and offered us late check out too!Many thanks to celise and team for assisting!Celise and team were exceptional,impeccable and pleasant. Assist us in

title: A 5-Star Service!
desc: Stayed with my wife for 3 days 2 nights for a “BabyMoon” staycation from 29th - 31st Oct at Parkroyal Beach Rd. Been going to this premise since my childhood days when it was called The Plaza Hotel. Anyway, we were taken very good care by Duty Manager Joe Kok. He ensured we got one of the best rooms and very cutely decorated with balloons. My wife’s well-being was constantly checked by any service staff that served us. We had a room with the best view facing the heritage Sultan Mosque. The staff from the Orchid Club, Ginger Restaurant and Phone Concierge performed above my expectation during the stay. My wife is so impressed and very happy with everything. Thank you for making this staycation a pleasant one Mr Joe! Great management. - Mr Salim

title: Remarkable stay
desc: Booked the Orchid Club Premier room and was pleasantly surprised with the view of the Singapore Flyer from our room! Understand that the hotel is running high occupancy so you're one of the lucky ones if you get this view. We also participated in one of the complimentary workshops the hotel has organised, which was dim sum workshop. The chefs were very kind and patient in demonstrating, definitely a fun (and delicious) workshop for couples and families! Cocktails are from 6pm to 8pm where there will be 2 lovely ladies pushing a trolley around and serving you drinks every half an hour. Thank you Mia and Jollin for the fabulous and smiley service! Truly enjoyed our cocktails at the comfort in our room. Breakfast is at the newly opened restaurant on Level 1 called Ginger. You

title: Good stay!
desc: The hotel is located near to all the food and shopping district. Highly accessible! Although I only managed to get a room at 6pm, I was offered a late check-out too! Upon receiving a room, FO Ken Hew upgraded us to a suite. It was so huge and comfortable! Thank you, Park Royal Beach Road it was a great stay!

title: HOME AWAY FROM HOME!
desc: This is not my first review for the property, as I had shared a review or two already from my previous stays. But this one is an even more special one as - thanks to the pandemic- this place had become our Home since the beginning of this year and We have been staying here (and calling it our home) for more than 8 months now! What made us feel comfortable and at home is not just the hotel itself, but more of the wonderful & lovely Staff While I typically write about SERVICE in a special section, this time I had to call it out Front and Center! Almost very staff member of the hotel (from the concierge and Bell hop to the Lounge and Room service staff) made our stay memorable, by always greeting us by name and with a warm smile. This made us feel at home even during testing

title: Great Staycation!
desc: Had a wonderful staycation here. Special thanks to duty managers Joe and Lynn for their excellent service. They made the effort to get me a room with a view which I requested. All the other staff were also helpful and friendly. The swimming pool was nice and had good city views. Overall, I look forward to my next stay.

title: Enjoyable staycation!
desc: Service was excellent and everything about the hotel is love! My special thanks to hotel staff, Allen and Aisah, for their wonderful hospitality (pls convey my heartfelt thanks to them!). The rooms were very clean and comfortable, and the hotel is a stone throw’s away to the bustling Arab St. Nonetheless, hotel guests can be assured of a good night’s rest as it is peaceful enough ar night. We were invited to have breakfast at the Ginger Restaurant on our last day and I must say, the new decor is lovely :) Can’t wait to be back - pls keep up the good job and continue to provide such great service ‘cos your efforts certainly do not go unappreciated especially by locals like us :)

title: Amazing Service and Staycation
desc: This is my second time booking a stay with Park Royal and I booked an orchid Club Premier inclusive of breakfast room for my girlfriend's birthday on the 16th of october and got better than what I expected. Shout out to Dillah, one of the senior manager at the front desk for offering us a complimentary upgrade to one of their suites! It was a great surprise for us as it came with the cocktail hour and a complimentary dinner all in-room. Dillah and her team were exceptional and extremely pleasant, checking up on us to see if the room was suitable for us and surprising my girlfriend with a birthday tart sent to our room. Room wise, I've booked the orchid club premier room previously and had a preference for the look of it over their suites as there was a balcony but no

title: Extremely great and positive service!
desc: Our stay here was very positive & pleasant. The customer service was excellent, great props to Mazel & Christina for being so patient with our requests. They were very polite despite our numerous requests and they are very professional and well mannered! Would definitely want to stay another time because of their excellent service! Definitely an asset to the company! On a side now, receptionist could smile more though! We were pretty doubtful about the service at that point but the great customer/room service changed our minds! Overall a great experience and would recommend to anyone!

title: Great comeback
desc: It started off with a bit of an awkward hiccup and what felt like a sub par service below expectations. But Ray the duty manager did salvaged the situation and made the whole experience more than wonderful. The room design was amazing, spacious and very clean. The food is above expectation. Pool was clean and deep. Overall a wonderful experience and will most likely visit again. However, improvements could be made to their internal communications. Special compliments to Ray the duty manager. He was quick to admit their mistake and to offer multiple solutions to ensure that our stay is as comfortable as possible.

title: Amazing with a capital “A”
desc: First off, the biggest thank you to Ms. Dillah for the impeccable service. She upgraded our deluxe room to orchid club premier room, helped us with reservations at Si Chuan Dou Hua and just made sure we were having a great time. For those using public transport, there’s a bus stop right in front of the hotel. Orchid club premium room - big room with balcony - separate shower and bath tub - bidet toilet - filtered water fountain - comfortable bed - spotless clean Since we bought the fave staycation package, we had a 6-course dinner at Si Chuan Dou Hua and free hotel breakfast delivered to our room. Both yummy. Things to improve: - no hot water coming out of the shower in the morning - breakfast was 20 min late I would definitely recommend this hotel for staycation-ers

title: Great choice for staycation!
desc: Our first time staying at Parkroyal Beach road hotel Orchid Club Premier room not knowing what to expect. Our room was readily decorated with birthday sign and balloons. Shortly after check-in, the staff served us a really yummy chocolate pie and chocolates. We really enjoyed the free in-room breakfast (of your choice) and also the cocktail served from 6-8pm. We were extremely surprised of how filling cocktail spread is (see picture). Room: True to its picture, it was well-designed and spacious, comes with a cozy sofa and table great for in-dining esperience. The bed is really comfy. We loved too the spacious balcony and the bathtub! Dining: Despite the fact that Ginger is currently under reno, we enjoyed dining at Sichuan Douhua restaurant instead. There's literally not a

title: Good Staycation!
desc: Had a good staycation at Parkroyal! Check-in was a little slow, but might be due to the high volume during this period. Check-in time was 3pm, but the room was only ready at 5.30pm. However, my check-out was extended by an hour. There was some typo error on the website about the deluxe room having a rain shower, but upon going to the room, it was just a normal shower (apparently both superior and deluxe rooms were normal shower by default) Duty Manager Joe kindly provided a free room upgrade and assisted for the room change when I feedback the mistake on the website (thanks!!). With the staycation promo, I also managed to try the in-house Sichuan Dohua restaurant for the first time and they even allow the complimentary Welcome Tea to be consumed during my meal. Good lunch at the

title: Excellent Service and Exceptional Hotel!!
desc: At the front desk, we were greeted by a very polite and exceptional Duty Manager Ms Dillah who patiently explained to us everything we needed to know. We also got upgraded to a suite and my daughter was super thrilled! The suite is super clean and the toilet was also spotless and shiny. Extremely spacious for all of us with 2 huge smart TVs to keep us entertained. And in room dining! There is nothing more we could ask for. My whole family is super happy with Ms Dillah, all the staff, and everything else about this hotel. We came here to celebrate the birthdays of me and my husband and we could not be happier! Thank you so much for everything! You have definitely made our stay Amazing and beautiful!

title: Highly commendable service!
desc: Our room looked newly renovation and was very well furnished, toilet was extremely clean too! Hotel staff were friendly and always ready to greet us. Room service requests were promptly responded to. Most commendable was their swift action in returning my lost items. I realised that I had misplaced my wedding ring and necklace a few days after my stay, and was able to retrieve it few hours after I gave them a call. Could not get everyone’s name but everyone was so helpful! A big thank you to the front desk and security staff present on 6 Oct. And most grateful to housekeeping staff who kept my items (which meant a lot to me) safe!

title: Birthday staycation
desc: I had a wonderful staycation at Parkroyal Beach road for celebrating my husband's birthday. I booked a Premier Club room and requested for a room with the view of the Singapore flyer. The hotel made my wish came true and also helped to decorate the room with balloons and had a special dessert/birthday cake sent to our room. The cocktail and breakfast were sent to our room very punctually at the requested timings and the chefs also took note of our food preference. Refills of drinks were also offered at regular intervals. I visited the swimming pool area in the morning which had beautiful view of Suntec City, the Singapore flyer and Marina Bay Sands. There were nice deck chairs around the pool for relaxing which were very clean and comfortable. My husband said that this is his

title: Staycation with limited Club benefits
desc: Booked one night in the Orchid Club Deluxe room which comes with breakfast and all dining in the room. When checking in, we had to select our breakfast out of 4 choices and indicate the time to have it served. Despite informing them that dinner can be served at 6pm, they were late and I only received it at almost 7pm. There was tomato soup, salmon and cheese pasta served with desserts. It was quite a spread so I won't advise that you have dinner outside having this. At about 6pm, a knock came on the door and we were greeted by a staff member with a trolley serving wine, juices and sodas and some snacks like cashew nuts and Doritos. She informed us that she would be returning in half an hour to see if we needed anything else. This was an odd time to be serving snacks and

title: short stay during COV-19 period. (wrong timing)
desc: I scanned thru the Discovery app, and decided to pick Parkroyal @Beach Road because pricing is cheap for Club room (less than S$300 for overall price) When I checked the main Parkroyal hotel website, I discovered that the club lounge had closed due to COV-19 . Nevertheless, I went ahead. Few days before checking-in, email from hotel come to me, asking me to select breakfast item. I made selection and sent back to hotel. On that day, I went to hotel at 2.30pm and check in was fast and effortless except that the room was not ready till 3.30pm. I was assigned a room with twin bed. and receptionist asked me to fill in breakfast form . I saw the menu and found it slightly different. I fill in anyway. I went to the room and found the room bright and nice. I went to gym and

title: Lovely Staycation
desc: My daughter and I just came back from a lovely staycation at ParkRoyal Beach Road during Phase II of the Covid period. I had booked a Superior room to celebrate the end of PSLE which my daughter studied hard for. I chose this hotel as it was facing Arab Street which had plenty of Halal food Restaurants and Cafes, not to mentioned the iconic Masjid Sultan. We arrived at 2.15pm and was served by Allen. He was nice enough to let us check in early as Check in time was 3pm. The room we got was not what I had requested for and I sent a feedback to the hotel some hours later. I really wanted my girl to have a room with a view at least and felt disappointed when the room was not what we expected it to be. I would like to express my sincere thanks and appreciation to Ms Dillah,

title: Amazing Anniversary Staycation
desc: It was a nice gesture for Maja to offer a call/text to inform that our room is ready to check in. Check in was a lil disruptive due to the construction noise. The room was amazing and a big thanks to the GE team for the anniversary set up (though you spelt my last name incorrectly haha). Breakfast in room was delicious, my partner and I enjoyed it a lot! One small thing was operator only offered 30 minutes late check out but thanks to Maslinda - whom offered a late check out (which was part of the privilege apparently) my partner and I were able to enjoy the pool. Overall great experience!

title: Wonderful experience at Executive Suite
desc: I booked a room at Parkroyal for my girlfriend birthday, and I’ve requested for early check in to do the decorations. Their manager gave me a call the day before of my stay and said that the room is available for check in at 11am, which was 4hrs earlier than the normal timing. After I checked in, I ask them if there was cocktail hour and breakfast included in my package, they said they will get back to me and helped me carry my things up to the room. 5 mins after reaching the room, they knocked on my room door and said that the staff and manager would like to give me a complimentary cocktail and breakfast. It was really a great stay with them, and they were really helpful, and accommodating to my needs. Definitely looking forward to another stay with them. Thank you Yong Sim

title: Sg Staycation
desc: nice hotel...i am totally speechless...the lobby reception staff is super friendly and helpful to explain everything to me... was staying at lvl 7...orchid premier...though i hv a balcony but my view were blocked by buildings. despite all these i like the beds...they were high. pillows were soft. room is spacious...a choice to use bath tub or shower room.

title: Family staycation
desc: Check in is smooth, however front desk officer can do better. As we are staying in club room. So not much was intro what we can be expected (when check-out notice we have a welcome Chinese tea session which was not told) also check with front seat does the Swiming pool need to book. According to him, no booking needed upon reaching the swimming pool the staff over there say we need to book in advance luckily the pool not much people so they allow us to register on the spot, great pool view. Love the room, comfortable and good balcony to relax. No bottle water is given as there is distill water in the bathroom. However staying in club room you can request for non alcoholic drink 24/7 .Set dinner was serve to the room. Taste is good non refillable. Alcoholic drink and nuts/nacho

title: Lovely staycation despite the hiccups
desc: It was my 2nd staycation at the hotel on 7 Nov, this time with the kids. We had a good stay despite some earlier hiccups - air con not working, and we had to be switched to another room after a long attempt to repair it. The Duty Manager Ms Dil went out of her way to make us comfortable despite the hiccup and after the room switch everything went well. We would like to express our thanks to her for constantly updating us about the new room's progress and making sure we were comfortable in our temporary room. Loved the deep tub in the new room. We had a full breakfast at Ginger and the restaurant was beautifully decorated. Just a note about the pool booking - we were not informed that the hotel had implemented a booking system (there was none during my 1st staycay) and

title: staycation
desc: Joe, duty manager, was nice enough to upgrade us to a bigger room and assisting us in all the info needed. It was a good experience with no problems of checking in. thank you so much for the help to makesure that we had a pleasant stay!!

title: Wonderful surprise upgrade to suite!
desc: Our Orchid Club Premier Room was upgraded to a beautiful and spacious suite!!! Wonderful surprise for my husband whose birthday was 2 days earlier. Mr Joe Kok, the duty manager was very patient during our check-in and personally brought us to our room. I thought the surprise was only the usual birthday decoration but this tops all expectations! Thank you so much for making my husband's day!!!

title: Great stay
desc: Allen at the reception was very helpful. When I arrived before 11am he offered me an early check in but asked if I minded a corner room. Upon query he said it is the same size as other standard rooms but it could be a bit noisy as it is next to the area where the housekeeping staff load their stuff for their rounds. I didn’t mind at all and I was very pleased with my room even though it did not have a view. It was spacious, clean, comfortable, has a nice working area, and a huge bed. Hotel is very conveniently located (5 mins from Bugis downtown line) with lots of eateries around - from hawker centre (Golden Mile food centre is just a short walk away) to quaint cafes and restaurants around the Haji Lane areas opposite the hotel. I had a great two nights stay and will be

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: We had an amazing stay at Parkroyal on Beach Road. Every aspect of our stay exceeded our expectations. Stayed at the Orchid Club Premier Room. Room was spacious and immaculate. Our balcony had a slight view of the Singapore Flyer. To have a view, you have to request for the particular room provided if it is available. Many thanks for the service and appreciation for the hotel staffs especially the team managed by duty manager Joe Kok. He attended to me during check-in and brought me to the club level at level 6 to avoid longer waiting times. Very attentive and patient manager. He tries his best to accommodate to my request and extending his utmost assistance. Besides him, there were staffs by the name of Dillah and Allen who were at the reception. Extremely polite and

title: Worthy Staycation 🍺🥂🍷
desc: Orchid Club Premier room is well designed with the view of the Singapore flyer. Come with an in-room evening cocktail with appetizer serves from 6 pm to 8 pm and breakfast at Ginger restaurant. The bed is a good size and comfy especially with kids. There is a children's pool for my son to swim and play. Overall we could see that Mr. Joe and Ms. Dillah were providing strong customer service and constant concern for their guest staycation experience. Thank you for the hospitality given throughout our recent staycation.

title: Talib
desc: Dm Joe Kok is very friendly and helpful. He helped us through out the whole stay and we enjoy his hospitality. He is an asset for the hotel. He make us a pleasant stay here. We requested late check out and he helped us with sincererity.

title: Wonderful Stay !
desc: I want to give a huge shout-out to Joe who is the duty manager of the park-royal beach road give me and my fiancée a remarkable stay, and help me to sort out my stay and wedding proposal in the hotel room without much hassle. Really Highly recommend the hotel as is clean and comfortable. Definitely will return to the hotel to stay again, Highly recommend.

title: Value for money staycation
desc: Booked for the stay just an hour prior to check in. I booked a Deluxe Room and received a complimentary upgrade to Orchid Club Deluxe Room (without the Club Privilege though). I feel it will be a more pleasant experience if they also extend the club privilege to those who received complimentary upgrade. Requested for late check-out and was told that I can check out at 4pm on the following day. The room is clean and spacious. There is some visible aging after all it has been there for years. Bathroom didn't come with bathtub and it is relatively small. Pool is not big but sufficient for a dip. Seem like there is some miscommunication on whether prior reservation is required. Was told that no reservation is required but the person mending the pool told us otherwise. As there is

title: Great Staycation
desc: Great Staycation with club lounge benefits. we were pampered by the 2 ladies serving drinks thru out the 6 - 8pm. there was a good meal provided as part of the club lounge benefits and lots of drinks and sancks.

title: Stay at Park royal
desc: Very good service for the cocktail drinks. However, The room at Level 7,orchid room was not sound proof, at night the neighbouring rooms made lots of noise which can be heard from my room. The sound proof was very disappointing for the balcony orchid room. The room was very pretty, comes with a nice toilet, hotel facilities were great. Hope the hotel can improve on the sound proof as it is disturbing our stay to be able to hear the noise made by other rooms at midnight.

title: A superb birthday staycation
desc: If you remember one thing from this review: take a dip in their amazing swimming pool. Had one of the most serene experiences of my life under poolside shelter, cocooned in pleasant afternoon warmth and drying off from a 1-hour dip. Stare out into their expansive view of Singapore's skyline and feel the sense of stillness you've been seeking amid the hullabaloo in your life. It's a great comfort. I visited PARKROYAL at Beach Road and stayed in the Orchid Deluxe Orchid Club Premier Room on my birthday, with club privileges and breakfast included. While the club was closed on my visit due to renovation, it was still awesome to benefit from evening cocktails every day so that comes highly recommended. Dinner was also provided, which was a pleasant surprise to me. Photo attached.

title: Great service & clean room!
desc: Very pleasant service and spacious hotel room. Greeted with great service at Check-in assisted by duty manager Joe Kok, included late check out for us immediately because he heard that it was our anniversary. Couldn't ask for more. ♡♡♡

The room is nice and clean with a good view of the city. Like that they decorated the room with balloons because of the birthday celebration. Joe, the duty manager, was nice and friendly. He showed us the way around. Thank you! Would recommend this place!

title: Orchid Premium Room with Club Benefits
desc: Orchid Premium Room’s Club service is outstanding, despite the Phase 2 imposed. Many thanks to Maezel and Christina in serving the food and cocktails as part of the substitution to normal club benefits. Thanks to ParkRoyal on Beach Road for the hospitality during the period of my stay. The only flaw of it is the lack of hair dryer, which would be complementary to a comfortable and outstanding hotel stay. Nonetheless, the rest of the amenities for a hotel stay are included.

title: Great Help!
desc: I was desperately trying to fax something urgent and realized my office fax service was ceased. Allen and Joe was super kind enough to assist me with the faxing even though I am not their in house guest. Really appreciate the great help from them!

title: Staycation for Family with young kids
desc: The Duty Manager, Joe served my family and me with the check in process and brought us up to level 6 for a swifter check in as the main lobby was packed with other people. Afterwhich he showed us around the hotel. A very nice and friendly Manager that deserves a praise! Definitely coming back for the service!

title: Disappoint, Disappointing, Disappointed...
desc: Check in the hotel on 7 November. Firstly as i have book for the club floor. There isn’t club benefits other then evening cocktail. The club room was closed due to COVID-19. Evening cocktails are sent to the rooms. The meal weren’t even nice... and honestly speaking... made us feel like hospital patients, we weren’t given a choice as club member to choose what we would like to eat... ..
