Breakfast was the same... pre-set meals of a few choices carelessly put together... as we felt that better arrangement could be done, example for club floor guest we could been given in room dining dollars$$ and ordered from the in room dining menu and spent a little more money to upgrade or meals compared to what was given to us... there is a lot that could be improved and things to be

title: Staycation at Parkroyal @ beach road
desc: We had an excellent stay at parkroyal thanks to the excellent service provided by Joe the duty manager who checked us in on 20th December 2020. He was warm, friendly and keen to make our stay as pleasant as possible! :) It was easy to access the pool and book slots as well. Housekeeping service was prompt and fast. The buffet at Ginger was great! Service was excellent! Morning breakfast was delicious as well. Will definitely recommend!

title: Very well-managed
desc: We decided to do the crazy and book just before Christmas, amidst the Singapore Rediscovery chaos in other hotels, but it's very clear that this hotel management is a cut above the rest. Although they didn't have an online check-in, I could do my paperwork before my room was ready. I did have to queue when it was time to check in (and I didn't get a call) but judging by the queue, I could empathise that there was no hands on deck to inform me that my room was ready. I was quite impressed that despite the rather small reception, they had about at least 4 people processing the check-in peak hour and staff were multitasking very efficiently. Same for check out - queue was long so they could have probably improved by informing eligible guests to do the check out (bot was useless

title: After renovation the hotel look so beautiful, friendly staff
desc: We make last minute booking for our staycation and put in the special field requested for early check-in. We were so surprise that an hour later a hotel staff name Allen call us to informed that we can check-in at 12 non for this time. I am so impress on the little details that they gave attention. We went to the hotel is see the hotel lobby is busy with crowded at reception however the staff at the desk is very efficient , friendly and make the queue "disappear" very fast . I was attended by Darryl and i notice he and his female counterpart was really knowledgeable efficient and yet with beautiful smile even though they busy.

title: Wedding & Stay
desc: We had our wedding banquet at Parkroyal on Beach Road in the Sky ballroom on 12 Dec 20. Despite all the covid measures and restrictions, our wedding luncheon went smoothly without any hiccups – in fact, it’s perfect. The ambiance was good and our guests enjoyed the food and drinks. Some guests even commented that our banquet was one of the more well-organised and executed weddings compared to those they attended during the covid period. This would not be possible without the excellent service we received from the Parkroyal team at Beach Road. My wife and I would like to express our thanks and appreciation to our wedding coordinator, Felicia. She has been very helpful and understanding during the planning process amidst the many changes we had to make due to various covid

title: Awesome Stay at Park Royal
desc: My stay was a proposal staycation, Hotel is very accommodating to my request and tried their best to fulfil to my request for my proposal. Everything was perfect from the moment I check in to arranging for a second check in for my fiancé when she arrived later at night. Club benefits were also awesome and on time.

title: Great for couple staycation + Review for Joe
desc: Joe, the Duty Manager of this hotel, was very professional and sincere as he assisted us with the entire check in process. Even though there was a delay in our check in timing as our room was not ready, Joe consistently reassured us that it will be done soon and explained the reasons for it. All my special requests for anniversary were fulfiled, and Joe even managed to get us a complimentary upgrade as well as a much later check-out timing. Extremely satisfied by the room's interior and high level of service standard displayed by the rest of the staff, especially Joe, allowing me to have a near-perfect stay here!

title: Family staycation
desc: We had a lovely 2 days 1 nite stay at the Parkroyal on Beach Road. Greeted by Mr John at the driveway , super friendly and helpful and checked in was attended by Ms Arifah and team at reception Ms Lynn, Mr Ray and Mr Allen all are very professional and efficient . Not forgetting , Andri at Ginger that always service with his smile . Thank you Parkroyal , we will definitely Come again .

title: Highly recommended for a hospitable and comfortable stay!
desc: Joe Koh, duty manager of Park Royal Hotel, and his team of colleagues were most hospitable in guiding my family and I to the various amenities in the hotel. We were delighted with a most personalised greeting, and thoughtful snacks for the kids. Thank you, Joe, and your colleagues for such a lovely hotel experience!

title: Wonderful wonderful staycation to celebrate all occasions
desc: Wonderful spacious club level rooms, good location, and amazing hospitality. I wanted to recommend my hotel of choice, Parkroyal on beach road to everyone who wants a peaceful staycay without the crazy check in fiasco. I think they managed the queue really well. The team here will go the extra mile to make your day and they sure did give their 101% best level of service during our recent stay with them. We were booked for the club room 691 and 690, checked in was prompt and facilitated by wonderful front desk staff Celise. She was polite and answered to all of our request. Given the super peak period of 31 Dec, we did not face any difficulties checking in quickly and we were greeted with clean rooms with simple decoration and welcome gift for my brother's birthday as well as

title: Commendation on Joe
desc: Wow wow wow, to keep it short for reviewers. Joe Kok, the Duty Manager of PARKROYAL on beach road Singapore AMAZED me by showing me his professionalism in his job. His kind smile and tone of voice doubles up for why i have to give him a good review. The hotel is nice and importantly Joe makes me feel like home. I will come back for sure. To the management, you are so lucky to have Joe. Cheers guys.

title: Staycation for anniversary
desc: Was supposed to stay at Mandarin Orchard for a night to celebrate wedding anniversary. However, due to the confirmed cases there, we had to cancel our plans. At the last min, we booked a night at Parkroyal Hotel on Beach Road through trip.com as we are utilising SRV. Thankfully, we managed to book a night at the club delux room with breakfast. (At time of booking, only club rooms are available as the rest are for SHN). Check in is at 3pm but we arrived slightly earlier and room was ready so we checked in at around 2.40pm. Smooth and quick check-in and room was so clean and beautiful! Pleasantly surprised as the hotel's exterior looks old. The lobby is also under renovation at the moment. The bed was very comfortable and the toilet was big enough for shower and water pressure

title: Family Staycation (Pre-Phase 3)
desc: We had a total of 4 rooms booked for the weekend staycation. To avoid the crowd and the snaking long Q, we came early at 12pm (check-in time at 3pm). As soon as we entered the lobby, we were greeted by the friendly staff - one particular staff that caught our eye was Mr Joe Kok. He made the checking-in process a breeze for us! Altho the rooms weren’t ready for an early check-in, Mr Joe Kok made us feel super comfortable at the lobby and made an effort to keep us updated on the status of the room. We felt really appreciated and cared for! He is friendly, kind and attentive to his guests. My wife and I frequent to lots of hotels when we travel, and the services provided by Mr Joe Kok and his team are commendable!! Thank You PARKROYAL and Mr Joe Kok for a delightful stay!!

title: Wedding Banquet @ Park Royal Beach Road
desc: We held our wedding banquet lunch over at ParkRoyal beach road on 19 Dec and we were linked up with our Banquet Coordinator, Jun Ming, whom we are very grateful for his help throughout the whole wedding banquet despite only meeting him on the actual banquet day. He was attentive to the small details and very on the ball for all our adhoc requests. He had provided great advice on to us couple to ensure the whole banquet runs smoothly. At the same time, he helped to coordinate together with the emcee and our photographer to ensure the March in was smooth and lighting was as per photographer's request. His team of banquet staffs and him ensured that all guests needs are met. Many great feedback were received from friends and relatives!!! Also special thanks to all banquet staff

title: Orchid Club Premier King Room (Renovated)
desc: Last visited in Dec 2016, Orchid Club Premium Room. They have since renovated and is even better! 2016 was already a positive experience. Very clever use of space and the new layout gives a feel of expanded space by removing the TV console and office desk. As this is the Covid period, lounge is closed but Park Royal endeavours to serve you your lounge dietary needs via room service with a dial of 0. In room dining menu is limited compared to its more expansive cousin PP at Marina but is decent by its own merit. Cocktail hours are served in-room, the chef selection is impressive and the alcoholic drinks, they spare no expenses to ensure you get your fill. While I am elated at their impeccable service, my heart goes out to their service staff for their thorough

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: Stayed for one night at Parkroyal Beach hotel. The staff were very friendly and welcoming, from the frontdesk staff to the ones working in the restaurants. The hotel room seems newly renovated and everything was very clean and the room smelt of disinfectant, which is reassuring, especially during this Covid period. There were many welcoming touches, gingerbread cookies, welcome notes, a pouch with masks, hand sanitisers, etc. Ms Dillah even sent us a birthday treat after finding out we were celebrating my hubby's birthday. It was a relaxing and wonderful stay. We'll be back.

title: Impressive Service and Stay at Hotel
desc: Our stay at Park Royal @ Beach Road has been nothing short of amazing! Ms Lynn from reception had been very friendly and polite! She provided our family with exceptional service throughout our stay! She was meticulous about the details and was also understanding of my son’s birthday in which she made the extra effort to ensure that his small birthday was a memorable one! Keep it up and please send my compliments to her and her team as well! 👍🏻 Also, just to add, the hotel was clean and the staff were all generally friendly with smiles on their faces. They were all willing to assist in anyway possible. Understand that it is not easy working under pressure during this post CB period and I commend the staff for their efforts and hard work! Thank for working the frontline as

title: Pleasant service recovery
desc: Came early for our check-in but room was not ready. Experienced a delay of 1hour. Duty manager Joe Kok was attentive and immediately provide us with late check out as part of his apology. Appreciated his initiative in service recovery. Highlight of our stay.

title: Compliment and Appreciation Letter For catering Sales team and banquet team for Successfully Wedding Dinner on 19 Dec 20
desc: My wife and I would like to express my thanks and appreciation for the service and care we received at Park Royal Beach Road Hotel from 18 Dec 2020 to 20 Dec 2020. We held our wedding dinner banquet at sky ballroom on 19 Dec 2020. Your staff did a fantastic job. I would like to thank Evonne Lee of Catering Sales for the seamless banquet arrangements since day 1 of our meet up. She was always there to ensure that everything ran smoothly and was aware of our needs and quick to make the necessary arrangements. I would like to commend the banquet team in charge, Eric as well. Eric was very prompt and dedicated. He will guide us and tell us what to do in a very light tone manner which smooth our nerves throughout the entire banquet process. All his staff member with whom we came

title: Good stay but noisy neighbours
desc: Stay at orchid club premium room from 14 to 15 November. The room was well appointed and comfortable. Breakfast mains were delicious and limited to 1 main per pax. Sides like bread and fruits are refillable. Cocktails hours for club rooms are from 6 to 8pm and set items are delivered to the room according to the number of adults. Kids are not given any complimentary food during cocktail hours. The room came lightly decorated for anniversary stay. No cake or extra items given though. Area around the hotel is good and worth exploring. Generally a good stay and the only complain is I had very noisy neighbours who stayed up and made alot of noise till 3am. They seem to be holding some kind of gatherings with friends visiting them till almost 1am. The kids and adults were all talking

title: Excellent service
desc: Mr Joe Kok and his team of staff, excellent service with thoughts and compassion. They took note that we are staying with elders and also took care of their safety and guided them with care in the premises. Very nice and warm communication throughout. They welcome feedback at good respectful communication. Thumbs up to their hard work.

title: Staycation
desc: Stayed for 3 days, 2 nights. The place is new and clean. Breakfast was good. Would like to compliment Duty Manager Joe Kok. He is friendly and attentive. He called back to check on us after we checked into the room. Initially the concierge staff told us there isn’t any high chair available for our infant but Joe managed to secure one for us.

title: Wonderful family staycation
desc: We had a wonderful staycation in Parkroyal on beach road on 6 -7 dec. It really exceeds our expectations. Our children enjoyed the staycation very much. Despite of the lack of manpower due to the current situation, there was no drop: Top-notch customer service - wish to highlight Johnson who was very helpful, alert and attentive to our needs and requests at the lobby throughout our stay. The staff from front desk to restaurant were very helpful too. It was our daughter’s birthday and the hotel room was decorated with balloons and a complimentary birthday cake was served alongside the sumptuous breakfast. All these little touches make a huge difference. This hotel staycation has been very comfortable for us and definitely value for money.

title: Family Staycay!!
desc: All staff were hospitable and attentive! I was attended by Mr Joe Kok for check-in, his service was top notch and he was patient with the requests my family had. Would highly recommend this hotel to family/friends for a short getaway during this pandemic :))

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: We have been to many hotels locally n overseas. What prompted me to write this review is the truly amazing staff that made a difference to our stay!! Coming from healthcare industry where customers can be challenging, I can understand how tricky it is for frontliners. I must highlight there were many “positives moments” from the time we arrived. Unfortunately I didn’t get names of all staff but I try to describe :) We arrived at 12noon on 13 Dec, just wanting to deposit our bags to go for lunch around the area. We have booked 2 rooms and requested a side by side room as we were with families. The young Chinese man at the counter said he will try his best n proceeded to register us all so that check in will be faster later on. He was v polite & apologetic that rooms are not

title: Fast Check-in
desc: I would like to thank Mr Joe Kok (Duty Manager) for assisting and easing our check in process. We are delighted for the speed up process and assistance provided. Although it was a one night stay at the hotel, I enjoyed my time at Parkroyal on Beach Road!

title: Friendly Check in
desc: We were received by a team of friendly staff on check-in. The manager Joe Kok was hospitable and efficient to get us checked in as it was our first time staying with Pan Pacific. He also recommended us to to try the Hotel’s Chinese restaurant. Can’t wait to see what the rest of our 2-day stay will be like :)

title: Great Service Staff, Comfortable Room
desc: Service staff were a great help from the time of booking the rooms till checkout. Very professional, helpful and pleasant. Room and bed were very comfortable (but could have done with a set of cutlery). Location is good as well, with many eateries nearby, and easily accessible.

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Came back to stay with them for my birthday was the best decision ever made! Had booked a different room category but got to know upon check in that the room was upgraded to Orchid Deluxe King room by Joe Kok, the duty manager. Check in was smooth. Did not have to wait for the room as we were told room was ready. We did not manage to get the lady’s name though but thank you for taking the time to explain in detail. Upon entering the room, was shocked to see the decoration. Thank you for taking the time to decorate the room with balloons. Room is amazing. View was superb! Apart from the deco, we received another surprise! A cake was sent to the room as we were about to go out for dinner. Such pleasant surprise. All in all, we enjoyed the time there. We will definitely

title: A night's stay!
desc: Stay was all-in-all quite pleasant. I noted that they had upgraded the TV from before, so this was a good thing. Service was good too; staff at Ginger were pleasant during breakfast. The pool was ok, not many people were around. Only small gripe was that the minibar wasn't designed to keep things cold (just cool).

title: Staycation at park royal
desc: It was pleasure experience with the hotel as the check-in was quick, and excellent service by the receptionist-Esther. The room is very clean and location is great. Very accessible to major attractions. A great staycation,Will definitely visit again!

title: Service needs to improve
desc: Upon arrival at the hotel, check in staff was unethusiastic in her service. There was no smile, no explanation and nothing to end off the interaction. When i called for concierge in the afternoon for an ice bucket and vanity kit, only the ice bucket came. In the evening i called for concierge the second time for a shaving and vanity kit, the housekeeping called awhile later asking me what was the second item that i wanted. It is obvious there is poor downwards communication from concierge to housekeeping. The service at ginger restaurant was terrible. The waiting time for food for in-room dining, dinner and breakfast was very long. There was one time where no staff was at the counter to attend to us! Wanted to dine in at Si Chuan Dou Hua but was told takeup rate was low and

title: Birthday staycation
desc: Great and clean room with balcony. Spacious bathroom with bath tub. Nearby attractions such as Kampong Glam, Bugis Junction, Marina Bay Sands and many more. Staffs are very friendly and accommodating. Front desk Dillah is very helpful and friendly. Food is halal and delicious. Highly recommended.

title: Awesome hotel newly renovated rooms with lovely staffs!
desc: My first time staying in this hotel. Though the property is old, they have just newly renovated. All is new including the rooms. Stayed at club floor. Awesome staffs they have like Sophie, Celise, Maezal, Majaline & Mia. Very very personal touch. Feels like family. Warm welcome & top notch services. Buffet dinner in the restaurant is splendid. Since it was raining heavily, we just opt to enjoy the hotel facilities. Nice door to door cocktail services at the Club. Kids love it. Nice view from the balcony of the room. Overlooking the Flyer. Ample parking for those who drive. In a nutshell, two thumbs up!!! Will definitely visit them again!!!

title: Super Amazing Experience
desc: I'm so impressed with the service of this hotel, Joe Koh the duty manager was so accommodating and friendly, made my stay so swift and comfortable. I would highly recommend this hotel, will surely be back again.

title: Staycation at Parkroyal on beach road
desc: I had a wonderful experience staying in this hotel starting from the receptionist who help to check me in as she make this experience a smooth and memorable with her gentle & tactful ways. The hotel is also clean & located near to many eateries.

title: excellent service
desc: Meizel (Receptionist- Checkin) was very friendly and managed to answer all my queries. The other Receptionist during checkout (forgot the name) was very helpful. When I noticed that there was a billing error (breakfast was charged) I informed him and he immediately informed the staff from Ginger cafe and he made the amendments from his end. I was so touched how they value Healthcare professionals, they really showed how much they appreciate our work.

title: Wonderful stay at the prettiest hotel
desc: Lovely hotel helmed by lovelier staff who made our stay enjoyable. Renovated lobby/restaurant with lotsa IG-worthy shots. Our parents got upgraded to the premier room which was awesome. Our Orchid Club room was great too with spacious balcony. Kudos to friendly staff like Alan, Shima and the ladies who served drinks at the club level

title: Bathroom
desc: Came for special birthday for my hubby and req a suprise deco. Should have bidet or hose in the toilet for hygiene purpose. The room, staff and the enviroment was really great and also the location near by to shop around.

title: Still need some improvements
desc: So far the experience is not so bad but the room service need some improvement.The staff is very friendly other than that all is good.The room service we order the food and salad did not come with sauce.

title: great service
desc: it was my first time booking for a hotel to stay in and on my check out day, I booked last minute for an xtra night and I accidentally booked the wrong date without realising. Since it was my first time, I would expect myself to feel worried but I wasn’t because Allen, who was at the reception was of tremendous help. He guided me slowly on how to go about the situation and when he was not around, Raj helped as well. Im truly satisfied with the service and would definitely come back again. ☺️

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Top notch service provided by the hotel staff that exceed expectations, especially Joe Kok who was attentive to details and thoughtful for my family throughout the stay. Room was big with bathtub. Enjoyed this short vacation...

title: A good relaxing staycation
desc: Generally the hotel is good. All the staffs are good. Allen at the concierge is the best. He is very friendly and helpful. The food is great especially the salted egg crabs. The location of the hotel.is perfect, its near to.many good restaurants and shops.

title: exceptional service by staff~
desc: came here for the complimentary healthcare heroes stay. booked an additional 2 rooms as well. Ruhana was well informed and assisted well with pre-check in details when we called in. night duty manager and the OneConnect team were friendly and enthusiastic even at 11pm. Allen from the front desk was helpful and patient, dinner at si chuan dou hua was very delicious 🥰 staff were knowledgeable about the menu and were attentive, refilled hot water for tea and changed plates often. breakfast at ginger was nice, had waffles and smoked salmon set. juices and toasts were free-flow. hotel is nearby bugis area as well for a night walk! :) or some supper hahaha

title: Wonderful stay.
desc: Thanks to front desk staff Allen and Raj that helped during our stay, we had a wonderful and comfortable staycation with my family. Given rooms were clean and comfortable. Service was prompt, staff were mostly courteous. Thanks ParkRoyal @ Beach Rd!

title: Staycation!
desc: We were here on the healthcare heroes complimentary stay. The room was clean. Compared to our stay at pickering, the pool was alot cleaner! Dinner at Sichuan definitely wouldnt go wrong so would highly recommend to have your bellies satisfied there. Special shoutout to Dillah who saw us through our check in, service was exceptional (: Thank You!

title: Wedding Anniversary Staycation
desc: ParkRoyal Beach Road Hotel speciality is its staff. From the Concierge, Front Office, Housekeeping to Maintenance, all the staff are warm and friendly. Service from the heart. I was upgraded to the deluxe room. My room was decorated because it was my wedding anniversary. The reservation team must have taken note of my remarks upon receiving my reservation through Agoda. Special thanks to Senior Duty Manager Dillah. She has been great since we were at the Reception checking in until the day we checked out. Dillah is definitely an asset to ParkRoyal Hotel team. I will come back to stay definitely.

title: Thank you for the amazing 3D2N stay!
desc: My sister and I had a more than wonderful staycation experience here at Park Royal on Beach Road! Special mention to Ms Dillah, who went the extra mile to make sure that we are comfortable throughout our stay. She even stayed to chat with us at Club 5 which served interesting mocktails and AMAZINGGG prawn paste chicken wings :) She even shared her experience in the hospitality industry which we found insightful. It’s definitely not an easy job these days, so mad respect to all our hospitality staff out there! The swimming pool was relatively quiet during our stay so it was a nice place to chill in the day time. Will recommend this hotel for anyone who is looking for a nice place to staycay with their family :) P/S: Ms Dillah found out that it was my sister’s birthday this

title: Best staycation ever!
desc: My expectations are simple - clean rooms, genuine warm service, delicious in room dining and accessibility to other hot spots. ParkRoyal on Beach Road ticks all those and more. The view from the gym and pool are luxurious and I pinched myself that it was a perfect stay that sits around my budget. I received a nice birthday surprise for both my family members and I really sense that I will return for more relaxing and pampering. Despite the numerous good cafes close by, I wanted my parents to experience the whole breakfast in bed and the in room breakfast was one of the best they ever had. We had the luxury of the room facing the view of Sultan Mosque. The hospitality and service is impeccable. Highly recommend.

title: Great staycation for couples
desc: I had booked a staycation for my partner s birthday and was not disappointed- they had complimentary evening cocktails which was great in terms of quality and quantity The rooms were spacious and clean, and I would highly recommend it to anyone looking for a break

title: Staycay
desc: We decide to staycay in this hotel for our 2 boys birthday. Their birthday is in the same week. One turn 15 and the other 21. Ms Dillah, from the hotel called the room to confirm and told us, she is preparing surprise for both boys. Truely appreciate the efforts by the hotel to create a memorable birthday experience for my boys. Room clean, cosy and comfortable. Check in was smooth, we were attended by Mr Raj at the counter. Patient and helpful. Make our staycation experience enjoyable. Thank you to staffs of Parkroyal at Beach Road.
